project_description: Overview: Rochishmati Noveo Homes is a project by Rochishmati Infra Projects Pvt. Ltd. in the main area of Adibatla, Hyderabad offering luxurious and exquisitely designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is currently ongoing development and will consist of 276 units spanned over 5 towers. Rochishmati Noveo Homes price rate start from Rs. 29.7 Lac onward.Project Details:Rochishmati Noveo Homes, a residential development based in Adibatla, Hyderabad by Rochishmati Infra Projects Pvt. Ltd. is offering luxurious yet spaciously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Rochishmati Noveo Homes apartments are being designed with interiors like vitrified tiles flooring in every room, modular kitchen with granite platform and SS sink, high quality sanitary ware fittings, fire resistant copper ISI electrical wiring with modular electrical switches and concealed PVC conduits, concealed plumbing and branded fixtures etc.Rochishmati Noveo Homes floor plan for its 2 BHK flat range from 900 sq. ft. to 1265 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1580 sq. ft. to 1965 sq. ft. Rochishmati Noveo Homes features modern amenities and facilities for its residents such as a club house, jogging & strolling track, 24 hour power supply, swimming pool, 24 hour security facilities, multipurpose hall, gymnasium, children’s play area, lifts, reserved parking space, intercom facility, maintenance staff, water supply, indoor games room, event space, multipurpose hall, water storage, rain water harvesting, fire fighting systems etc. and many more.Highpoints:Rochishmati Noveo Homes is being developed in designer landscaping in midst of a serene environment away from the hassle of the fast city. The modern architecture is a mix of aesthetics and quality. Rochishmati Noveo Homes locality includes several civic facilities like Delhi Public School, Narayana Academy, Reliance Fresh, Proposed Noveo Center Mall, Kamineni Hospitals, Paramitha Children Hospital, Wonderla Amusement Park, and Ramoji Film City etc.
about_project_details: The origin of Rochishmati Infra Projects (P) Ltd. has a strong thinking process in the back drop to provide Quality and affordable homes to the people from various sectors.The Company has a strong team of people from various segments and sectors with varied experience. The Company is run by professional who worked with various MNCs all across the world.The Company is in good hands of professionals NRIs Engineers with an experience of more than 15 Years in the Field of Infrastructure. The company is well supported by an Architect with diversified experience in providing designs for Gated Communities Villas Malls Apartments Etc. The association of a Chartered Account with The Company handles The Finance and Accounting Part. The Company is well supported by Doctors from India and Abroad.

about_project_details: Anuhar Homes Pvt ltd is a new age property services enterprise aimed at providing quality residential projects and all allied services around residential property management. We provide services that cover the entire lifecycle of your home - from conception of the idea of home, location identification, construction, post construction services like interiors or facilities management services and even disposal and buying of new residential assets for you. Its about homes and not houses.Run by professional managers with prior experience in managing Infrastructure companies, we strive to ensure the services are of the highest quality. Our offices are currently located in Hyderabad and soon to be available in other cities. Our approach of partnering with you at every stage of your dream home is what separates us from every other run of the mill real estate company.

project_description: We at Kamala Builders proudly present our project, Amulya Heights. Amulya Heights is impressive in both ways:in the way it touches the sky and in the way it kisses the ground. Home to seven pleasing and wonderful appartment blocks that make up the community here - the 350 appartments, a massive multi-storeyed clubhouse and plenty of features - heres the prefect dream-come-true living.
about_project_details: Kamala Builders and Developers is a next-generation engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) provider which adapts cutting-edge construction technologies and processes to suit the Indian conditions, while promoting environmental sustainability in a cost-effective manner. Kamala Builders is engaged in planning, development, design and construction of critical infrastructure projects in India. Kamala Builders aspires to be a leader in delivering turnkey projects for construction of residential and commercial, across a gamut of sectors. With ongoing projects in excess of 5.34 million sq. ft., Kamala Builders has demonstrated its ability to undertake large-scale projects that require innovative engineering, world-class technological competence, high quality, and timely delivery.The Company believes in nurturing growth through value addition at every stage and without sacrificing financial prudence. Right from the site selection and concept formulation, to topping out and final delivery, Kamala Builders Group is unrelenting in its attention to minutest details. Kamala Builders Projects present you with a lavish lifestyle Plots keeping in mind expediency and tranquility.These apartments boast of world-class infrastructure and futuristic facilities, making them some of the finest pieces of architecture in the city.For us at Kamala Builders, Our illustrious past extends an invitation to an exhilarating future. We are ready to unleash our most ambitious growth plan ever. A time marked by new landmarks and bigger achievements.Our pursuit of quality and excellence will see us climb new heights. As a reputed engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) player equipped with leading-edge processes and innovations. The reason why we are putting together an impressive 5.34 million sq.ft. built in space with a reputation and the promise of delivering on time.

project_description: OverviewHamptons is a residential project wonderfully developed by ARK Terminus Infra. This project is spanning over an area of 1 acres and it comprises premium 68 units spread across 1 well-designed tower. The project is centrally located in Kondapur, Hyderabad and it is currently in under construction stage. Hamptons price list lies within the range of Rs. 82.3 Lac - 1.15 Cr, which is well within the budget of many home seekers.Project detailsDeveloped by ARK Terminus, Hamptons is a premium residential project offering spacious 3 BHK flats whose area sizes range from 1660 sqft to 2225 sqft. ARK Builders Hyderabad have thoughtfully created this project with state-of-the-art amenities like- Spacious kids play area, beautiful flower garden, gym, banquet hall and fire fighting equipment.- Adding to the list sufficient water supply, power backup in case of electricity cut-off and lift are also available.This project keeps its residents relaxed with fresh air, ample light and cool atmosphere. Further, the flats have beautiful interiors and the project guarantees that you will enjoy each and every moment of your life.HighpointsARK Infra's Hamptons apartment location is a center of attraction as it just takes 10 to 15 minutes to reach most of the attractive places of city like Botanical Garden, Hitech City, Inorbit Mall, Gachibowli ORR Junction, HICC, Novotel, Gachibowli IT Hub, Financial District and so on. The posh and calm locality of this project is free from the noise and pollution as it is situated away from the city. For commuting on daily basis means of transportation including city buses, taxi and auto are available frequently in the vicinity, which is an added advantage for the residents.Hamptons photos will answer to all your questions related to this project. By booking a flat now in Hamptons live auspiciously in your dream home.
about_project_details: Our Corporate philosophy is delivering peace of mind to our customers. We value transparency, ethical practices, regular communication, responsive behavior and adherence to the highest standards of quality which translates to one of our most precious and shining asset "Trust".

project_description: Overview For a modern buyer, a value for price and location is the most important thing and Ramky Estates and Farms Limited have brought Ramky One Galaxia at Nallagandla, Hyderabad keeping this in mind. Spread across 7.69 acres this project offers 2 and 3 BHK apartments whose price list lies between Rs. 69.5 Lac - 85.2 Lac. Project details RERA Certified - Ramky One Galaxia is an inspiring project, set on a magnificent site with vast open spaces. Standing tall at 15 storeys, Ramky One Galaxia consists of thoroughly 682 units and gives the residents an opportunity to experience the joy of living amidst nature’s bounty. The area size of 2 BHK apartments is 1260 sqft while the 3 BHK apartments are spread across a super built-up area ranging from 1695 to 1860 sqft. The apartments are full of designer colored walls with stylish flooring and upgraded lighting and new wood interior blinds which makes for a cozy home. Wide range of amenities like club house, meditation area, gym, swimming pool, banquet hall, rain water harvesting, event space, outdoor tennis courts and a lot more which make living experience exhilarating. Highpoints Ramky One Galaxia gives you the convenience of location, schools, colleges, banks, hospitals, malls and multiplexes – they’re all just a short drive away. The locality is a very good location with most of the things nearby. The locality of this project is very peaceful with less traffic at the same time secured. This locality is very close to Lingampally Station, BHEL, Gachibowli IT, ORR and Chanda Nagar. Replete with fresh air and natural light, all the well-ventilated residential apartments of Ramky One Galaxia are worth buying to live a fair life with your precious ones. Book now and claim the best apartment as per your choice.

project_description: OverviewJanapriya Lakefront, developed by Janapriya & approved by GHMC, HUDA & HMDA is located in Sainikpuri, A.S Rao Nagar which is a tranquil area located in  Hyderabad. Janapriya Lakefront residential project is offering spacious and esthetic 2 & 3BHK Apartments with peaceful surroundings. Janapriya Lakefront floors are ready to move & consists of 800 units spanned in 10 Tower placed on 25 Acres of land. Janapriya Lakefront price range starts at Rs.32 Lac Onwards.Project DetailsJanapriya Lakefront, a graceful project by prominent & well known Janapriya Group nested in Sainikpuri, Hyderabad is providing elegant 2BHK & 3BHk residential flats. Janapriya Lakefront plot area for its 2BHK flat range from 810 sqft – 960 sqft and the 3BHK flat area range from 1145 - 1200 sqft encompassed over 10 floors with abundant groundwater availability & Pre-Cast Technology making it a great dwelling place.  Janapriya Lakefront floor plan  which is a symbol of resident friendly, super luxurious & comfortable living has interiors like RCC Footings & Slabs without Beams, Premium flooring, Concealed copper wiring with modular switches, Kitchen with a granite platform, SS Sink & ceramic walls tiles of Asian Make, Apex exterior paint on outside walls, branded Sanitary Ware, Synthetic Enamel doors and many more.To give you a serene life with comfortable atmosphere  Janapriya Lakefront property provides Top notch amenities like Jogging & Strolling Track, Children’s Play Area, Swimming Pool, Gymnasium, Community Hall, 24X7 uninterrupted power supply with Back Up, Advanced & Sound security system, parking, Library, Internet and many more.High PointsJanapriya Lakefront residential project is providing multi-storied apartments having 10 newly constructed floors with the approval of several prestigious banks.The unique feature of Janapriya Lakefront residency is the fact that it has the very close connectivity to public transport accompanied by utilities like Geethanjali College of Engineering & Technology, Vijaya High School, Tulasi Hospital & Raitu Bazar on every Wednesday along with a long list ahead.

project_description: Vishnu Vistara is one of the most luxurious residential development of Vishnu Group and located at Hi Tech City, Hyderabad. The project is built by the Vishnu Group that has successfully delivered 39 residential projects by now and has fulfilled the dreams of around 2000 families over the last 30 years. The group is well known for considering only the prime locations for constructing luxurious residential projects. Offering 3BHK luxurious apartments, the project covers the total area of 3 acres and features 73% open space with landscaped and manicured gardens. The society that is approved by GHMC is equipped with 2 towers, G+14 floors and 238 flats that are available in various sizes.The Vishnu Vistara is situated in Hyderabad and offers smooth and quick accessibility to places like Hi Tech City, Botanical Garden, Inorbit Mall, Gachibowli ORR Junction, HICC/Novotel, schools, colleges, hospitals and all the other prime areas of Hyderabad.Why buy?Being a luxurious society, the Vishu Vistara society is equipped with modern and luxurious amenities like swimming pool with kids pool, 3- storied club house, manicured garden, secret garden, pergola, jogging track, children’s play area, tennis court, indoor badminton court, squash court, indoor games room, spa, gym, yoga deck, multipurpose hall, cafeteria, shopping center, conference hall, fire safety, centralized water tank, parking area etc. These amenities offer everything within the boundaries of the society and you have to look no further if you want to relax or want to spend some quality time with your family.

The contemporary project, spread across 3 acres of prime property offers an urban lifestyle that exudes style, comfort and unmatched conveniences. It is for you. Make it your home and make the future your own.

project_description: Overview:Featuring 6 majestic towers, Silver Oaks located in Chandanagar, Hyderabad is a gorgeous residential project settled within lush greenery. Developed by Aparna Constructions, this project comprises of total 606 units, which are available with 2 & 3-bedroom configurations. Ranging from 1240 – 1700 sqft, the flats of Aparna Silver Oaks are priced moderately to suit the pockets of budgeted home-buyers. About the project:The intellectually crafted floor plan of Aparna Silver Oaks provides spacious apartments, that are blessed with enough ventilation & natural light. You will definitely fall in love with the bold and elegant design of these abodes, which are designed by expert architects. Aparna Silver Oaks reviews are highly positive, which make this project even more desirable. Extremely beautiful, the photos of Aparna Silver Oaks can be downloaded from the website for overall project details. This well-planned residential project is a part of a the stunning 58-acre Aparna Hillpark Gared Hub. Filled with positive ambiance, these abodes welcome you to live a memorable life with your near & dear ones. The project is tucked with lots of modern amenities like club house, gymnasium, jogging and strolling track, indoor games room, meditation area and swimming pool to name a few. Furthermore, all these apartments are appointed with standard fittings are also built as per vaastu rules. For efficient cooling during summers, all the flats are well-provided with air-conditioning units. Highpoints:The strategic location makes this premium residential society a promising investment destination. Reliable access to Hitech City and Financial District – the two main IT Hubs of Hyderabad adds up to the popularity of this residential project. Public transport is excellent all along the day for smooth functioning of daily life. A flat in Silver Oaks located in the thriving neighbourhood of Chandanagar, Hyderabad is a wise decision. So, cash in and book a flat now!!!

project_description: Overview: Vasavi GP Trend is a project by Vasavi Group located in Nanakram Guda, Hyderabad and currently under construction. It consists of 313 units spanned over 1 well planned tower. Vasavi GP Trend features luxurious and skilfully designed 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments. Vasavi GP Trend price rate starts from Rs. 62.1 Lac onward.Project Details:Vasavi GP Trend, a luxurious project by Vasavi Group is thoughtfully located in Nanakram Guda, Hyderabad. It is offering currently under construction and skilfully designed 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments. Vasavi GP Trend floor plan for its 2 BHK flat range approx. 1380 sq. ft.; 3 BHK flat areas range from 1565 sq. ft. to 2050 sq. ft. and 4 BHK flat areas range approx. 4630 sq. ft.Vasavi GP Trend specifications include double charged vitrified tiles flooring in every room, best quality teak wood frame doors, concealed copper wiring with branded switches, granite kitchen platform with SS sink, chrome plated CP fittings, branded fixtures etc.Vasavi GP Trend amenities include a large club house, jogging & strolling track, cycling & jogging track, power back up, swimming pool, lift, security facilities, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility, banquet hall, gymnasium, kids play area, flower gardens, piped gas, rain water harvesting, internet & Wi-Fi connectivity, fire fighting equipment etc. and many more.  Highpoints:Vasavi GP Trend locality is a prime area of Nanakram Guda, fully equipped with several basic civic utilities and great connectivity to the surrounding areas of Hyderabad. It is built on an area of 2 acres with 65 percent open area consisting of 313 units of lavish and aesthetically designed apartments. It is located on the Outer Ring Road and is a stone’s throw away from IT Hub (Financial District).
about_project_details: Established in 1994, Vasavi Group is a Real estate developer which has very subtly and significantly contributed in shaping the skyline of Hyderabad through the citys silent evolution. Involved in the residential and retail sector of real estate, it has carved out a brand name for itself over the past three decades by building a reputation of providing quality properties of the highest standards that redefine excellence and where each home is constructed with the same finesse.Being amongst the most trusted real estate developers in the city, the Group epitomizes the art of gracious living. It has been a forerunner in providing world class projects and splendid homes for its customers, irrespective of the size or segment of each space.Vasavi Group is known to be a professionally managed organization with a stable and confident business model. It has pursued growth strategies in different verticals, be it solely development, joint ventures or partnerships.
project_highlights:
Highlights


Vasavi GP Trends is located on outer ring road in a stone throw distance to IT hub (Financial District), this is the most upcoming belt in Hyderabad.PROJECT USP:Vasavi GP Trends is the most prestigious and Iconic venture of VASAVI Group. This is coming with only 1 tower with 24 levels in 2.17 acres covering only 35percent of land, remaining 65 percent area is a open space with greeneries, water bodies, visitor parking, jogging track, children play area, out door games, etc.



Discussion

Established in 1994, Vasavi Group is a Real estate developer which has very subtly and significantly contributed in shaping the skyline of Hyderabad through the citys silent evolution. Involved in the residential and retail sector of real estate, it has carved out a brand name for itself over the past three decades by building a reputation of providing quality properties of the highest standards that redefine excellence and where each home is constructed with the same finesse.
Being amongst the most trusted real estate developers in the city, the Group epitomizes the art of gracious living. It has been a forerunner in providing world class projects and splendid homes for its customers, irrespective of the size or segment of each space.
Vasavi Group is known to be a professionally managed organization with a stable and confident business model. It has pursued growth strategies in different verticals, be it solely development, joint ventures or partnerships. 
With over 40 completed projects across Hyderabad and Secunderabad, it is poised to double it’s past three decade footprint of constructed space in a matter of just another few years. It has also successfully constructed several hundred homes and a multitude of retail spaces across the city. Today, Vasavi Group has completed and has in it’s pipeline nearly 10 million square feet of residential and retail space. Vasavi is emerging as a giant with aggressive growth plans across the Residential and Retail sectors. It has created a brand name that symbolizes trust, reliability, quality and innovation, across all these domains.

project_description: Breathe the native air...Home is the sweetest four letter word known to Man. Your home is where your heart actually resides. Imagine the experience of the space you call home. The good life is all set to envelop you at Vasanthaa Happy Homes Nest. Because Mother Nature is ready to greet you with warm welcome, the greens, the lakes, the breeze and the life - all found in abundance.Vasanthaa Happy Homes Nest has been planned meticulously and with great detail, to give you the maximum satisfaction, so that you can revel in its splendor with a song on your lips. The greatest virtue of this wonderful residential venture is that it's a truly well-planned structure designed to provide plenty of room to enjoy the spaces around you - both inside and outside the home.The venture comes in 3 and 4 BHK formats designed to match the changing expectations of futuristic living with a focus on smart utilization of space. Located in the serene settings of Sainikpuri, the area boasts of many well-known names such as College of Defence Management, Indus World School, Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan, etc. For entertainment, there are options like GHMC Park, Swagath Grand, Carnival Club, Radhika Multiplex, etc and for the religious; there is the grand Narasimha Swamy Temple, Saibaba Temple, etc. And then there is Poulomi Hospital known for its world class medical care and treatment.Vasanthaa Happy Homes Nest is a romance which will add new dimension and meaning to your living lifestyle and fill you with tons of happy memories to fill a hundred albums of images. Go on and explore what you missed in your life all this while!When you invest in Vasanthaa Happy Homes Nest, you invest in lifelong happiness and security of a dream home that will fulfill a dream that you have nourished all your life.Step into Vasanthaa Happy Homes Nest for blissful living.

project_description: Sai Mitra Signature, is about 100 Metres from Neredmet police station. Set back comfortably from the main road.Our spacious 3 bedroom apartments offer the privacy of an independent house with all the features, security and conveniences of a modern apartment.
about_project_details: Sai Mitra Group has a lofty vision of constructing large residential complexes of Singaporean standards on strategic and exotic locales in Andhra Pradesh as well as elsewhere in India, with exclusive and unheard-of features. SMG has foolproof blueprints in place to materialize its VISION. The Group, ever since its inception, has been guided by the motto NEVER COMPROMISE ON QUALITY.We are committed to the realization of our clients highest aspirations by applying our knowledge, creativity, and integrity in a culture of healthy collaboration that makes us unique in the highly aggressive real estate industry. We provide the highest quality leading-edge service by the best-trained and highly skilled real estate and civil engineering professionals by making a positive difference in the real estate industry. To achieve our set goals, we utilize the most innovative and superior expertise and represent an all-encompassing knowledge of the realty process with the aid of hand-selected staff to fit our clients unique needs in order to maximize their value proposition. SMG has a firm conviction that theres much more to move into a new home than signing the required documents on the dotted line.

project_description: Overview: Vayun Meadows is a project located in Sainikpuri, Hyderabad by Anantha Infra offering thoughtfully designed 3 BHK luxurious apartments. The project is ready to move into and consist of 150 meticulously planned units spanned over 3 towers. Vayun Meadows price rate start at Rs. 35.5 Lac onward. Project Details:    Vayun Meadows, a ready for possession infrastructure by the well experienced Anantha Infra based in Sainikpuri, Hyderabad is offering skilfully crafted and thoughtfully designed 3 BHK luxurious apartments. Vayun Meadows plot area for its 3 BHK flat range from 1479 sq. ft. to 1781 sq. ft.Vayun Meadows are developed on strong foundation and designed with interior specifications like vitrified tiles flooring in all rooms and anti skid ceramic tiles in toilet, teak wood frame main door and hardwood frame internal doors, concealed wiring with branded modular switches and adequate electrical points, granite kitchen counter top with stainless steel sink, UPVC windows, good quality sanitary fittings and branded CP fixtures etc. Vayun Meadows Hyderabad provides state of the art amenities and facilities such as a club house with swimming pool, power supply with back up, lift, 24 hour security facilities, visitor parking, maintenance staff, banquet hall, gymnasium, children’s play area, library & business centre, rain water harvesting, and meditation area etc. among other for its residents. With all of these facilities and amenities provided by the project, the residents can truly enjoy a serene and elegant lifestyle. Highpoints: Vayun Meadows is offering spacious and value for money apartments designed with cross ventilation and the residents can enjoy abundant of natural light.  Vayun Meadows Hyderabad locality has good connectivity and has basic civic utilities like ECIL Cross Roads Bus Stop, Max Cloth Shop, Arc Orthopaedic Clinic, Axis Bank, Sai Baba Temple, and CAL Public School etc. are all part of the close vicinity from the project.

project_description: Whether you are looking for a resale flat or apartments at an affordable rent – Aparna Kanopy Tulip located in the beautiful locality of Kompally, Hyderabad is an ultimate option. This 14-acre residential township is one of the finest creation by Aparna Constructions and Estates Pvt Ltd. The society shelters 660 residential units spread among 12 towers. Measuring from 1265 sqft to 1570 sqft, these units are available with 2 & 3-bedroom configurations with the flat rates of Aparna Kanopy Tulip Kompally, Hyderabad priced starting from Rs. 44.0 Lac onwards. Project details All the homes are perfectly ready-to-move-in and are are armed with a basket full of modern amenities to offer a wholesome living experience. Everything right from flooring to interiors have been creatively designed to deliver a perfect home to the buyer. Bestowed with plenty of natural light and fresh air, all the well-ventilated residential apartments of Aparna Kanopy Tulip Kompally, Hyderabad are truly worth buying and dwelling as well. This gated community surrounded by lots of fresh greenery ensure a stress-free and peaceful living. Well-equipped with amenities like clubhouse, swimming pool, kid’s play area, gym, etc., this residential paradise is undoubtedly worth every penny of your investment. Hi-tech security, round the clock water supply and complete power backup facilities assure a smooth lifestyle. Highpoints Conveniently located in one of the serene and thriving residential area – Aparna Kanopy Tulip Kompally, Hyderabad is one of the preferred residential destination. Well-planned social infrastructures and IT companies is the major driving force to boost the real estate market in this area. Connectivity to public transport is an add-on benefit of this wonderful area. Situated amidst pollution-free environment, this project is an ideal place for your dream home. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Aparna Kanopy Tulip Kompally, Hyderabad.

Aditya Empress Tower flats price lie within the range of Rs. 90.0 Lac - 1.37 Cr.Project detailsAditya Empress Tower floor plan offers spacious and well-ventilated 3 BHK flats of various sizes ranging from 1575 sqft to 2385 sqft. This project offers you the best quality of construction and you will enjoy living happily in the lap of luxury. Italian marble flooring is done in all the flats which enhance the look even more.The project offers all the state-of-the-art amenities like- Health and fitness center, kids park, swimming pool, multi-level car parking, continuous water supply, power backup, three lifts and round the clock tight security.- Other facilities like library and business centre, fire fighting equipment, multipurpose hall, kids play area, library and business centre and so on are offered here.The location of the apartments in Aditya Empress Towers offers easy connectivity to Shopping Malls, Financial District, Entertainment centers, Hitech City,  International schools, IT Hub, Apollo Hospital and KBR Park.HighpointsTop class amenities like leisure room & library, air conditioned gym, helipad and two car parking bays for each apartment are the major attractions of this project. Also, prime location and excellent connectivity to the entire city makes this property popular in the city.Aditya Empress Towers reviews will assist you in understanding this project in a better way and to get a clear picture of this project you can also browse Aditya Empress Tower photos. This project is just for the chosen few so book your flat now and live luxurious life with the help of finest amenities.

The society offers 4BHK apartments in several carpet area choices. The flat rates of Hill County Township, Bachupally ranges between Rs. 81.5 Lac – Rs. 1.55 Cr.Project DetailsAppropriately situated, Hill County Township in Bachupally is one of the best residential projects by the developers. Flawlessly planned and executed apartments have enough access to the fresh breeze and natural light flowing across every corner. Spread across 85 acres of land, it offers numerous 4BHK flats in Hill County Township, Hyderabad with carpet area measuring from 2547 sqft, 2697 sqft, 3165 sqft, 3250 sqft to 4584 sqft. This impressive residential society is a true blessing for prospective home seekers as it offers end number of modern amenities like stringent security to ensure the safety of residents, intercom facility, DTH television and so on. The well-ventilated residential apartments of Hill County Township features vitrified ceramic tile flooring in living room & bedroom room, anti-skid ceramic tiles in toilet & kitchen area, main door has a teak wood panelled shutter with teakwood frame which is finished using melamine polish, fixtures and fittings used across are from premium quality brands. At Magicbricks, we present detailed information of this project i.e. Hill County Township Price, Hill County Township Floor Plan, Hill County Township Price, Unit Details and much more to help you in deciding your dream abode.So, enjoy a life with complete harmony at an unbeatable price, buy a flat in Hill County Township. project_description: OverviewDeveloped by Accurate Developers - Accurate Wind Chimes located in Narsingi, Hyderabad is the most awarded project in the entire Hyderabad as “Developer of the Year” and “Residential Property of the Year” for its best design and concept in gated community projects.About the projectDazzling Accurate Wind Chimes is a residential project with 2BHK, 2.5BHK and 3BHK apartments which are reasonably priced at Rs.44.7Lakhs to 75.0Lakhs. This chic project comprises of 8 airy towers consisting utterly 566 units.  Accurate Wind Chimes is open from all 4 sides and due to vehicle free podium the project is safe and secure for kids and aged. 70% open space is available with landscaping and lush greenery, 66% units are corner flats and 50% flats enjoy external boundless views. Also, Accurate Wind Chimes includes some of the admirable amenities like food court where you can spend fun-filled evenings with your loved ones, health club for the residents to keep themselves rejuvenated and relaxed, party hall where you can celebrate special occasions and many more.The project is located on the main road and in close proximity to ORR, IT & Financial District, Gachibowli, Hitech City and Madhapur. Social infrastructures such as schools, hospitals, Banks, ATM's, market, shopping malls and other daily needs are also close by which is an integrated benefit.HighpointsImmediacy and affordability are the two main key points of this project, as it just takes 6 to 20min drive to access all the facilities like Continental Hospital, Jubilee Hills, Banjara Hills, International Airport, Oakridge and DPS International Schools. Moreover this is a child focused project where children are nurtured to become title holder with specialized training in various activities within the gated community.To experience a sky-scraping quality of living in Accurate Wind Chimes, act expeditious and book a flat right now.

project_description: Grandeur City is the residential project by Building Blocks Group. It is located at Shadnagar in Hyderabad and is very close to the commercial hub of the city, Building Blocks This residential development has 2000 units in the form of plots with all the eco-friendly amenities like avenue plantation, drinking water connections and many other. It is designed according to perfect Vaastu systems, landscaped gardens and there is much more to be explored. This is a gated community with high tech security and also provides with swimming pool,play area,club house,tennis court,basketball court,&jogging track. There are temple and mosque within the community area. Residents also get free lifetime memberships at Building Blocks Group Clubs & Resorts.Shadnagar is a commercial space with neighborhood ofIT hub,source of hardware, pharma, industrial parks etc.Why should I buy?Compliance with Vastu, affordable prices and quality construction.Flexible housing option with all the amenities of the complex.Amphitheater, club house, temple and mosque located within the community along with green landscapes and plantation.Price range and unit details:The unit offers residential plots of 133 Square yards. The price varies according to the area and range starting fromRs. 3.3 Lacs to around 5 lacs.Nearby Information, Places of Interest, Landmarks:The Grandeur City is near Shamshabad International Airport, and the MMTS Station. It is 15-20 minutes to Hi-tech City and is surrounded by mega townships and huge housing projects like DLF, My Home, AP Housing Boardetc. Thus, Grandeur 4 Shadnagar, makes living a convenient affair. It has well developed infrastructure, including schools, hospitals, and a shopping mall close by.About the builder:Building Blocks is a plotting development company. It is formed by a group of seasoned professionals having a collective experience of over 3 decades in Real Estate Industry.Building Blocks believes in driving real estate opportunities, to the common Indian across various locations in the subcontinent.A team of energized professionals drive forward the company’s vision and mission with relentless passion and enthusiasm in various departments including Architecture, Legal, Engineering, Marketing and Sales.BBG Foundation is a close-to-heart initiative of Building Blocks Group, which enables social empowerment for supporting the society.Other projects by the builder:Majority of their projects are in and around Shadnagar, Ongole, and Nellore. Thesuccessful projects undertaken by Building Blocks Groups include Kohinoor Central, Kohinoor Landmark, Kohinoor Citi, Kohinoor Gold, Indigold, Global Green, Kohinoor Nellore Central, Kohinoor Ongole Central and many more such plot development projects. Nearby projects:There are several ongoing projects in the area including DLF, My Home, AP Housing Board, and many more.

project_description: Overview:Golden Planet, Shadnagar – Hyderabad is a new project that offers residential plots for those looking to invest in property and wish to build their home the way they want it. This project has beautiful surroundings along with the guarantee of future returns, should you wish to sell the property. This project is the best place to invest as the city is fast developing and you can be sure to get all the specifications that you need. Project Details:The plots in Golden Planet come in different sizes to suit your needs and requirement. The plots are priced moderately between 4.2 Lac and 6.6 Lac and the project is still under construction. The project has boundary walls constructed around it for security of the residents. The layout of Golden Planet ensures that you have the privacy you deserve and your family gets the feel of living in a community. The residential plots span over an area between 147 sqyrd and 200 sqyrd and has many amenities that are sure to elevate your standard of living and give you a comfortable life.- Grand entrance arch that is elevated for a better view, drainage system, underground sewerage, rainwater harvesting, avenue plantation, kids play area, black top road, etc. are some of the features that are available here.The reviews of Golden Planet tell us that the layout of this project is perfect and the homes here will be well ventilated and bright with natural daylight. The beautiful surroundings add to the aesthetic appeal of the project. Highpoints:The project is centrally located in close proximity to the proposed 80 inch road that has ample lighting and the international airport is nearby to the project. The plots offer a freehold ownership to the buyer and have all basic conveniences like schools and hospitals in the vicinity.The updated Golden Planet photos will give you more details. So, go and get your plot today.

Rajiv Gandhi International Airport is hardly an hour drive from this residential area. ATMs are available at the walking distance from this place. You can visit CSK Green Villas location for checking the place and seeking more information.

project_description: OverviewAditya Royal Palm by Sri Aditya Homes Pvt Ltd, Shaikpet, Hyderabad is a brilliantly crafted residential project. It comprises of 63 units of luxurious 4 BHK Villa configurations. Aditya Royal Palm prices begin from 5.20 Cr onwards.Project DetailsThe Villas in Aditya Royal Palm range between the sizes 5460 sq ft to 5095 sq ft. Experience the most luxury abodes amidst serene atmosphere which will blow your mind. The exteriors are finished with the combination of wall putty and elegant textured patterns. The interiors are finished with appealing plastic emulsion paints.Aditya Royal Palm floor plans feature wood framed doors along with shutters, UPVC Sliding windows along with mosquito net, concealed copper wiring and granite countertop. The bathrooms are skillfully finished with acid resistant ceramic tiles and equipped with chrome plated branded CP fittings. The wooden flooring is done in the master bedrooms, and the rest of the area is finished with vitrified tiles.-          Outdoor tennis court, conference room, meditation area, event space, amphitheater, arts and crafts studio, canopy walk, concierge services, recreational pool and multipurpose courts are some of the latest amenities that are provided.-          The basic facilities such as piped gas connection, maintenance staff, water storage, flower garden, intercom facility, parking space, lift, security and power backup are also provided.Highpoints The ultra modern amenities provided by this society are barbeque pit, dance studio, club house, outdoor tennis court, cycling track, jogging track, swimming pool, indoor games room, gym, kids club, aerobics room, kids play area and much more.Apollo Hospital and Delhi Public School are located within the range of 4 to 6kms radius. Jubili Hills is located at a distance 3kms from this project premises. Browse through the Aditya Royal Palm photos to get a clear idea about this society. This fantastic opportunity is indeed worth grabbing.
about_project_details: Established with an aim to make a difference in the real estate world, the Sri Aditya homes was founded by the Mr. V. Kota Reddy in the year 1991 in Hyderabad. Under the guidance of the founder the company has not only offered finest quality houses but has also learnt the concept of client satisfaction. He professionals who are connected to this group work hard to deliver quality, unique designs and luxurious spaces. The projects constructed the group are a blend of refined taste and excellence and that is why these projects always stand out from rest of the projects constructed in the similar location. Offering ready to move flats from the price range of 57 lacks, the group has constructed 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK apartments that falls in the size range of 1238 sq.ft. to 5500 sq.ft. Today, the company is a known name because of the transparency and honesty that the company has shown at the time of dealing with its esteemed customers. The company also keeps on updating the technology, designs and infrastructure as per the latest in the market. The luxurious projects offered by the Sri Aditya Group are Sri Aditya Wiiz Lagoon- Hyderabad, Aditya Sunshine- Hyderabad, Sri Aditya Hill Top- Hyderabad, Sri Aditya Pride- Hyderabad, Sri Aditya Nest- Hyderabad etc.

A community of 107 stylish luxury villas, Infiniti Homes is nestled within a plush community, surrounded by emerald green fairways and offers some of the finest amenities. with add on comforts like pools, Jacuzzis and gardens.Each Villa is conceived to exist in perfect harmony within natural surroundings. With an American- Inspired layout creating a seamless marriage between indoor and outdoor living environments, all the while maintaining complete privacy through dramatic and classy landscaping. project_description: Happy Home has launched Bandas Signature Towers, located at Padmarao Nagar, Near Taranaka in Hyderabad. This real estate property offers well-designed 2 and 3 BHK apartments for sale. The project is currently under construction. The size of the apartments ranges from 1,225 sqft to 1,725 sqft.The buyers can enjoy amenities such as a car parking space, a gymnasium, a club house, an intercom facility, a 24x7 security system and an elevator. Padmarao Nagar is well-connected to all parts of Hyderabad via a network of roads and railways. There are a number of reputed educational institutions, hospitals, bank branches, shopping malls etc. in the locality.

Built on over 25 years of reputation, Vasanthaa Architect and Engineers is a highly respectable builder of quality homes and apartments. Founded by professionals with wealth of experience and expertise in the real estate and construction fields, the company has grown over the years with their creative ideas and solutions that make living in a home a pleasure for life.
At Vasanthaa, we believe that home is the most intimate space for its owner. And accordingly, we ensure that every part of the home reflects every aspiration of a familys lifestyle and personality. Apart from building beautiful landmarks, we also specialize in constructing customized spaces that meet your family’s unique needs. Right from the layout to the end process of construction, we ensure that every space is a liveable delight.
With an efficient team of professionals led by A Srinivasa Reddy, an experienced builder with an impeccable reputation of being a meticulous person firmly committed to quality in all ways, the company takes pride in building ventures that stand testimony to Vasanthaas aesthetic designing and quality construction capabilities.
Vasanthaa also offers a full array of architectural and interior design services that reflect the vision and goals of clients. Working with them, we thoroughly understand their functional needs, concerns, and the long-term impact of the same and accordingly fine-tune our services. Always breaking new ground, our approach is to work as a catalyst for our clients aspirations and dreams.
Today, the company is widely respected for its accomplishments, integrity and vision. As a people-oriented company, sensitive to the needs and concerns of its clients, Vasanthaa Architect and Engineers aims to continue to set the standard for excellence in the real estate community.

project_description: “Muppa’s Indraprastha is a premium luxury Life Style community with 300 exquisitely designed 4 BHK villas (under construction) in Tellapur–Osman nagar–Gachibowli belt with greater traction for villa projects. The location is in close proximity to Outer Ring Road and is best connected to Gachibowli and International Airport.The project is strategically located between ORR and main road connecting Tellapur to Wipro junction and is in close proximity to fast developing Financial District of Hyderabad. This zone is destined to be the new Tech-hub of Hyderabad. Existing road connecting these areas running parallel to the ring road is being widened to 120 feet road. The existing road network is likely to receive further thrust due to upcoming Technocity at Tellapur. The area is poised to get maximum development attention due to ITIR initiative by state and central Governments”.

project_description: Sancia Homes is a project by Radhey Constructions India Pvt. Ltd. This project is offering lavishly crafted 3BHK residential villas. Sancia Homes are currently under construction and will consist of 135 units. The price range of Sancia Homes Villas starts from Rs. 1.75 Cr. to 2.0 Cr.Project DetailsSancia Homes, an extravagantly spacious and ventilated residential project by Radhey Constructions India Pvt. Ltd. located in Tellapur, Hyderabad is providing elegant 3BHK villas. Plot areas for Sancia Homes Villas range from 3333 sqft to 3399 sqft. The classy elegance of the villas make them stand apart from the crowd. Be it the bedrooms, kitchen or beautiful backyard all have been precisely detailed with modern designs keeping in mind the vaastu practices. The construction structure is RCC framed with table moulded bricks in cement mortar. Main doors are made of teak wood with top quality hardware. All the villa floorings have been done with double charge vitrified tiles, bathrooms having best class acid and skid resistance ceramic tiles and staircase with granite flooring. Thick double coat smooth plaster with double coat of emulsion paint have been done inside outside the villa.Sancia Homes’ property provides amenities like power supply with backup, gymnasium, 24 hour surveillance security system, Park and kids play area, reserved parking, Maintenance staff, Fire Fighting, solar fencing throughout the boundry and rainwater harvesting system.High PointsSancia Homes are providing internet connectivity separately in every villa as well as cable TV provisions for more than 1 rooms. Cycling and jogging track and club house with visitors parking are included in basic facilities. The project is designed in a way that it meets with the lavish lifestyle of the occupants. Sancia Homes are near to public transport and basic necessities like grocery stores and pharmacies.
about_project_details: Our company strategy is to provide hundred percent satisfaction to our residents by providing undivided attention and fixing all the possible problems. Radhey Constructions has always tied up with reliable vendors, thereby ensuring that the work done is up to the mark and nothing less than what is expected. As a company, we offer quality living spaces for you to revel in a beautiful life, without compromise or worries. Sancia villas are the right choice for your home as we not only build the home for you, we create memories that last a lifetime.

project_description: Overview Boasting 249 luxurious villas, Visions Urjith by Vision Avenues Private Ltd., is a judiciously planned society located in Tellapur, Hyderabad. The project is spread across whopping 40-acres and the villas are offered with 3 and 4 BHK configurations. Visions Urjith villas are priced within the exclusive range of Rs. 1.82 Cr - 3.26 Cr. Visions Urjith photos can be browsed to get a rich visual about the villas. About the project Highly appreciated with good reviews, Visions Urjith 3 BHK villas measuring from 2800 sqft to 2860 sqft are priced within Rs. 1.83 Cr - 1.86 Cr.  Spread across 3505 sqft 4570 sqft, thw 3 BHK villas cost within the bracket of Rs. 2.29 Cr -  Rs. 2.95 Cr. Well-placed in one of the most vibrant areas of Tellapur, Hyderabad, this residential society promise you a jubilant lifestyle. Moreover, every villa of this society is complemented with a lavish pool and is also provided with internal elevators. Taking luxury to a whole new level, the gorgeous villas of Visions Urjith with smart floor plans are truly worth buying for families seeking a stress-free and plush lifestyle. Vibrant interiors, fancy flooring and lavish bathrooms are some of the exclusive features of these villas. The enchanting views from the splendid balconies is simply incredible. Clubhouse, gymnasium, swimming pool, mediation area, indoor games room, outdoor tennis court and many more other high end amenities make this society more delightful. Highpoints 100 percentage vaastu complaint villas with private pool and internal elevators are the prime attributes of this project. Great public transport connectivity and good proximity to Financial District & Wipro SEZ is an added advantage. Manthan International School is close by and the upcoming 100-acre Tishman Speyer SEZ will definitely add value to this project. Book a flat now in Visions Urjith Tellapur, Hyderabad and experience a beautiful life with your endearing family

project_description: Harithavanam Yadagirigutta situated on NH-202, Hyderabad, Warangal 6 Track Highway very near to Yadagirigutta and with a short offset, where your dream destination is located very near to AIMS and CCMB.Yadagirigutta a temple city and renowned spiritual pilgrimage & tourism centre. 2000 acres in and around Yadagirigutta earmarked for Abhayaaranyam, Deerpark, Veda Patashala. Ropeway is also planned. Shopping complexes, hotels, cottages, kalyana mantapams, golden dwajastambhams are the part of developments. Like Tirupathi, Yadagirigutta is planned to be made autonomous body
about_project_details: We are one of largest diversified real estate services company with about two decades of experience in different services related to property, development, construction, maintenance, legal, and financial services. It has one of the best teams of real estate development professionals working on its varied projects. It has already completed more than 30 projects.The moment you step into Haritha Vanam, you are transported to a different realm. The 1000-acre fenced and guarded community oozes comfort. A wide smooth road, flawless concrete, pockets of shrubs, greenery against pristine blue canvas makes you feel a privileged resident. Tranquility is all pervading as modern designs duet with open spaces of parks and play grounds.Every facility is carefully orchestrated to evoke happiness in you. Avenue plantation, jogging, walking tracks, Old-age homes, clubhouse, underground cabling, ornamental street lighting, make this smartly designed community a fairy tale setting. Thoughtfully designed spaces along with futuristic facilities make it a lifestyle so wholesome whichever way you see.Your dreams are about to unfold. It is a complete world that offers every comfort and facility you dreamt of. It is a lifestyle that gives you a life and style, every global citizen can be proud of. It is where every dream turns realistic, every passion is fulfilled and every day a joy. And everything is within your reach. Lets raise the curtains on our dream project- Haritha Vanam With every conceivable facility built around you, you will agree, life was never so complete before.
project_highlights:
Highlights


Located on Hyderabad to Warangal NH - 163 by 202 Highway facing LayoutNearby Sri Laxmi Narasimha Swamy Temple, YadagiriguttaNearby proposed Bhonagiri - Hyderabad MMTSNearby World famous Jain Temple, KolanupakaProposed Engineering SEZ at Bhonagiri allotted 105 Hectares (Undertaking by Deccan Infrastructures IT Park)Proposed HMDA Township at BhonagiriProposed Industrial Area in 2000 Acers.Near to AIMS Medical University and HospitalNear to Singapore Township and Raheja IT Park(Mind Space)Close to ITIRProposed CCMB (Govt. of India)Nearby Aleru Railway Station and Bus Stand35 mins. drive from Uppal Ring Road on 8 Track Road20 mins. drive from Outer Ring Road

about_project_details: Founded by Late Sri .K. Ramakrishnaiah, this group was established 25 years ago. Gradually, the group became a known name in real estate world by carving a unique niche through offering several projects in Sainikpuri zone of Secunderabad. The company has already built around 2.5 millions sq.ft. and is now aiming at constructing large and luxuries gated communities in the prime areas of the above two cities in order to meet the lifestyle of both middle class and upper middle class customers. Offering affordable housing, the group features houses starting from 25 lacks. The group offers 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK luxurious houses that falls in the size range of 940 sq.ft. to 1900 sq.ft. Keeping the affordability of middle class people in mind, the G.K Group offer high quality houses with good amenities and all the basic needs. The group has also collaborated with DHFLVC and have planned to build 1.5 sq.ft. together with DHFLVC. The best lavish projects offered by G.K Developers are GKs pride- Secunderabad, GKs Habitat Royale- Secunderabad, GK Divya Heights- Pune, GK Krishnan Flats- Chennai West, GK Subhodaya- Hyderabad, GK Bella Vista- Secunderabad etc.

project_description: OverviewGK Pride in Yapral, Hyderabad is an ongoing residential development by the well-known GK Developers. This project features 250 units of 3BHK & 4BHK residential apartments set across 3 towers. These flats in GK Pride are presented in varying size and are available at prices ranging between Rs. 52.5 Lac to Rs. 83.9 Lac.Project Details Buying your own home in Hyderabad is a dream many wishes to fulfil, GK Developers has come up with a beautifully planned residential project - GK Pride in Yapral that offers luxurious comfort to its residents to boost their standard of living. Apartments in GK Pride are a perfect combination of modern amenities and incredible interiors. The project presents 3 BHK Flat available in 1685 sqft, 1875 sqft, 1890 sqft, 2310 sqft & 2612 sqft choices and 4 BHK Flat with 2768 sqft carpet area.With these options, prospective home seekers can invest in a property that suits their requirement and budget. These flats feature vitrified flooring across the rooms, anti-skid tiles in kitchen and in toilet flooring is done with ceramic non-slippery & acid resistant tile. The main door of the flat is made up of the teak wood frame with Masonite skin moulded door shutter, all the fixtures and fittings used in the project are from trusted brands to ensure a higher standard of living. Also, all flats in GK Pride, Hyderabad are Vaastu compliant, well-ventilated and spacious residential units ensuring plenty of natural light and fresh air inside.Apart from interiors, project also offers world-class amenities to its residents i.e. Club House, Cafeteria/Food Court, Swimming Pool, Jogging & Strolling Track, Intercom Facility, Security, Bank & ATM, Indoor Games Room, Gymnasium, Multipurpose Courts, Event Space & Amphitheatre and Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts that further raise the luxury quotient. You can browse Magicbricks to know more about the project i.e. GK Pride Photos, GK Pride Floor Plan, GK Pride Unit Details, GK Pride Price and so on online anytime and from anywhere in just a few clicks..

about_project_details: Sri Sri Constructions is promoted by a visionary group of highly experienced real estate builders who has 20 years of experience in the field. If you desire a beautiful home that accommodates your imagination at a affordable budget, choose Sri Sri Constructions.Sri Sri is one of the leading builders in Hyderabad an is well known for quality construction, reliability and commitment. With a proven track record of developing housing projects with comfortable facilities and modern amenities and other infrastructural support at affordable prices.Sri Sri has so far completed more than 20 prestigious ventures successfully in Hyderabad like Sri sri Homes, Sri sri Avenue, Sri sri Anthahpuram, Sri sri Arundhathi, Sri sri Heaven Etc.. Creating eco-friendly amnbience that nutures and sustains happy living is the hall mark of sri sri.

project_description: OverviewDesigned on sprawling acres of prime land in Hyderabad, Aerospace County Phase 2, Adibatla is a residential project by the renowned Green City Dukes Estates. The project comprises of 700 units of housing plots that are available for sale at a reasonable price range. Thoughtfully situated, these uptown spaces are a perfect fit to reside.Project DetailsCoupled with a breath-taking view and relaxed surroundings, Aerospace County Phase 2 in Adibatla presents residential lands that are well equipped with all basic amenities to promote the modern lifestyle. If you are planning to build your own dream home in this beautiful city, then you would be delighted to know that Aerospace County Phase 2 offers a myriad of plots in varied carpet area choices i.e. 120 Sq-yrd, 130 Sq-yrd, 150 Sq-yrd, 160 Sq-yrd, 180 Sq-yrd, 190 Sq-yrd, 200 Sq-yrd, 210 Sq-yrd, 240 Sq-yrd, 250 Sq-yrd, 267 Sq-yrd and 300 Sq-yrd. So, now you can opt the one that suits your family requirement and build your abode in an amazing location. Experience the paradise in every moment that you spend here, the price list of the residential plots in Aerospace County Phase 2 is quite reasonable to every budget buyer. All these plots are adhering to Vaastu principles spreading positive vibes all around. It is a luxurious residential project that is a matchless gateway to harmony and pleasure. The project features is a finest residential property located cleverly in Adibatla, Hyderabad housing state-of-the-art residential plots for prospective home buyers and property investors Furthermore, to boost your lifestyle, Aerospace County Phase 2 offers urban facilities like Swimming Pool, Security, Banquet Hall, Kids Play Area, Rain Water Harvesting and a lot more.Highpoints:This superior residential project is nestled in the key location of Adibatla, Hyderabad providing seamless access to everything you would need for comfortable living. What makes Aerospace County Phase 2 popular is the location. It is surrounded by 20 Housing Projects and BDL Township, it is just 5 minutes’ drive from ORR, it is well connected to Bhanur, Shankerpally, Mokila, Kollur & Velimela. Schools like Global International School and Indus International School lies nearby to the location.

The residents can customise the plots to build their own dream abode in this project. If you need more information on this project and would like to purchase a plot, then contact us today.

project_description: OverviewCasa Pride - strategically located in Adibatla, Hyderabad is a residential project by Land space Developers. Occupying 13 acres of land, this gated community project offers 178 spacious Villa Plots. Casa Pride price list of these ready-to-move-in villa plots ranges from Rs. 19.2 Lac to 41.4 Lac.About the projectCasa Pride offers residential plots so that you can construct your dream house as per your taste. These legally approved residential plots are all set to make sure the best living experience ever. The residential plots are available in various area sizes ranging from 167sq.yrd to 360sq.yrd.Necessary facilities such as an entrance arch, proper street lights, round the clock electricity and underground water supply, blacktop roads, compound wall, rainwater pits and underground drainage system are all available.This gated community project that promotes a sense of community living along with highest level of privacy. The lush green surroundings around these residential plots offer a beautiful view. If you are looking for a peaceful life, then without any doubt you can buy one of the residential plots in Casa Pride.HighpointsCasa Pride is situated in one of the prime addresses of Hyderabad, which is preferred by most of the potential buyers. The address of Casa Pride is well connected to other parts of the city through wide roads. It is very easy to commute from the address of this project due to its strategic location. Some of the restaurants, hospitals, banks etc., are hardly few kilometers away. The property is situated in close proximity to Outer Ring Road, Indo UK Multispecialty Hospital, Fabcity, TATA Aero park, TCS Adibatla, Wonderla, Shamshabad Airport and Tourism Eco Park.For further details, you can go through the updated Casa Pride photos, reviews and brochure. Without any delay, book a plot of your choice now in this magnificent project.

project_description: Quadri Happy Homes Paradise is definitely away from the noise and commotion of the world, but its not away from life and its different expressions. Everything that you should be having around the corner, is at a short distance from your home. From shopping, educational institutes, healthcare, groceries, travel, everything is so close.Your expressions are all about what you are. They are a reflection of your inner self. They are influenced by your tastes, by your feelings towards something. They convey how you think. They mirror your likes, your choices, and your imagination. They distinguish you from the world you belong to, and set you apart. So if you want your life to be different, give it an expression that stands out.Make your way to Quadri Happy Homes Paradise. Itll bring you many reasons to express yourself in. Come, make it your home.

Built on over 25 years of reputation, Vasanthaa Architect and Engineers is a highly respectable builder of quality homes and apartments. Founded by professionals with wealth of experience and expertise in the real estate and construction fields, the company has grown over the years with their creative ideas and solutions that make living in a home a pleasure for life.
At Vasanthaa, we believe that home is the most intimate space for its owner. And accordingly, we ensure that every part of the home reflects every aspiration of a familys lifestyle and personality. Apart from building beautiful landmarks, we also specialize in constructing customized spaces that meet your family’s unique needs. Right from the layout to the end process of construction, we ensure that every space is a liveable delight.
With an efficient team of professionals led by A Srinivasa Reddy, an experienced builder with an impeccable reputation of being a meticulous person firmly committed to quality in all ways, the company takes pride in building ventures that stand testimony to Vasanthaas aesthetic designing and quality construction capabilities.
Vasanthaa also offers a full array of architectural and interior design services that reflect the vision and goals of clients. Working with them, we thoroughly understand their functional needs, concerns, and the long-term impact of the same and accordingly fine-tune our services. Always breaking new ground, our approach is to work as a catalyst for our clients aspirations and dreams.
Today, the company is widely respected for its accomplishments, integrity and vision. As a people-oriented company, sensitive to the needs and concerns of its clients, Vasanthaa Architect and Engineers aims to continue to set the standard for excellence in the real estate community.

project_description: Lunaar Green City is a project by the quite experienced Divyasri Realters located in the happening area of Adibatla, Hyderabad offering spacious and meticulously designed residential plots. The project is ongoing construction and will develop 300 units. Lunaar Green City price rate starts at Rs. 17.2 Lac onward. Project Details:Lunaar Green City, a residential project is located in the prime area of Adibatla, Hyderabad by the well reputed Divyasri Realters is offering customisable and meticulously designed residential plots. Lunaar Green City plot areas for its residential space range from 200 sq. yard to 361 sq. yard.Lunaar Green City Hyderabad plots are customisable to certain extent and the residents can build their own dream houses. The plot is based on a strong foundation and a well planned layout. The project will be available with modern day amenities and facilities for the residents to truly experience a lavish and exquisite way of living.Lunaar Green City features numerous world class amenities and facilities for its occupants such as a club house, power supply with back up, water supply, swimming pool, 24 hour security facilities, park, reserved parking space with visitor parking, maintenance staff, indoor games room, kids club, flower gardens, piped gas, rain water harvesting, water storage, conference room and every plot is vaastu compliant etc. among many more.Highpoints: Lunaar Green City is offering customisable and spaciously designed residential plots in the prime and happening locality of Adibatla, Hyderabad. Lunaar Green City Hyderabad locality is easily connected to the rest of the surrounding areas and includes various basic civic utilities like Adithya Nagar Bus Stop, Apollo First Aid, SBI ATM, Hanuman Kirana Store, J&J Food Court, Wonderla, and ESSAR Petrol Pump etc. including several others lie in the close vicinity for the resident’s needs.

project_description: Overview: Fort View Towers Attapur is located at a good location between Lungar Houz and Attapur. It is a luxurious gated community. Fort View Towers apartments are under construction and consist of 200 Units and 2 Towers. Project Details: Fort View Towers Attapur has a wide range of flats for buyers, it offers 2 BHK Flats ranging from 1000 sq ft to 1175 sqft. It also offers 3 BHK Flats in the range of 1230 sqft, 1430 sqft, 1635 sqft. Fort View Towers price range of  2 BHK is Rs. 35.0 Lac. Rs.41.3 Lac. The price range of 3 BHK is Rs. 43.0 Lac. Rs. 57.2 Lac. Fort View Towers amenities includes Club House, Jogging and Strolling Track, Power Back Up, Swimming Pool, Lift, Security, Banquet Hall, Gymnasium.Fort View Towers flats have the best specifications in the industry like vitrified tiles in all rooms and anti skid tiles in toilet. Doors are provided with teak wood frame. Concealed copper wiring, and in kitchen with granite platform with stainless steel sink. UPVC windows and in toilets with  GI , CPVC , PPR Pipes. In the exterior walls have Asian Paint. Luppam Finish with Emulsion Paint in the interior walls and much more.Fort View Towers apartments are a highly preferred destination within your budget. The towers have elevators. Fort View Towers pictures in magicbricks website depict the best standard of living for a family.Highpoints: Fort View Towers location undoubtedly is a reputed address in the city with its easy access from all the important points. Amenities like Laxmi Nagar Bus Stop, and the reputed Glendale Academy International is very close proximity. Majestic Hospital, Growth Academy, Metro train, Spencers Hyper Store grocery stores, New Green Bawarchi all can be reached within ten minutes. The Hi-Tech city is within 12 kms from it. It is a dream come true for home buyers.
about_project_details: Fort View Towers is the latest and a prestigious project being developed and Promoted by RNR Developers. It has a team of highly motivated and dedicated professionals and some of the most experienced civil engineers led by its Managing Partner Sri A. Gopal Reddy. He brings to the table,30 years of rich experience in developing large residential townships and villa projects. The company believes in following ethical practices in the business and gives utmost importance to customer delight.

project_description: Overview: Pottapus Himasai Srinidhim is a project by Himagiri Builders And Developers Pvt. Ltd. located in Attapur, Hyderabad offering thoughtfully designed and spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is currently under construction and consists of 180 well planned units spanned over 2 towers. Pottapus Himasai Srinidhim price rate starts from Rs. 38.8 Lac onward. Project Details:Pottapus Himasai Srinidhim, a residential project by Himagiri Builders And Developers Pvt. Ltd., based in Attapur, Hyderabad is offering luxurious thoughtfully designed and spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Pottapus Himasai Srinidhim plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1078 sq. ft. to 1204 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1299 sq. ft. to 1763 sq. ft.Pottapus Himasai Srinidhim apartments are luxuriously designed with interiors like RCC frame earthquake resistant structure vitrified tiles flooring in every room, teak wood frame door, concealed wiring with branded modular switches, concealed plumbing with branded CP fittings, and modular kitchen with high quality fittings and granite platform etc.Pottapus Himasai Srinidhim features several amenities for its residents like a large club house, jogging & strolling track, power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security facilities, park, reserved parking, intercom facility, banquet hall, gymnasium, indoor games room, children’s play area, indoor squash & badminton courts, vaastu compliant, and fire fighting equipment etc. to name a few. Highpoints:Pottapus Himasai Srinidhim is a top quality residential project offering lavish and high standard infrastructure to the people of Attapur, Hyderabad. It is near several major software companies and the International Airport. The developers have got an open and green outlook in this project. Pottapus Himasai Srinidhim locality has various basic civic utilities like Laxmi Nagar Bus Stop, Glendale Academy International School, Triveni Hospital, Syndicate Bank ATM, and Eeshwar Theatre etc.

project_description: Overview: Praveens Luxuria is a currently ongoing luxurious residential project located in Beeramguda, Hyderabad by APR Projects and offering well crafted and lavish 3 BHK and 4 BHK villas. It consists of 548 units spread over 37 acres of prime land. Praveens Luxuria price rate starts from Rs. 55.4 Lac onward.Project Details:Praveens Luxuria is currently under construction and offering well planned and lavishly designed 3 BHK and 4 BHK villas by the quite experienced in the real estate market, APR Projects in the prime location of Beeramguda, Hyderabad. Praveens Luxuria plot areas for its 3 BHK villas range from 1505 sq. ft. to 2516 sq. ft. and 4 BHK villas area range approx. 2625 sq. ft.Praveens Luxuria villas are designed with vitrified tiles flooring in all rooms, anti skid tiles flooring in toilet, teak wood frame doors with good quality fittings, granite kitchen platform with stainless steel sink, concealed copper wiring with PVC conduits, and branded electrical fittings, etc.Praveens Luxuria has world class amenities for its occupants like Wi-Fi enabled club house, intercom facility, coffee lounge, jogging & strolling track, power back up, swimming pool, banquet hall, gymnasium, children’s play area, aerobics room, library, indoor squash & badminton courts, meditation area, solar energy, CCTV camera surveillance and fire fighting equipment etc. among many others.Highpoints:Praveens Luxuria is a project by APR Projects developed and consulted by well reputed architects from all around the world. It is well located by closely connected roads surrounded with IT hubs and many institutes. Praveens Luxuria is a well developed social infrastructure equipped with modern amenities. Various basic civic utilities like Patancheru Market Road Bus Stop, Goutham Pretty Kids, E.S.I. Dispensary, Patancheru Railway Station, Axis Bank ATM, Tawakkal Chicken Market, Venkateswara Theatre, and Vedika Function Hall etc. are all part of the close vicinity.

project_description: Bandari Blossoms Ghatkesar is a project by Laxmi Infratech located skilfully in Ghatksar in Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh. It is a premium project offering 2 BHK apartments and 3 BHK apartments, 2 BHK apartments area is 1000 sqft and its price is â?¹24.0 Lacs and 3 BHK apartment area is 1290 sqft and price is â?¹30.9 Lacs.    Project Details:Bandari Blossoms Ghatkesar by Laxmi Infratech is located in Ghatkesar in Hyderabad, AP. It is offering elegantly designed 2 BHK apartments, 3BHK apartments, and the price for 2 BHK apartments is Rs 24 lacs and for 3 BHK apartments is Rs 30.9 lacs. The project is spread out over 140 units in 2 Towers. Bandari Blossoms  is designed with all the details in mind and has certain specifications like RCC framed structure, vitrified tiles flooring, concealed insulated copper wiring, modular switches and sufficient electrical points, thick granite kitchen counter top, branded sanitary ware and CP fittings, etc. for every unit. Bandari Blossoms has the best features for its occupants like as Club house, Tennis courts, 24/7 power supply with back up, 24 hour security facilities, banquet hall, children’s play area, aerobics room, meditation, car parking space, gated community with CCTV camera surveillance etc. among many more.Highpoints:Bandari Blossoms has all the best amenities one can hope for nearby like it is located near the Infosys IT Campus and the famous IT hub Raheja IT Park. The Sri Vidyaniketan, Kendriya Vidyalaya schools are very close as well. Entertainment is also full-on here with Asian Cine Multiplex and Inorbit Mail here. project_description: NCC Urban Gardenia is an ultra-premium residential community set on 4-acres of lushness across two elegantly planned blocks, each with two high rises. Home to top-notch exclusive 4 BHK Spacious Apartments and 5 BHK duplex apartments, the community nestles 184 neighborhoods in all. Each 4 BHK apartment stretches to a magnanimous 3347 sft of space, while the 5 BHK duplex home is an expanse that measures a massive 4152 sft. The best is, each of these face East, West and North with all homes designed 100% as per the tenets of Vaastu.The club at Gardenia is one of the most complete of its kind and includes a, Terrace pool at the clubhouse and other at the community, Indoor games like Billiards and Table Tennis and much more. Other pampering facilities include landscaped walk-ways, gymnasium, yoga room, as well as outdoor children's play areas.
about_project_details: NCC Urban Infrastructure Ltd. is a Subsidiary of NCC Limited and comes Equipped With a world class building techniques and state-of-the-art building infrastructure that is expertly commandeered by top-notch professionals.NCC Urban Infrastructure's quality operations span across Residential and commercial complexes, townships, SEZs and serviced apartment complexes. The company has an impressive pan India presence across Bangalore, Hyderabad, Kochi, Vizag, Guntur, Ranchi and Dubai. Strict adherence to superior standards on time deliveries and transparent documentation has made preferred destination for individuals who are looking for quality living at affordable prices.NCC Urban has inherited its experience and expertise from NCC Limited. Known for its excellence in the execution of Turn key projects, Industrial Buildings, Multistoried, Commercial structures,Townships, Roads, Bridges, Pipelines etc. and rated as growing Infrastructure Company in India with annual turn over nearly Rs. 6,200 crores.NCC Urban is developing the prestigious National Games Housing Complex Project in Ranchi, Jharkhand. The Company has also acquired lands in and around Bangalore, Chennai, Goa, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Kakinada, Lucknow, Raipur and Vizag for its Real Estate projects. NCC Urban is all set to deliver 12.8 million sft. of built up area spread over 286 acres in the next three years.

project_description: OverviewVSR Constructions & Property Developers Pvt Ltd has launched VSR Celestial Towers that is innovatively designed by fine architects. This project shelters 198 units spread across 3 elegant towers. The price list of VSR Celestial Towers ranges within Rs. 30.0 Lac - 44.0 Lac.Project detailsLocated in Gajularamaram, Hyderabad, the floor plan of VSR Celestial Towers offers 2BHK and 3BHK flats that are spanning over 1079 sqft to 2076 sqft. The 2BHK flats are  spread across 1079 sqft to 1296 sqft whereas 3BHK flats are available within 1574 sqft to 2076 sqft. These ready to move, freehold flats are blessed with excellent cross ventilation and bright light. VSR Celestial Towers flats are adroitly designed with gorgeous wood work and excellent feature. However, they are vaastu compliant that is a key feature to be considered for living as it enables a peaceful aura. VSR Celestial Towers photos give you a clearer insight regarding this project.Reviews of VSR Celestial Towers are available on the website and are highly affirmative. VSR Constructions & Property Developers Pvt Ltd follow 3 main principles i.e. clearness, justness, and reliability. They offer you with a right environment to live in and are blessed wiht superlative amenities. Few of them are listed below:  Power back up, lift, rainwater harvesting, fire fighting equipment and water storage are essential facilities offered. Clubhouse, kids play area and gymnasium are few recreational facilities offered.HighpointsEncircled with vibrant green environment, VSR Celestial Towers is surrounded with various facilities like Jeedimetla Bus Depot, inno vibe engineering solutions,  Siddartha High School, H-Mart, Malla Reddy Narayana Multispeciality Hospital, bank of Maharashtra, Apollo Pharmacy, MRCB Restaurant and HP Petrol Bunk.Hurry up and book now in VSR Celestial Towers, Gajularamaram, Hyderabad.
