project_description: OverviewDriven with a purpose to deliver an extravagant lifestyle, Manjeera Retail Holdings presents Manjeera Diamond Towers located in Gachibowli, Hyderabad. The project offers 1020 ready-to-move-in apartments spread across 12 towers which can be either purchased or rented. This project offers 2BHK & 3BHK Flats measuring between 777 sqft to 1779 sqft. The flat rates of Manjeera Diamond Towers Gachibowli, Hyderabad are priced between Rs. 60.0 Lacs - 70.0 Lacs. About the ProjectThe 2BHK Flats of this society are available with area size ranging between 777-1234 sqft while the 3BHK Flats measure 1247 sqft to 1779 sqft. Constructed as per modern standards, these residential units are a perfect blend of luxury & urban living. Situated away from all the nuisances of city life, this peaceful residential society is an ideal place to live with your family.Groomed with fresh ambiance, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Manjeera Diamond Towers Gachibowli, Hyderabad welcome you to breathe a new life. Incorporating high-end fittings & fixtures, gorgeous interiors and boasting air & capacious living spaces, Manjeera Diamond Towers Gachibowli is worth considering if you are looking for a luxurious home at an unbeatable price. So, hurry up and book a flat now!!!Situated in an ideal location in midst of all the prime necessities, make this residential project sought-after. Schools like Oakridge International, Delhi Public, Kendriya Vidyalaya & hospitals such as Sai Durga Multi-Speciality, NIMS and Mythri are located within close vicinity. Connectivity to public transport facilities is excellent ensuring smooth travelling. HighpointsWatch out for the super-luxurious club house ‘Oasis’ of Manjeera Diamond Towers well-equipped with a number of sporting & recreational amenities like gymnasium, meditation room, indoor games and many more is the chief attraction. Other prime facilities hosted by this society include ample covered parking space, kid’s play area, amphitheatre and jogging track.

project_description: Situated atop a hillock in Gachibowli, My Home Vihanga is a luxurious residential project that gives you the beautiful view of the Financial and IT district. Offering you elevated view of the city, the society not only makes your view pleasing but also makes you feel on top of the world. The project is constructed by the My Home Group that was established around 30 years ago and have successfully completed 10 commercial as well as residential projects till now. The group has constructed around 7 million sq.ft. of total built- up area till now, 16 million sq.ft. of built- up area is under construction and over ten million sq.ft. of built up area is in planning stage. The huge project is spread across the total area of 21 acres and features 20 towers and 2000 apartments in many sizes in order to suit diverse housing needs. Project detailApart from the smartly constructed floor plan and affordable housing, My Home Vihanga is built with RCC shear wall- framed structure and is resistant to wind and earthquake. The flats available in My Home Vihanga features smoothly finished wall with putty and acrylic emulsion paint in drawing room, living room, bedroom, balcony and kitchen, ceramic tiles cladded up to lintel height on bathroom walls, double charged vitrified tiles in drawing room, dining room, bedrooms, living room and kitchen, anti- skid vitrified/ceramic tiles in balcony, toilets and utility, vitrified tiles in corridors, natural stone in staircase, aesthetically designed teak wood frame main door finished with melamine spray polish and teak finished flush shutters, teak wood frame internal door with laminated flush shutter, aluminum/UPVC glazed French sliding doors in balconies, vanity type wash basin/counter top, EWC with flush valve, single lever wall mixer with shower, provision for geysers in all bathrooms, concealed copper wiring, power outlets for air conditioners in bedrooms, power outlets for geysers in bathrooms and kitchen, power sockets for chimney, refrigerator, microwave oven, mixer/grinder, fire alarm, fire sprinklers & wet rises in parking areas /common areas, fire sprinklers in individual flats for 18 floors towers and a lot more. The luxurious project is equipped with amenities like central landscaped area, swimming pool with kids pool and changing room, jogging track, outdoor basket ball/volley ball/tennis courts, skating rink, pa, saloon, library/reading room, guest rooms, convenience store, gym, yoga and meditation room, indoor games, shuttle court, first aid room/medical store, restaurant, crèche, plazas, car wash area etc. to complement your luxurious lifestyle. The society is located in Gachibowli that is situated the outer ring road and offers easy connectivity to Nehru ORR, Old- Mumbai highway, Inorbit mall, Gachibowli stadium, NH- 65, Hitech City MMTS, Hafeezpet,, Chandanagar, The Gaudium School, Manthan International School, KIMS Hospital, Continental Hospital, University of Hyderabad, National Institute of Design, IIIT Hyderabad and all the other prime areas.

Hyderabad’s real estate market has grown leaps and bounds during the last few decades and the city has emerged as major technology, research and education hub during the same time creating abundant opportunities in these sectors.

My Home Constructions has re-defined Hyderabad’s real estate market and the landscape has seen what it takes to offer the best of the best! All of the ventures to have come out of My Home stable bear testimony to our world-class standards and top-of-the-line amenities. We share our customers’ values and this has been the reason to our success by having built over 3 million SFT across 14 of our landmark projects amongst which are the famous My Home Tycoon, My Home Rainbow, My Home Navadweepa and My Home Hub.
JEWEL IS ONE OF A KIND.
With My Home Jewel, we have added many ‘firsts’ to our list and quite a few feathers to our hat. The project, first of its kind in Hyderabad is spread across 31.5 lakh SFT and houses 2,016 flats. While we have reached the monumental 3 million mark with all of our previous projects combined, My Home Jewel, the mega apartment complex alone is over 3 million square feet in area.
QUALITY. VALUE. LOYALTY.
We keep the tradition of blending aesthetics with functionality alive. My Home Constructions, the powerhouse, is powered by green technology and with a talented team of engineers and project managers; we have delivered top-notch quality and happiness in all of our residential and commercial high-rises. With strengths as strong as the foundation, we begin a new era in the field of real estate by creating an identity explains what we are – Quality, Value and Loyalty.

project_description: Jains Carlton Creek, the premium residential project developed by the veteran real estate developers Jain Housing and Constructions, offers a  privileged life in ultra-comfy residential apartments. It is one of the massive residential developments, meticulously handpicked by the developer and built across 13 acres of land.  Located at Gachibowli, Hyderabad, it easily connected with Nehru Outer Ring Road and easily commutable by road. Built in a luxuriant landscape, Jains Carlton extends a perfect setting with a lot of facilities offering in a grand outlook. Complementing the development of this stature, which provides state of the art facilities, the residential project is equipped with a gym, mini theater, multipurpose halls, and extended safe environment as kid’s play area.The landscaped podium gardens carry the professional outlook and a feast for the vision. It has the completely safe and pollution free environment and the campus is free of vehicles. Jain Carlton Creek provides the best and stress-free ambiance for your family, to live for generations in an atmosphere encompassed by abundant greenery. The grander exterior and interiors compete with each other. The massive residential project has spacious 2 and 3 BHK apartments. All facilities and amenities extended in a lush green serene and pure environment gives pure living experience for the residents. Why should I Buy?Posh living in serene atmosphere Spacious apartments with state of the art facilities, premium fittings, and all amenities Varying configurations of apartments to choose according to your budgetPrice Range and Unit Details Jain Carlton Creek is a cluster of 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments in different floor plans and spaces, which ranges from 1050 sq ft to 2550 sq ft per unit. The residential project has 1664 units built across 11 towers, which makes a massive project and a little community of its own. The construction is completed and ready to move. The cost of apartments ranges from 60 lacs to 1.2 crores. Nearby Information, places of interest landmarks From basic amenities like bus stand to hospital and shopping, Gachibowli is one of the developing areas in Hyderabad. Within 3 to 5 kilometer radius, residents have access to all facilities, from bus stand to commute to different places, school, hospital, theaters, parks, and gym. Kavuli Hills is located at a distance of 16 kilometers.  About the Builder Jain Housing entered the real estate industry in the year 1988 and it is almost 30 years into the industry at present. Jain Housing and Construction set the standard for offering an exclusive lifestyle with ultra-indulgence and all luxurious facilities. They involve in the promotion of eco-friendly residential units. It serves in all major cities of the country, Chennai, Bangalore, Cochin, Hyderabad, Coimbatore and Tirupur. Other Projects by the Builder Jain Housing is one of the renowned names in the industry, indulge in the development of residential apartments in different cities. Jain Sukriti, Jains Adwaita, Jains Swadesh, Jain Sankalp, etc are the few of the other projects promoted by Jain Housing.

Jain Housing and Constructions
Established in 1987, Jain Housing and Constructions is recognized as one of the trusted real estate players. The builders are adroitly involved in the completion of several construction projects across South India. The dedicated & skilled team enriched with industry experts has enabled Jain Housing and Constructions in achieving an unwavering position in the real estate market. With an aim to provide to affordable housing with premium quality service and on time & budget, the realty company has been acknowledged as the ""Best Builder"" from Builders Association of India. Till now the group has delivered 12 million sqft. of distinctive living spaces involving 2bhk, 3bhk, 4bhk residential flats/apartments and more spread over 210 remarkable projects and 25 Ongoing Projects in all the southern States. 
Jain Developers are engaged in projects involving residential flats/apartments, commercial buildings, housing complexes, IT Hubs, etc. in cities like Coimbatore, Chennai, Bangalore, Tirupur, Cochin and Hyderabad. They have always tried to give a tailored touch to each project executed so as to transform the real estate market of the South as per the modern lifestyle. project_description: Overview:Vajra Jasmine County is a project by Vajra Infra Corp India Private Limited located in Gachibowli, Hyderabad offering luxurious and skilfully designed 3 BHK apartments. The project is currently ongoing construction and consists of 376 units spanned over thoughtfully developed 5 towers. Project Details:Vajra Jasmine County is a RERA Certified Project. It is being developed by Vajra Infra Corp India Private Limited with their impeccable track record in the real estate market. They are offering skilfully designed 3 BHK apartments. Vajra Jasmine County plot areas for its 3 BHK flat range from 2005 sq. ft. to 2085 sq. ft.  Vajra Jasmine County is designing their lavish apartments with certain specifications like ceramic tiles and vitrified tiles flooring in every room, laminated wooden flush doors, concealed copper wiring with sufficient electrical points, sanitary ware, and  branded CP fittings etc. Vajra Jasmine County will provide several amenities and facilities for its residents like a club house, coffee lounge, cafeteria, private terrace & garden, dance studio, power back up, swimming pool, lift, security, park, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility, bank & ATM, gymnasium, indoor games room, piped gas, rain water harvesting, RO water system, water storage, air conditioned, indoor squash & badminton courts, multipurpose courts, meditation area, vaastu compliant, internet & Wi-Fi connectivity, conference room, solar energy, activity deck, event space etc. Highpoints:Vajra Jasmine County is a phenomenal project developed by Vajra Infra Corp India Private Limited equipped with impeccable amenities and signature architecture. Vajra Jasmine County locality is in the Financial District Hub and is also the first residential project in Hyderabad to install Toshiba hi-speed lifts. Several utilities like Wipro Circle Bus Stop, Continental Hospitals, Oakridge International School, MedPlus Pharmacy, Fresh Earth Supermarket, ICICI Bank ATM, Lemon Tree Hotel, ESSAR Petrol Pump, etc. are all in close proximity of the project.

project_description: OverviewMantri Celestia is an extremely superior apartment complex developed by the legendary Mantri Group. The conspicuous project is located in Gachibowli, Hyderabad which is well connected to all the places of the city. The flats of this project come fully equipped with standard amenities, for those who want nothing but the best.Project DetailsAstonishing Mantri Celestia comprises of a complex which is as high as 24 storeys building from where one can enjoy tremendous view from each window of every apartment. This residential project consists of 7 vaulted towers housing 1192 extravagance units. The flat rates of the project are ranging between Rs.60.0Lakhs to 82.0Lakhs.Mantri Celestia is quite suitable for both nuclear as well as large families as the project comprises of 2 and 3BHK flats which are spread across a spacious area of 980 to 1200sq.ft. These homes will surely impress your peer group and relatives with its design and planning. Mantri Celestia is a celebration of life where you will be swayed into a world of enchanting experience.The project includes all the amenities such as car parking, health club, sauna, tennis room, badminton court, intercom, rain water harvesting scheme is accomplished, round the clock running water and generator power backup is also provided which is very convenient for the residents.HighpointsOutstanding Mantri Celestia is situated in Gachibowli which is one of the premium and key locations in Hyderabad. This tranquil residential project is in close proximity to most of the schools, hospitals, shopping mall, etc. Moreover, public transportation facilities such as trains, buses, etc., can be found with no trouble, which makes commuting very easy. Mantri Celestia is one of the finest expressions of a luxury lifestyle hence book a flat now and be a part of Mantri Celestia to enjoy all the luxurious facilities.
about_project_details: Mantri Developers Pvt. Ltd. Established in 1999 by Mr. Sushil Mantri, the company has been the pioneering force behind the rapidly changing skyline of south India, with developments that span the residential, retail, commercial, education and hospitality sectors. In just 15 years, the group, with the spirit of innovation at its core, has carved a niche for itself as an industry benchmark for quality, customer focus, robust engineering, in-house research, uncompromising business ethics and the unswerving commitment to timeless values and total transparency in every aspect of its business. These exceptional attributes have made Mantri Developers one of India is most preferred real estate brands in south India. As part of its diversified portfolio that is cumulatively spread over 20 million sq. ft. under various stages of construction in residential, retail, office, hospitality, and townships in the high-growth urban centers. Under residential segment, Mantri Developers offers villas, row houses, super luxury apartments, luxury apartments and semi-luxury Apartments. The Company has an enviable track record of having delivered 1.4 homes, every single day. Mantri Developers is committed towards developing ecologically sustainable projects, with a strong emphasis on environmental management and safety standards. The company is also in the forefront of using cutting-edge technological innovations like home automation systems to complement the state-of-the-art architecture of its smart home projects.

project_description: Marvelous Green Grace by S & S Green Projects Pvt. Ltd. is located in Gachibowli, Hyderabad. Green Grace is being developed in extent of 5.38 with a built up area of above 1 million sqft consisting of 416 flats, in 3 blocks. Each block consists of sub cellar, cellar, ground and 14 upper floors. Green Grace includes well ventilated 3 BHK apartments along with all the world class amenities.Project detailsThe accomplished architectonics in this RERA certified project is being done by using the latest technologies and hence, is considered to be the most admirable address offering absolute amusement to each and every resident. The price list of these 3 BHK apartments falls within the bracket of Rs. 1.25 Cr - 1.89 Cr.Green Grace is one of the carefully planned projects adorned with all the accelerating features of high-end. Hence, Green Grace allows you to lead life more auspiciously in the most comfortable manner witnessing the most international level facilities allowing you to feel altered from the blissful living.HighpointsGachibowli is located near to the outer ring road that has high transactions in the real estate sector. The tag of being an IT hub attracts the maximum crowd of the city here. The primary reason behind the increasing residential real estate demands is that Gachibowli is house to many IT/ITES companies such as Microsoft, Infosys, Wipro, Indian School of Business, etc. It is also close to several schools in the city and is a short commute from shopping malls and markets, and provides quick access of banking and medical facilities.Green Grace is a residential project located in Gachibowli, Hyderabad and has been planned keeping a convenient lifestyle in mind. What are you waiting for, book a flat now as this may be the correct time to invest in right property.
about_project_details: The development of residential and commercial buildings is what essentially defines S and S Green Projects Pvt. Ltd. From 1998, when we began to being one of the most sought after construction companies, it sure has been an eventful journey thus far. One of the main reasons for the longevity of S and S Green Projects is its uncompromising commitment to the highest level of quality construction as well as consistency in delivery.Satisfying customers has been an important criteria too and it is owing to their support and patronage that we at S and S have been able to develop and further several projects. With an emphasis on quality, the company is known to make buildings which apart from great aesthetic appeal, also give importance to energy conservation.
project_highlights:
Highlights


Located in Gachibowli next to the Express Way, it is situated opposite Ramanaidu Studios and next to the Oakridge International School. Also, it lies within walkable distance from DPS and is a 10 minute drive to offices such as Wipro, Infosys, Franklin Templeton, etc. The drive to the International Airport is 20minutes and it is just 15 minutes away from Jubilee Hills and Banjara Hills.

project_description: OverviewSmondo, Gachibowli, Hyderabad is an innovatively designed and developed by Patel Realty. This project comprises of 2 magnificent towers consisting of 372 residential flats. The flats price range in between 60 to 87 lakhs. All the residential flats differ in size ranging from 990 sqft to 1435sqft area. The Smondo photos give you clarity of the design of the whole project and also the design of the residential flats.  About the ProjectThis project brings together apt design in a apt location at a apt Price. Smondo Gachibowli, is a amazing luxury empire of stunning residential Apartments, enhancing the ultra modern lifestyle. These Residential Apartments offer you the life that revitalizes you and the life that motivates you to live a contented life.According to Smondo reviews, it is a flawlessly crafted project with uncompelled convenience & superb amenities offering a blend of elegance and modernity. The project builders know the beauty of a impeccable peaceful space that is known as ‘Home’, and hence the floor plan of Smondo offers mixture of well-ventilated as well as spacious rooms. This project offers 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments in Smondo. Smondo Gachibowli apartments are known for their exclusive and attractive designs and are followed by newfangled lifestyle amenities. This project offers many modern amenities including Coffee Lounge & Restaurants, Clubhouse, Jogging and Strolling Track, Cafeteria/Food Court, Outdoor Tennis Courts, Recreational Pool, Rain Water Harvesting and many more to pen down.HighpointsThe popular Botanical Garden is just within 3 minutes from this place. Inorbit Mall and Hitec City Centre are at a walkable distance. Chhota Anjaiah Nagar Bus Stop is available only at a radial distance of 1.1km.
about_project_details: The CompanyOpening its doors in Mumbai in 2007, Patel Realty India Ltd (PRIL) is a wholly owned subsidiary of the Patel Engineering Group. Patel Engineering (BSE: PATENG) is a sixty year old firm with a global presence in infrastructure, power, and tunneling.The early years at Patel EngineeringAt its inception, Patel's founder Shri Pravin Bhai Patel established two objectives for the company's future: to sustain steady growth by increasing its revenue annually, but to remain responsible corporate citizens. The hard work and long hours expended in those early years have paid off as the business thrived and as projects grew progressively larger and more complex.Mission StatementFormed in 2007, Patel Realty's principal mandate is to acquire, develop and program real estate assets located in major urban environments where real estate demands have increased sharply due to lifestyle changes amongst all the age group segments of the population. This increased demand, together with the real estate expertise from Patel Realty principals, defines the vision and the road map for the company's future.Patel Realty has and will continue to pursue residential, commercial, IT Park, SEZ, Retail, Entertainment, Hospitality, Waterfront Developments and mixed-use transactions based on these principles - always with an eye on strong community relations and integrity.VisionOur vision is to bring a paradigm shift in real estate industry by setting new standards and pace of Service, Quality, Innovation and Affordability and while doing so, creating Value for Customers, Investors, Vendors and Employees.

about_project:
https://www.magicbricks.com/propertyDetails/otherProjectsByDeveloper.html?psmid=5019668&devId=67565&devName=Patel Realty&cityName=Hyderabad&cityId=2060&postingType=P&aboutDeveloper=The Company
Opening its doors in Mumbai in 2007, Patel Realty India Ltd (PRIL) is a wholly owned subsidiary of the Patel Engineering Group. Patel Engineering (BSE: PATENG) is a sixty year old firm with a global presence in infrastructure, power, and tunneling.

The early years at Patel Engineering
At its inception, Patel's founder Shri Pravin Bhai Patel established two objectives for the company's future: to sustain steady growth by increasing its revenue annually, but to remain responsible corporate citizens. The hard work and long hours expended in those early years have paid off as the business thrived and as projects grew progressively larger and more complex.

Mission Statement
Formed in 2007, Patel Realty's principal mandate is to acquire, develop and program real estate assets located in major urban environments where real estate demands have increased sharply due to lifestyle changes amongst all the age group segments of the population. This increased demand, together with the real estate expertise from Patel Realty principals, defines the vision and the road map for the company's future.

Patel Realty has and will continue to pursue residential, commercial, IT Park, SEZ, Retail, Entertainment, Hospitality, Waterfront Developments and mixed-use transactions based on these principles - always with an eye on strong community relations and integrity.

Vision
Our vision is to bring a paradigm shift in real estate industry by setting new standards and pace of Service, Quality, Innovation and Affordability and while doing so, creating Value for Customers, Investors, Vendors and Employees.

project_description: OverviewSet in one of the coveted region – Lansum Etania, Gachibowli developed by the famous Lansum Etania Developers is a fabulous residential project spread across 8 acres of lush greenery. Sleek & beautiful, this project comprises of 7 towers with total 552 residential units. This under-construction project offers a mix of 3 & 4 BHK Flats measuring from 1890 to 4085 sqft, the flat rates of Lansum Etania, Gachibowli are tagged between Rs. 81.3 Lacs - 1.75 Cr. About the ProjectThis exclusive residential project is studded with a pool of top-notch amenities & facilities promising an unparalleled luxury living. This stunning layout of these residential apartments assure plenty of fresh air & natural light across all the rooms. Book a flat now in Lansum Etania, Gachibowli and enjoy every moment of your life with complete bliss.The well-ventilated residential apartments of Lansum Etania, Gachibowli are perfect to live a simple yet extravagant lifestyle with your loved ones. Deigned to provide unmatched privacy, these residential abodes offering panoramic views of the city have spacious living spaces & luxurious bathrooms.The well-equipped clubhouse with all the imaginable sporting facilities like gym, indoor games room, paly courts, etc., is the prime attraction of Lansum Etania, Gachibowli. Other impressive amenities include the stunning swimming pool, meditation room, aerobics area, multipurpose hall to name a few. CCTVs at the main door of every flat & at the main entrance of every tower assure 24x7 safety of the residents. HighpointsCrowned as one of the major IT Hub – Gachibowli is indeed a best place to make an investment. Favoured with good connectivity to public transport facilities, this area is a blooming residential locality. Microsoft, Infosys, Capgemini, Wipro, TCS are some of the noted companies located close by. Gachibowli is also a well-known educational center with several good schools & colleges.
about_project_details: In an exclusive and bountiful world, you are treated to extravagant spaces, elaborate features that promise an unparalleled luxury in a joy free environment. With the advent of ETANIA, perceptions on lifestyle will never be the same in Hyderabad at Nanakramguda. This High-rise Residential Apartments comprises 3 and 4 bhk homeland rises to 20 floors with 2 platinum and 5 Gold Towers. ETANIA transcends your expectations with a foray of Amenities including Club House, Amphitheatre, Tennis Court, Children Play Area, Swimming pool and a jogging, walking trail, among others.

project_description: Vertex Panache brings to you a blend of contemporary living and a community lifestyle with an impressive list of features that will enhance both, your life and lifestyle. Located right beside the Outer Ring Road and neighbouring the IT corridor,  convenience is right outside your doorstep with schools, offices, hospitals and malls within driving distance.  Mixing aesthetics with accessibility and convenience, Vertex Panache is the perfect place to unwind after a long day with the many features that Panache has to offer - wider spaces, better security and more privacy. Encompassing all the elements of luxury, the centre of community activity at Vertex Panache – The Club Panache is an extension of your residential space. Whether its leisure, fitness or relaxation, you'll discover several exciting amenities to pick from - Multipurpose Hall, A/C Gymnasium, Preview Theatre, Spa, Yoga / Meditation Hall, Aerobic Room, Indoor Games, Swimming Pool, Crèche, Amphitheatre, Skating Rink, Basketball Court, Senior Citizens' Zone and much more.A congregation of 6 towers, Vertex Panache has it all to take luxury living above what one would expect. With just a few months to go for the handover of Phase - 1, the Panache Lifestyle is yours for the taking. Phase - 2 is already underway and will be ready for launch soon.
about_project_details: Headquartered in Hyderabad, Vertex Homes Pvt Ltd. is a property development enterprise which specializes in residential and commercial development and has been around for more than 22 years. After the successful completion of premium developments in Hyderabad, Vertex Homes have carved out a niche for itself in the commercial development industry.Although we predominantly focus on residential projects, we have a diversified portfolio, encompassing the key segments of the real estate market. With 2.7 million sq ft of are constructed, under construction area and 2.5 million sq ft of upcoming developments, the Vertex group has evolved into one of Hyderabads premier builders and developers of residential and commercial property.

With the rationalized Foreign Investment Policies in India, the real estate, property development has targeted several Indian Cities for its projects.

project_description: Botanika is a project by Universal Realtors, located in Gachibowli, Hyderabad, offering ready to move 4 BHK and 5 BHK apartments. It consists of 350 units spanned over 3 towers on a total project area of 7.5 acres. Botanika price rate starts from Rs. 2.47 Cr onward. Project Details:Botanika located in Gachibowli, Hyderabad, is a project by Universal Realtors offering lavish, luxurious and ready to move 4 BHK and 5 BHK apartments. Botanika plot areas for its 4 BHK flat ranges from 3800 sq. ft. to 6500 sq. ft. to 5 BHK flat areas range from 6796 sq. ft. to 9300 sq. ft.Botanika apartments are designed with high quality interiors like vitrified tiles, anti skid tiles flooring in every room, designer wooden flooring in all bedrooms, teakwood frame doors, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, designer modular kitchen with granite platform, branded CP fittings etc. It is well equipped with all basic amenities and civic utilities.Botanika is a RERA Certified Project. Botanika provides numerous essential amenities for its residents like 24*7 power back up, lift, 24*7 security facility, park, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility, kids play area, flower gardens, piped gas, rain water harvesting, air conditioned, vaastu compliant, internet & Wi-Fi connectivity, fire fighting equipment etc. and many more.Highpoints:Botanika is strategically developed in the prime and happening location of Gachibowli, Hyderabad. The project has 70 percent open space and is adjacent to the 128 acre Botanical Garden. It is just 3.6 km from Stopiles Hospital, 0.5 km from Indian School of Business and 2 km from K P Reddy Grocery Store. Various utilities like Kondapur Bus Depot, Meridian School Madhapur, Rainbow Children’s Clinics, Spencer's Neighborhood Store, Corporation Bank ATM, Red Fox Hotel, Botanical Garden, etc. all lie in close vicinity.
about_project_details: Inspiring buildings are more than the materials that go into building them. The Sureka Group believes in Building with a Difference. It believes that in the business of construction, when emphasis on quality joins hands with passion and hard work, landmarks are created.Over four decades in business, the Sureka Group has created a number of such landmarks. Each Sureka landmark bears testimony to the Group's philosophy of constant innovation to uplift the quality of life for all. As symbols of involvement and commitment, they dominate the cityscape.Koncept AmbienceStarted in 1984, in less than 3 decades, we have created a new paradigm in eco-conscious luxury living. Our hallmarks are innovation, quality, design and craftsmanship, of the highest order. The high appreciation of Value in all our projects reflects our commitment and our success.We were the first to take a leaf out of history and create a dreams cape overlooking Golconda Fort. The first in India to launch the concept of a gated community project, near Jubilee Hills, at a time when high rise construction was the norm. Today, Whisper Valley is has become the pride of Hyderabad. We were among the pioneers in adopting transparency and quality in the real estate industry, and in becoming ISO 9001 compliant.

project_description: OverviewAliens Space Station placed in Gachibowli is spectacular residential township developed by Aliens Group. This integrated township features 14 stations and 83 towers. This project consists of 2182 luxurious residential units and the flat rates of Aliens Space Station Gachibowli are priced between Rs 45.8 Lacs - 3.0 Cr. This project offers skilfully designed 2 & 3 flats, duplex and penthouses. About the projectThe 2BHK Flats measure 1122 – 1402 sqft while the 2+1BHK Flat range between 1344 to 1432 sqft. 3BHK Flats are available from 1344 to 2208 sqft area and the duplex flats have a covered area of 3569 – 5036 sqft. The palatial penthouses are spread across wide area of 4945 to 7674 sqft.Blessed immensely with lots of fresh air & light, the well-ventilated residential apartment of Aliens Space Station Gachibowli are set to offer a healthy & blissful life. Exclusively planned with 80% open area, this eco-friendly residential township is certified by the Indian Green Building Council (IGBC). Some of the impressive amenities of this world-class township include clubhouse, swimming pool, landscaped greenery etc. The township is also self-sufficient with a shopping mall, multiplex and many more other facilities.Placed in the well-known locality of Gachibowli, Hyderabad - this township enjoys good proximity to Indus International School, Lingampally MMTS Station, Outer Ring Road, the new 100-acre Wipro Campus, Sri Devi College and many more other landmark destinations. Connectivity to public transport facilities is one of prime benefits of this locality. Highpoints'Highly Commended Apartment India” and “Mixed-use Development India' are the two prestigious international awards received by Aliens Space Station Gachibowli. This township is ranked amongst the top 3 residential townships of India. Book flat a now in Aliens Space Station Gachibowli and be a part of this magnificent creation.
about_project_details: 'Property development just doesn't happen. It begins with courage and conviction to challenge the conventional wisdom and balance the same with excellence and expertise.' - It was this forethought that laid the foundation and genesis of Aliens group.Aliens Group - as different is our name so is our motto of providing 'intelligent living' alternatives to our customers. Something is always 'Alien' about us - alien from the conventional mind-set, conventional development and conventional customer practices. As the thought leaders of the 'Intelligent living' concept, we apply the new age phenomenon of 'maximized spaces and minimized hassles' to satisfy the most conscientious buyers of today's generation.Aliens mission is always to create best solutions with pioneering functionality, built on trustworthy and stout technological structural design which could be lucratively implemented and simulated across the world.

project_description: OverviewYour search for a lavish home in Gachibowli – the IT of Hyderabad City ends right here at Sumadhura Acropolis. Developed by the famous Sumadhura Infracon Private Limited, this 32-storeyed residential wonder is one of the tallest building in Gachibowli, Hyderabad. Spread across 4-acres of land, this project consists of total 564 units with a mix of 2 & 3 BHK flats. These flats are available with various sizes ranging from 1245-2615 sqft. The flat rates of Sumadhura Acropolis Gachibowli, Hyderabad are priced from Rs. 62.23 Lacs to 1.3 Cr. About the ProjectImmerse yourself into the fresh and natural ambiance of these luxurious abodes and enjoy a complete balanced life with your precious family members. Gifted with excellent freshness of the breeze, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Sumadhura Acropolis Gachibowli, Hyderabad are worth buying.Crafted with unmatched interiors and boasting spacious living spaces, these residential apartments have been designed with complete precision by skilled engineers. Sumadhura Acropolis Gachibowli have 72% of open space and offers unblocked 360 degree views of Golf Course, Financial District and Outer Ring Road.Swimming pool, kid’s play area, amphitheatre, basketball court, jogging tracks and landscaped gardens are some of the prime amenities of this society. These properties are also known to yield higher returns in near future, so hurry up and book a flat now in Sumadhura Acropolis Gachibowli. HighpointsConnectivity to various well-established IT companies like Honeywell, Deloitte, Microsoft, TCS, etc.,is undoubtedly one of the prime advantage of Sumadhura Acropolis Gachibowli which has made it a favourable residential destination. Good connectivity to public transport facilities ensure easy & smooth travelling.Schools situated close by include Oakridge, The Gaudium and Little Einstein. The prestigious Indian School of Business, Gachibowli is located within just 3km radius. Continental & Himagiri are some of the famous hospitals found close by.

project_description: Overview:Developed by the famous Technopolis Construction Company Pvt Ltd., Madinaguda – Hyderabad, this project offers you ready to move in 2 and 3 BHK homes. The project is named Solitaire Elite, Hyderabad and makes sure that you are also counted among the elite members of the society. These homes will truly give you an elegant and luxurious life. Project Details:The pricelist of Solitaire Elite homes range from 44.6 Lac and 62.5 Lac and these homes offer a freehold ownership to buyer. The project consists of a total 130 units that are segregated into 4 huge towers. The floor plan of Solitaire Elite is planned in a manner to give you huge homes that give you ample ventilation and abundant daylight. The 2 BHK flats are spread over an area range of 1115 sqft to 1265 sqft and the 3 BHK flats in Solitaire Elite are built over an area of 1525 sqft.The builders have mastered the art of satisfying the customers by giving them all that they wish for. All the homes in their ventures have been constructed with superior quality materials and fittings and as per the requirements of the modern day buyer. As per the reviews of Solitaire Elite, this project is an ideal blend of affordability and luxury for those who love to live the elite life.- Kids play area, gymnasium, banquet hall, intercom facility and power back up are some of the amenities offered by this project. Highpoints:As mentioned earlier, this project is famous for its affordability as customers always look for more in less cost. In addition to this the prime location of the property is also an added advantage as it is nearby to many basic conveniences that help you at times of needs.Don’t let go of this great opportunity. To clear any doubts you can check the updated Solitaire Elite photos on the website.

project_description: Located in the picturesque Hafeezpet area of the software hub Hyderabad is the prime property of Sri Sairam Towers from the Srisairam Group. Centrally located to help avoid traffic jams for IT professionals, Sri Sairam Towers is a sought after address in Hafeezpet. Located just 5km from Financial District, the residential area comprises of 45,000 square feet of common space which will house various indoor games and other sporting amenities. Outdoor game arenas will also be provided such as cricket practising nets and tennis, badminton and basketball courts for the residents to use actively. A health club will also partake of the premises. Unique features of the venture include centralized LPG connection to all the flats and the absence of common walls in the apartments. An amphitheatre, Library, restaurant and a supermarket within the building are also provided. A sewage treatment plant is also present, which helps reduce water consumption. The community has 8 residential towers each containing several 3BHK flats of varying area going from 1100 square feet to 2800 square feet. With round the clock security and exciting features like a skating rink, Sri Sairam Towers is a coveted destination for all buyers.
about_project_details: Sri Sai Ram Projects is a leading real estate developer in Hyderabad that has been instrumental in providing happy homes to many patrons since 1990s. More than 2500 satisfied customers have found a home in our Landmark projects. Since its inception in 1991, Srisairam Group has designed and developed over 15 landmark buildings across the length and breadth of Hyderabad. Every project is designed to be the perfect home that gives you value-for-money, contemporary yet timeless buildings, competitively priced, strategically located, and delivered on time. Be it luxury, semi-luxury or duplex flats, the company with its transparent dealings, has built for itself an unparalleled reputation. Srisairam Group, as a construction company, is driven by the vision to build homes that are an epitome of luxury and a place happiness dwells. Our homes are designed with perfect Vaasthu and a great architecture that give you a sense of warmth and belonging since the moment you set foot in the property. After completion of over fifteen years and twenty lakh square feet of construction area, the company has emerged as one of the leading and most reliable names in construction, real estate and property development. We combine our expertise and passion for construction into the development of every project making it an amalgamation of sagacity of the older generation with the dynamism and motivation of the younger one. All this driven by a highly qualified team of engineers, architects, supervisors, and skilled workers who share our dream of building the perfect homes.

project_description: Overview Are you planning to invest money in residential plots? Excella Greens will be an ideal option for you to choose. Sandstone Infra India Pvt. Ltd has come up with this Excella Greens that is located in Indresham, Hyderabad. This project features 280 residential plots that are currently under construction. Excella Greens price list begins from Rs. 9.8 Lac - 15.0 Lac. Project details Approved by various reputed banks, Excella Greens plots are spanning over 150 Sq-yrd to 480 Sq-yrd. This project is positioned in a gated colony and is offered with all the freehold ownership rights. This HMDA layout is approved by various bank and hence bank loan facility is available. However, it is enclosed within boundary walls with a gorgeous arch that greets you in. This project is well facilitated with underground drainage system, street lights and water harvesting pits. The roads are provided with electrical lines and water pipes, that makes this locality fully developed. The builder of this project is highly appreciated , if you don’t believe then just glance over Sandstone Infra reviews. You will be at great benefit by investing in these plots as they will be a great investment in future. Also, you can construct your dream home according to your wishes and requirements.For your safety, there are guards appointed.Flower gardens and parks add up to the beauty of this project.Rain water harvesting and water storage are the eco friendly measure provided. Highpoints Various famous educational institutes like Rainbow International School,  Ellenki Engineering College, TRR Jyothi Jayadarshini Colleges and TRR Medical College are in close proximity to this Excella Greens, Indresham, Hyderabad.Go through the Excella Greens photos that provide you a brief view. Also, reviews of Excella Greens are available on the website for a proper feedback. Hurry up and book now.

project_description: HPR LN- OPOverview: HPR LN Opus in Kollur, Hyderabad offer an excellent lifestyle, fulfil your desires of constructing best of your dream home then you have visited the right place. HPR LN Opus is one of the premium residential ventures designed beautifully by HPR Infra Projects Pvt.Ltd. HPR LN Opus priced in the range of Rs 23.3 Lac - 29.6 Lac, each of these residential plots sited in an upbeat locality and has all the conveniences as well as comforts at hand. The prospective buyers have all the necessary facilities in pocket. Exhibiting about 400 residential plots, the sizes of these HPR LN Opus residential plots vary so as to offer the prospective buyer a chance to explore their options. About the project : HPR LN Opus residential plots have been certified and have gained HMDA approval. With excellent connectivity to most of the facilities and conveniences. HPR LN Opus layout plans as well as HPR LN Opus photos are certainly worth a watch. The locality has best of facilities and easy connectivity to software companies include as Rallies India, IBS Solutions, Polaris, Infosys, Imperia, Microsoft, Wipro, Wave rock SEZ have already started functioning. With sizes ranging from 223 sq. yrd. to 400 sq. yrd. these HPR LN Opus residential plots are the safest bet you can ever make which are excellent for near future as well. Highpoints: The star attraction of this gated community that adds to the advantages of HPR LN Opus is that well being of the residents is of absolute priority and so this residential venture features all the basic as well as advanced niceties such as drinking water line, sever line, storm water drain, tar road, street lights, beautiful entrance gate, club house, temple with beautiful landscape, children play area and road side plantations. Residential plots are one of the finest investment which have excellent returns, so book now!!!US project is located at kollur. HPR LN- OPUS is a 40 Acre HMDA Approved Layout.  It has facilities like beautiful entrance gate, club house, temple with beautiful landscape, children play area, drinking water line, sever line, storm water drain, tar road, street lights and road side plantations.
about_project_details: HPR Infra Projects has instantly made a distinctive mark on the cityscape of Hyderabad: the city in which the group is headquartered, as it understands the city with an instinctive ease sharing with it a glorious past and a promising future. HPR has ventured in the real estate world with a humble beginning in the year 2004, with Director D. Hari Srinivas who has vision and has successfully completed several projects in Hyderabad. Riding on the growth wave of real-estate, the group has diversified strategically into the development of land.

project_description: This luxurious gated villa project is spread across 24 acres and features exclusively designed 152 independent villas, a clubhouse and a suite of infrastructural facilities. Each of the villas has been meticulously planned and attention has been paid to space planning. The 3 and 4BHK villas are designed to possess setback areas and they have ground plus 1 upper floor. A few of the select villas also have their own private swimming pool. Situated in the quiet neighborhood of Kismatpur off the ORR, it is well connected to the airport via Gachibowli. The nearest junction is the APPA Junction.

project_description: Overview Spread across 30 acres, Magnas Majestic Meadows Kollur, Hyderabad is an under-construction project by Magna Homes featuring 272 signature villas that measure varies from 3029 – 4225 sqft. These villas are offered with 3 & 4 BHK floor plans and are artistically designed. Magnas Majestic Meadows price list is indexed starting from Rs. 1.51 Cr - 2.11 Cr. Project details Magna Homes of Kollur Hyderabad is a well-known construction company known for excellent quality and on-time completion record. The builders are highly appreciated for their user-friendly customer support and the use of modern construction techniques. Majestic Meadows Hyderabad villas are remarkably designed with sheer elegance and optimal usage if space. Armed with all the modern facilities, these villas are certainly a wise investment to make. Majestic Meadows floor plans are commendable, which ensure premium living spaces bestowed with good ventilation & sparkling sunrays. The 3BHK villas are spread across 3029 sqft to 3632 sqft while the 4 BHK villas span across 4157 – 4225 sqft. These earthquake resistant structures offer a host of modern amenities like:-Multi-purpose hall, amphitheatre, indoor games room, outdoor tennis courts, aerobics room, swimming pool and rain water harvesting are some of the exclusive amenities available.-Meditation area, rain water harvesting, infinity swimming pool, intercom facility and RO water system are some of the other premium facilities.-Kids play area, banquet hall, hi-speed internet connectivity, gymnasium and maintenance staff are also provided. Highpoints The prime location with close proximity to Gachibowli Financial District and HiTech City is the highlight of this residence. International airport is hassle-free drive away and can be reached within few minutes. There are several top-rated schools, universities and colleges in an around this locality. Presence of workplaces, large shopping malls and lots of restaurants have transformed this locality into a favourite residential hot spot. For more details about the project Majestic Meadows photos are available online. Book a flat now and enjoy a lavish lifestyle!!!
about_project_details: Magna Homes is an established property development company focused on creating homes packed with style, convenience and comfort for today's lifestyle seeker and savvy investor.Our core purpose is to inspire a new way of being through quality development. project_description: Tranquillas is a luxurious residential project by Ramky Group situated in the fast growing locality of Kismatpur, Hyderabad offering exquisitely crafted and designed 4 BHK villas. Tranquillas price rate starts at Rs. 2.06 Cr onward. The project is currently ongoing development and will consist of 105 strategically planned units.  Project Details:Tranquillas, a residential project luxuriously developed by Ramky Group in the happening locality of Kismatpur, Hyderabad is offering exquisitely crafted and designed 4 BHK spacious villas. Tranquillas plot areas for its 4 BHK villa range from 3380 sq. ft. to 4069 sq. ft. Tranquillas Hyderabad villas are meticulously designed with certain high standard interiors like anti skid tiles and vitrified tiles flooring in every room, teak wood frame main door with shutters and teak wood frame internal door, granite kitchen platform with stainless steel sink and drain board, UPVC windows, designer bathroom with good quality sanitary ware fixtures and branded CP fittings etc. for every unit.Tranquillas features numerous world class modern amenities and facilities for its residents like a club house with swimming pool and indoor sports, cafeteria, jogging & strolling track, cycling & jogging track, power supply with back up, 24 hour security facilities, park, ample car parking space with visitor parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, guest accommodation, gymnasium, indoor games room, children’s play area, landscape garden, piped gas, rentable community space, multipurpose courts, vaastu compliant, outdoor tennis court, event space & amphitheatre etc. Highpoints:Tranquillas is offering premium luxury villas spaciously designed with all state of the art amenities and facilities. The residents can truly experience an exquisite way of living in these lavish villas. Tranquillas Hyderabad locality is adjacent to green belt areas and closely connected to IT Hub, International Airport, and City Business areas. The vicinity also includes various major international schools and hospitals.

project_description: Overview Whistling Woods residential apartments set a whole new standard of living and is being offered in one of the top most localities of Hyderabad namely Kokapet. Whistling Woods flats are one of the best illustrations of Crown Constructions and Aryamitra Properties. Spanning across of 5 magnificent towers which comprise of 358 elegantly crafted units, Whistling Woods is certainly a safe bet. The price list of Whistling Woods apartments range from Rs. 59.2 Lac  81.4 Lac. About the project Boasting the quality of construction and civil work, these Whistling Woods flats offer comfort and conveniences like never before. Filled with positivity, natural light and prosperity each of these living spaces are well ventilated and airy. The residences are intellectually planned and sized in different range of super areas and carpet areas. This project is spread across 5 towers and has a mixture of 2 BHK as well as 3 BHK units, 2 BHK units are available in 1295 sq.ft. and 1370 sq.ft. area whereas the 3 BHK units range from 1600 sq.ft to 2200 sq.ft. giving you a chance to explore your options. What are you waiting for? Hurry UpBy referring Whistling Woods reviews and photos one can understand this project in a better way. Highpoints Connectivity is praiseworthy as it is very well connected to ORR Narsingi which is not less than 2 km radius. The project is also blessed with a group of amenities which makes sure the well being of the residents including Clubhouse, Cafeteria, Food Court, Jogging and Strolling Track,Outdoor Tennis Courts, Swimming Pool to name a few. Famous schools as well as reputed hospitals are prime whereabouts of this project and include Rockwell International School, Phoenix Green International School, Global Edge School and Continental Hospital, Apollo Health City all within close proximity of few km radius. Your in safe hands if Whistling Woods is your first choice.

,Structures:,R.C.C. framed structure to withstand wind and seismic loads.,Flooring:,Living, dining, drawing, pooja, all bedrooms and kitchen with double charged vitrified tiles of size 800 x 800mm, balconies and utility with rustic ceramic tiles of size 600 x 600mm, all bathrooms with anti skid ceramic tiles of size 300 x 300mm of reputed make.,Corridors, Staircase: ,Combination of granite and tiles.,Generator:,Sound-proof diesel generator of adequate capacity for common area lighting, lifts, motors and 1kw for each flat.,Super Structure:,Solid cement bricks in cement mortar. ,External walls with 6 inch and internal walls with 4 inch thickness.,Corridors, Staircase:,Combination of granite and tiles.,Wiring:,Concealed copper wiring of Polycab, V-Guard, Havells or equivalent make.,Painting:,External: Textured, smooth putty finish and two coats of exterior emulsion paint of reputed make. ,Internal: Smooth putty finish with 2 coats of premium acrylic emulsion paint of reputed make.,Tile Cladding:,Bathrooms: Glazed ceramic tiles dado up to 7 ft.-0 inch height of reputed make.,Kitchen: Glazed ceramic tiles dado up to 2 ft. height above the platform of reputed make. Utilities: Glazed ceramic tiles dado up to 3 ft. height of reputed make.,Electrical:,Power outlets for: Air-conditioners in all rooms, geysers in all bathrooms, cooking range chimney, refrigerator microwave ovens, mixer, grinders in kitchen, washing machine in utility area, TV in hall and bedrooms. ,3-phase supply for each unit and individual meter boards. ,All electrical fittings are of Legrand or equivalent make.,Doors:,Main Door: Teak wood frame with designed veneer flush shutter finished with melamine polish and reputed hardware.,Internal Doors: Teak wood frame with veneered flush shutter finished with melamine polish and reputed hardware.,Toilet, Utility Doors: Teak wood frame with flush shutter with one side veneer and other side enamel paint and hardware of reputed make.,Kitchen:,Granite platform with stainless steel sink and provision for water purifier.,Security:,Sophisticated round-the-clock security, surveillance system.,Solar power fencing around the compound.,Surveillance cameras at the main security and entrance of each block to monitor.,Windows:,SUPVC windows of Aparna, NCL, LG or equivalent make with clear glass and MS safety grill.,Mosquito mesh shall be provided at extra cost.,Water Supply:,24-hour water supply is ensured through bore well.,Bathrooms:,Wall-mounted EWC with concealed flush tank of Hindware, Parryware, Cera or equivalent make.,All CP fittings are Jaquar or equivalent make.,Provision for geysers in all bathrooms.,General:,Telecom: Telephone point in living room.,Cable TV: Provision for cable connection in living and all bedrooms.,Internet: One internet provision in each apartment.,Lifts: Kone, Schindler, Johnson make auto-door passenger lifts with rescue device with V3F.,Plastering:,Double-coat with sponge finish.,Note:,Registration Charges, GST and any other taxes applicable as per government norms to be borne by customers only.,

project_description: OverviewPearl Village is a gated community that is been thoughtfully developed by Sai Anirudh Constructions & Developers Pvt. Ltd. This elegant project is centrally located in Kondapur, Hyderabad and it encompasses 35 well-ventilated units. Pearl Village in Kondapur is offering these spacious units for sale at an affordable price and if required the units in Pearl Village Kondapur will be given on rental basis.Project detailsPearl Village Kondapur floor plans are brilliantly created by the developer with the thought of offering spacious abodes. This excellent project is offering spacious 4 BHK villas that are spanning over an area varying from 3000 sqft to 4000 sqft.The amenities offered in this project are also another great benefit for the buyers.  Early learning center, arts & craft studio, fire fighting equipment, indoor squash & badminton courts, canopy walk and kids play area are offered here.  Club house, coffee lounge & restaurants, outdoor tennis courts, barbeque pit, power backup and much more are available in this project.Pearl Village Kondapur reviews are all on the positive side and you can also browse photos of Pearl Village to get a view of the apartments floor plan and surrounding area.HighpointsThe villas in this project are facing towards the west direction and are built upto 3 floors. Ample parking space for both residents and visitors is the main highlight of this project. Further, the location is also plus point as it offers easy access to many places including Kondapur Bus Depot, Maharishi Vidya Mandir School, Spencer's Neighborhood Store, Ambicare Clinics, State Bank of India, Apollo Pharmacy, Ellaa Hotel Gachibowli and Sri Kotla Vijayabhaskara Reddy Botanical Garden.  Live your lives like never before. Book a luxurious villa now and experience the peak of luxury with your beloved ones.

project_description: Woods is being developed end-to-end by Alekhya Homes in collaboration with Nedscape. Nedscape is a builder of premium luxury apartments, with benchmark projects like Woods, in Jubilee Hills and Somajiguda. Woods at Kondapur has a great amount of natural life around. The architecture is planned in such a way that each home will invite a good amount of natural light, air and greenery into its design. So much so that your family will feel like they are staying in their favorite resort, while being secure in their own home.
about_project_details: "Alekhya" means a beautiful picture that cannot be expressed in words. To us, the true meaning of who we are, is summed up in the legendary Geoffrey Bawa's words "Architecture cannot be totally explained but must be experienced."Alekhya Homes was started in 2005 by Srinath Kurra, with an intent to build homes where people feel their most naturally comfortable. Supporting this intent was the deep rooted value system Srinath was exposed to as a child. Growing up watching his father, KS Rao, whose construction business - Vishnu Group - was the epitome of honesty, transparency and commitment. Vishnu Group had delivered almost 50 successful residential projects and in each of them, KS Rao had poured out his soul. Srinath and his brother, Mahesh, imbibed their work ethic from their father. Today, the brothers work as one person at Alekhya Homes. While Srinath envisions and plans every project, Mahesh adds tremendous value by building delightful detail into the execution of every idea.

project_description: Overview Gamuts Creative Abode Kondapur, Hyderabad by Gamut Infra is entirely a sublime residential venture comprising of 50 flats well-arranged within a single tower. The project gives an option of selecting 2 and 3 BHK flats sized within 1130 – 2275 sqft. The flats are totally ready to live in and the flat prices of Gamuts Creative Abode are also quite affordable. Project details Magnificently designed to offer an unmatched lifestyle, Gamuts Creative Abode apartments are incorporated with a gamut of modern day amenities. The 2 BHK flats are variably sized from 1130 sqft to 1350 sqft wherein the families seeking spacious and large homes can opt for the 3 BHK apartments well-sized from 1500 sqft to 2275 sqft. Though uniquely designed, each of these flats have one thing common that is optimum ventilation. The flats area also supremely blessed with bountiful of natural light. Gamuts Creative Abode floor plans are truly amazingly planned and well-optimised as well. Gamuts Creative Abode photos are worth looking at to get complete understating about these affordable and value-driven apartments. The society is enriched with the following facilities: -Indoor games room, amphitheatre, swimming pool, kids play area, multipurpose courts, retail boulevard and a clubhouse.-Cycling track, reserved parking, gymnasium, meditation area, event space, jogging and strolling tracks.-Power Back Up, Intercom Facility, visitor parking, round the clock water supply and manned security is also provided.-Fire Fighting Equipment, Water Storage, rain water harvesting, lifts and all other bare necessities are also included. Highpoints According to Gamuts Creative Abode reviews, the location is considered as one of the best feature of this residence. Also, the price rates of Kondapur are surging rapidly and also promises good price benefits in the future. For an exciting and wholesome life with your precious family, book a flat today in this flawless residence.

project_description: Samskruti Township is a project located in Kollur, Hyderabad by the well reputed Sri Subham Estates offering spacious and meticulously designed residential plots. The project is ready to move into and consists of 200 customisable spacious units. Samskruti Township Hyderabad price rate for these spaces start at Rs. 22.6 Lac onward.   Project Details: Samskruti Township, a residential venture by the quite experienced developers Sri Subham Estates based in the locality of Kollur, Hyderabad is offering spaciously planned and meticulously designed residential plots. Samskruti Township plot areas for its residential spaces are available in different dimensions ranging from 1800 sq. ft. to 5400 sq. ft. Samskruti Township features good standard modern day amenities and facilities for its occupants such as jogging & strolling track, 24 hour security facilities, children’s play area, rain water harvesting, power supply, water supply with storage, car parking space, large open space, grand entrance, landscape garden and gated community etc. to name a few. Samskruti Township plots are meticulously designed with every detail in mind and offering premium quality villa areas for modern families of Kollur. The project is spanned over 23 acres and is a green project surrounded by a pollution free environment. It is being developed on a strong foundation and strives to give its residents a hassle free and elegant way of living.   Highpoints:  Samskruti Township is one of the spaciously crafted residential projects by Sri Subham Estates offering well equipped and nicely designed residential space. Samskruti Township Hyderabad locality includes basic civic utilities like Bulkapur Main Road Bus Stand, Prachin Global School, Old Shopping Complex, Primary Health Centre, Kranthi General Store, Vigneshwara Medical Store, Lahari Resorts, Children's Park, and Ambari Filling Station etc. are all part of the close proximity from the project. All of these features make this project a worthwhile investment.

A 15 min hassle-free drive to the Gachibowli IT and Financial District and the Proposed BPO Zone of Puppalaguda. 500 Mts from world class 8 lane outer ring road and from the MMTS Phase 2 at Edulanagulapalli Station. Villa projects near by are Bricmor-La Hacienda and West Pines, Golden Gate. Well connected to National and State Highways.Project USPPremium Residential Villa Open Plots at the rate Kollur.

project_description: After the grand success of Samskruthi Township, we bring to you Royal City. It offers Villa plots in a wide range of sizes to match your specific requirements. Surrounded by lush green nature, the area is well connected to Gachibowli Financial District and other parts of the city through ORR, thus ensuring better growth prospects for the area. Get ready to experience a complete lifestyle in Hyderabad’s next big location. Royal City, with its seemingly endless list of features and facilities, offers much more then open plots.The place ensures that you get more out of life here every movement. Situated in the picturesque surroundings with peaceful and serene setting, this project boasts open spaces and vast green areas. Royal City is a getaway for those looking to escape from the hustle and bustle of the city such as teeming traffic, noise, pollution yet be well connected to all important city places.

about_project_details: WESTREN CONSTRUCTIONS and Since 1989, Western Group has excelled as the finest incisive real estate group with a Pan-Indian presence. The group reflects a history of correctly anticipating the needs of Indias growing economy as well as the evolving complexity of the real estate needs of the population. The stability of the group and its proven adaptability to the marketplace was instrumental in Western Constructions becoming a valued group with a trusted track record.

project_description: NSK Exotica is situated in Kukatpally area of Hyderabad. It is spread across awe-inspiring green landscapes, which is a treat to one’s eyes and are of immense importance for maintaining a healthy life nowadays. This sybaritic residential project offers residences, that are designed and planned by world class architects and engineers, who have taken the panache of living to an all-new level and are well within one’s budget. The colour palette decorating the interiors, give the residents a sense of serenity and calmness and leaves them spellbound. NSK Exotica offers all the contemporary amenities to ensure, that the residents experience a marvelous lifestyle. Some of the amenities offered include, Club House, Community Hall, Power Backup, 24*7 Security etc. This precisely designed residential project is also well connected to schools, hospitals and nearby markets, making it convenient for the residents. The idea of this project is to make a strong bond between all generations. NSK Exotica is quite an outstanding residential project, that offers all the conveniences for a soothing and lavish stay within one’s budget, thereby leading to happy individuals.Why should I buy?It is spread across awe-inspiring green landscapes, which is a great treat to one’s eyes and are of immense importance for maintaining a healthy life nowadays.Amenities such as club house, Community Hall, Power Backup, 24*7 Security etc.Well connected to schools, hospitals and nearby markets.Price details and unit detailsAt NSK Exotica, there are 2 residential towers constituting 195 units. The housing units consist of lavish yet thoughtfully designed 2 and 3 BHK apartments.2 BHK (970-1255 Sqft) costs, starting from around 32 Lacs and 3 BHK (1435-1525 Sqft) costs, starting from around 48.7 Lacs.Nearby Information, Places of Interest, LandmarksNSK Exotica is in Kukatpally area of Hyderabad. It is in close vicinity with APSRTC Bus Stop, Big Bazaar, D.A.V. Public School, Kennedy School, Remedy Hospital, Prime Hospital, Syndicate Bank ATM etc.About the builderNSK Constructions understand the fact, that property buying is a dream of every individual and hence they believe in customer-centric approach. The philosophy which they follow is to add value at every stage of the buying process, by bringing efficiency in the system, quality service, and ultimately ensuring that the customer gets a dream property which is also pocket friendly.Other projects by the builderThis company has been building trust for 11 years, through its remarkably unique projects. It has 6 projects in total, out of which 1 is still under process. Some of its projects include, Bliss Meadows, NSK’s Blisslands, NSK Bliss Meadows, Bliss Lands Apartments etc.Projects nearbySeveral reputed developers have shown interest in this locality. Few that have presence in this vicinity are Prem Sarovar by Prem Constructions, Vertex Prime by Vertex Homes, etc.

project_description: Overview:Aparna Hights I is the initial project of Aparna Constructions and Estates Pvt. Ltd., Kondapur – Hyderabad. It houses a total 132 units of 3 BHK flats in 1 huge tower. The flats in Aparna Hights I Kondapur are on rent as well available for sale for those looking to own a home in the historic state of Hyderabad. About the Project:Aparna Hights 1 Kondapur is known for its firm construction and leading location. Aparna Constructions and Estates Pvt. Ltd hold a steady vision to offer a viable balance between affordability and luxury and bring you homes that charm your heart. The 3 BHK flats in Aparna Hights I apartments are built on an area between 1495 sqft and 1745 sqft. Aparna Hights is an impressive structure that stands out amidst a cluster of other properties in the area very distinctly.Phase I of Aparna Hights at Kondapur is a proof that the builders have understood the needs of the modern day buyers and their detailing to build a home with comfort and style. Aparna Hights I floor plan ensures everything is designed to perfection whether it is indoor swimming pool, club house, gym, parking space etc. Highpoints:The project is well connected to the major landmarks of the city and has many famous schools, hospitals and market in the vicinity so that you have all basic facilities at a convenient distance. Maseedbanda Bus Stop is 0.9km away, Lingampally Railway Station is 5.6km away and Cherry Children’s Clinic is just 0.6km away.More details can be gathered from the updated Aparna Hights I photos. So what are you waiting for? Go book your flat now

project_description: Overview Vaishnavi Estates Pvt Ltd introduces a world class residential venture named Triumph Villas in Kismatpur, Hyderabad. Located amidst lush green surroundings, this project offers best of facilities and amenities as far as fittings and accessories are concerned. Triumph Villas price list range from Rs 2.12 Cr - 2.37 Cr, for more detailed information about the pricing you can download the payment plans. The spacious villas of this project are built with good quality construction material and up to date civil work. Project Details The reviews of Triumph Villas are highly affirmative and are fitted with world class fittings & fixtures. These villas are also receive plenty of natural light throughout the day and are well ventilated too. Spacious and airy, these villas assure complete solitude and comfortable lifestyle which is quite rare to find. The floor plan of Triumph Villas is well-designed to provide all the conveniences to the residents so they can enjoy an admirable lifestyle with their loved ones. Vaishnavi Estates Pvt Ltd. is one of the top property developers of Hyderabad carrying years of experience, pocketful of positive reviews and appreciation. Offering a range of 3 BHK villas, this residential venture offers two sizes viz. 3661 sq. ft. and 3264 sq. ft. This project is loaded with an array of amenities like club house, kids play area, swimming pool and are also provided with power backup facility. Highpoints You can get a clearer and detailed information as well as view of this project you have go through the Triumph Villas photos and reviews. The locality has easy access to ORR and Nanakramguda, Shadan Hospital, Himayath Sagar Lake, DPS and Oakridge Int. Schools, Narayan Gurukul, Srinidhi International School and Sun City Hospital all are within close proximity of this locality. Choose now while you have a choice, Hurry up!!! Book now!!!

He is ably helped by a dedicated group of architects, financial experts, project managers and motivated work force. He successfully completed several prestigious infrastructure projects of the government and in private sector. Apart from these, he built highly acclaimed residential projects in vantage locations. Landmark commercial projects and gated communities of posh residential villas has set new trends in luxury and lifestyle in city.

Dr Narayana’s creative energies found expression in film world. He is a respected name in entertainment world and he made a string of successful films over a decade. He is also Director of M/s Nekkanti Sea Foods Ltd, an export house exporting frozen shrimps worldwide.Sri T Ramesh, He is the Director of the company. He has vast experience in construction field. His skills in construction management is well known among employees.

project_description: OverviewThe Manjeera Majestic Homes offers you all the luxuries of life within the comfort of your home. The best quality fittings and fixtures and high- quality construction makes you proud owner of these elegant, lavish and well- ventilated residential flats. The layout and floor plan of Manjeera Majestic Homes in Kukatpally, Hyderabad are a unique blend of thoughtfulness and modernity. Designed to offer affordable housing in Kukatpally, Hyderabad, this ready to move- in society offers 2BHK and 3BHK residential flats at prices starting from Rs. 72.0 lac. The society is equipped with 1 tower and 255 units in total.Project detailThe peaceful ambiance, community living and pollution- free surroundings make your life at Manjeera Majestic Homes comfortable, healthy and happy. Here, you can spend quality time with your family and can interact with your neighbors to stay joyful. Visit Magicbricks and explore Manjeera Majestic Homes price, Manjeera Majestic Homes floor plan, Manjeera Majestic Homes photos, flat/apartment for sale in Manjeera Majestic Homes etc.The project is constructed by the Manjeera Group that has prepared itself to face the challenges of the modern marketplace and has been delivering the best structures to the real estate world. You get to enjoy all the amenities and facilities that enhances your modern lifestyle and makes your life comfortable.-          Visit club house, swimming pool, banquet hall, indoor games room, kids play area, community space, kids play pool with water slides and event space and amphitheater to spend time with family and neighbors.-           Stay fit with jogging and strolling track, gym, indoor squash and badminton courts, multipurpose courts, meditation area and outdoor tennis courts.The residential flats in Manjeera Majestic Homes feature RCC framed structure, aerocon blocks finished with cement plaster, engineered door frames and structures, UPVC windows with clear glass, vitrified tiles in all rooms, toilets with anti- skid ceramic tile flooring, glazed tiles dado upto door height, shower cubicle with single lever concealed and wall mixer in master bedroom, kitchen with granite platform, stainless steel sink, 2 height designer ceramic, glazed tiles dado above cooking platform, chimney, hob and exhaust fan and reticulated glass supply system, internal walls finished with plastic emulsion paints over smooth finish and external walls with combination of texture and acrylic paints.

The project is ready for possession and consists of 200 very well planned units spanned over a large acre of land. Lukas silicon city Hyderabad price rate starts at Rs. 21.3 Lac onward. Project Details: Lukas silicon city, a residential project located in the main area of Tellapur, Hyderabad by the well experienced developers Bhrigu Infra Pvt. Ltd. is offering spacious and meticulously planned residential plots. Silicon City Phase III plot areas for its residential space are available in different dimensions ranging from 1323 sq. ft. to 3600 sq. ft. Lukas silicon city features various basic modern day amenities and facilities such as 24 hour security facilities, park, power supply, water supply with storage, ample car parking space, large open space, grand entrance, wide paved internal roads with street lights, children’s play area, and event space etc. among many more for its residents. Lukas silicon city plots is spaciously designed and skilfully planned keeping in mind the resident’s demands and needs. The residential space is customisable so the residents can build their own dream house with all kinds of amenities and architectural features.  Highpoints:    Lukas silicon city is a lavishly designed residential project offering spacious and thoughtfully designed spaces. Lukas silicon city Hyderabad locality is also a key feature and has various civic utilities such as ATM, Tellapur Ayurvedic Chikitsthalaya, Samashti International School, New Life Church, Sri Sai Ganesh Medical & General Stores, SLNS General Stores, and Dhanu Toddy Restaurant etc. are all part of the close proximity from the project. All of these features and facilities make this project a good investment residential opportunity.
