project_description: OverviewVessella is an ultra-premium & meticulously designed residential development project by Vessella Group, creators of several advanced & premium gated communities in Hyderabad.Vessella has been located in the promising & upcoming area of Kondapur in Hyderabad.Vessella is offering 4BHK & 5BHK immensely spectacular Villas with striking style statements.Vessella Residential Plan is ready to move and it possesses 95 well built & spacious residential units. Vessella price range starts at Rs. 6.35 Crores Onwards.Project DetailsVessella is a sustainable, nature-friendly & self-contained residential development project nested in Kondapur, Hyderabad.Vessella comprises of an array of beautiful Villas with a bunch of assorted amenities. Vessella’s 4BHK Villa ranges between 3667-3673 sqft & it's 5 BHK Villa area is 6500 sqft.Bank approved Vessella photos seemingly showcase that its Landscape has been fashioned with attributes like Power Backup, Water Storage, Maintenance Staff etc.The Vessella residential plan is providing you with a safe dwelling place as there is a provision of the Sound security system.Vessella Hyderabad also has several health upgrading facilities like Jogging and Strolling Track, Swimming Pool, Gymnasium etc.High PointsVessella, spread over massive 10.5 acres of land is providing promising, sleek  & thoughtfully designed residential Villas opposite to Chirec School at upmarket Gachibowli. Vessella is really well allied to roads & Public Transport and is also linked to several key conveniences like Maharishi Vidya Mandir School, Kondapur Bus Depot, Ambicare Clinics, Citibank ATM, Sai Baba Temple, Ratnadeep, Medplus, Platinum Movie Time, HP Petrol Pump and much more.So, Scoot Up! Your utopia home is looking forward to you at Vessella to give you a swank & whole extravagant lifestyle.

project_description: Overview: Constructed by well known and reputed developers known as SVC Ventures and being offered in Kondapur, Hyderabad - Tree Walk is one of the best residential ventures that features a lifestyle with class. Experience a luxurious lifestyle, which are beautifully displayed in the Tree Walk photos. The Tree Walk apartments offer mesmerising view of the surroundings which are located upfront. Tree Walk flats are priced in the range of Rs. 95.0 Lac 1.01 Cr and are spanning across over 6 towers of 100 units. Offering all the basic as well as advanced necessities, endowing in this project will definitely be worth it. About the project : Well known part of Kondapur, Hyderabad, these apartments offer admirable lifestyle that are dignified by luxuries and conveniences like no other. The project is situated in one of the best localities so one can enjoy a lively and cheerful atmosphere in the lush green surroundings of this project. With excellent and commendable reviews, Tree Walk is one of the best investment you make in todays time which will give you good returns in near future. Elegantly crafted 3 BHK apartment units with areas ranging 1622 sq. ft. to 2052 sq. ft. are available so the prospective buyer has plenty of opportunity to choose from a different area sizes. Highpoints: Tree Walk flats have brilliant connectivity to most of the major destinations which are not far from the project. The project premises are very well connected to Jain Heritage a Cambridge School, Value Mart, Arya Hospital, Nampally Railway Station and State Bank of India. Also recreational amenities include Club House, Cafeteria, Food Court and Cycling and Jogging Track and Dance Studio. With best of necessities and amenities, this flat is certainly worth your time and investment!! Book now

project_description: Changing the way we live and use our resources, is the mission statement for the SatyaVani Group. Comprising of a group of proud visionaries who are committed to making living not just pleasurable, but clean and green as well!With global warming proving to be a major factor today, the company has studied methods and evolved solutions that make a difference to the atmosphere by changing the way we build our homes and the way we use our resources.Located 2 Kms from the Hitec city, this project features 55 Apartments of 5 floors each. It is a Gated community and has provision to park two cars per apartment.

about_project:
https://www.magicbricks.com/propertyDetails/otherProjectsByDeveloper.html?psmid=5041182&devId=65437&devName=SatyaVani Group&cityName=Hyderabad&cityId=2060&postingType=P&aboutDeveloper=
The SatyaVani Group comprises of dedicated professionals who came together in 1994 with a vision of making life cleaner and greener by building homes keeping in mind the elements of nature and making the best use of natural resources.

Green Homes are houses designed keeping in mind the elements of nature & making full use of natural resources that do not pollute, or harm the environment in any way. The houses bring in natural light and air for cooling. The use of Green power and waste recovery further conform to the requirements laid down for eco-friendly buildings.

Considering the impact Global Warming has across the globe, much of the concern boils down to the use of energy. For we believe that much of the energy is embodied in the building materials themselves, their transportation & assembly. Therefore every project uses recycled materials for construction.

These houses also improve the standard of living by ensuring that the best of amenities, conducive to a cleaner environment exist without any compromises. Carrying the mission of arresting global warming to better the state of living, Green Homes is poised to set benchmarks in design & construction, which the group hopes could also set a precedent for others to follow by opening up new avenues as well.

The company has initiated four Green Home projects at present and has many more Eco-friendly projects on the anvil with each of them making a landmark beginning to bring nature home and offset the threat of global warming.
&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/SatyaVani-Group-1398060491441-d-loa.gif&yearOfExp=

project_description: Everyone promises luxury in kondapur where a world class infrastructure has come up How about space? Have they got enough to accommodate your needs and vagaries? Will it let you lose in openness? Let you sing a song with butterflies? Or sensitive enough to foster precious moments in relationships? Or allows you to focus on you work? Cyprus Palms create a dazzling backdrop for luxurious villas at kondapur-the destination of superior living that lets your imagination run riot. Envisaged as a gated community in 17 acres of land with 94 villas, Cyprus Palms promises an exceptional life in plethora of spaces. The gated community strikes balance between indoors or outdoors, living spaces and landscaping, daily living and the recreation as, the space skilfully transforms into functional areas at every step to delight you at every moment. The Villas give an uncommon standard of excellence due to their superior quality. The villas display the finest features as the natural light and breeze streams in. The design takes care of every need of yours, be it large bedrooms and living rooms, or the spatial planning of your kitchen or the balconies that connect you with lovely outdoors. Every cup of tea in courtyard becomes a celebration. Brand fittings, fine finishes, smooth flooring create gracefull ambience. You will enjoy more per moment every day at Cyprus Palms.Home loan approved by TATA Capital as well. Situated Location - Near RTA Kondapur Hydrabad

project_description: Reliance Paradise is one of the most lavish and luxurious residential apartments with Reliance Builder in the state of Hyderabad. This project has all the best in class and Luxurious amenities installed in it for the people.Reliance Builder is one of the Top Most and one of the leading builder and developer in the state of Hyderabad. They are well-known for their exceptional and unique design which are used at the time of construction. They have constructed many residential and commercial projects in Hyderabad. One of the completed project by Reliance Builder is the Reliance Paradise. This project has all the luxurious as well as ultra modern amenities installed in it for the people such as a Spacious Swimming pool with hot and cold water facility is also available in this project. WI-FI and Broadband Internet Connectivity is also provided in this project for people. Well maintained Security staff at the entrance as well as at the reception for the safety. 24-Hour power Backup for Lifts and other common things is also involved in this project. The project offers 2 and 3 BHK Flats for the people. The area of the room starts from 1010 sq ft to the 1700 sq ft for the people. All the rooms are Vaastu Compliant According to the builder.Highlights: It is only 1.1 km away from Jain Heritage a Cambridge School. It is only 1.8 km away from Chirec Kondapur Campus. It is only 2.0 km away from Sanskriti. It is only 1.0 km away from Arbor International School.It is only 3.2 km away from Shanti Juniors School.
about_project_details: Established in 1988, led by Mr. M.Srinivasa Rao, MBA, Reliance Builders is a name whose credentials are best depicted by the various ventures that bear its distinctive stamp. Located in the Twin Cities Hyderabad and Secunderabad, the Organization's specific competencies include planning, designing and construction of residential and commercial complexes.The Organization is committed to creating 'superior investor value' to every one of its ventures by adhering to utmost quality, functionality, time-efficiency and cost effectiveness in their implementation. The Organization is credited with the construction of over a score of residential and commercial projects that dot the choicest locales of the City of Hyderabad, each one constituting a proud local landmark.Reliance Builders owes its success and sustained performance to its promoters - a group of renowned professionals with acknowledged credentials. Investing the organization with its intent, inspiration and direction, they have been able to steer the organization into the top-league of builders in the twin-cities. While having a core team of highly devoted and diligent employees who bring with them a broad-spectrum of skills, the Organization has an established a network of highly competent and experienced consulting professionals - architects, supervisors, contractors, vendors etc - to ensure that each project undertaken by the organization is professionally planned, designed and deployed.

project_description: OverviewElysian is an under construction property by Rasun Ace Infra. This residential property is located in Kondapur, Hyderabad. Elysian layout plan has 156 units in a building.Project DetailsElysian Hyderabad is an extremely luxurious residential area with all high-end amenities. The Elysian building has been aesthetically designed by the developer. Elysian floor plan has 3 BHK flats (1825 sqft, 1875 sqft, 1975 sqft, 2050 sqft, 2150 sqft, 2275 sqft) and 4 BHK flats (3650 sqft, 3950 sqft, 3950 sqft, 4550 sqft). The price is 86.7 Lac - 2.25 Cr (4,750 per sqft - 5,312 per sqft). Citibank, DHFL, ICICI, HDFC, IDBI, Indiabulls, Axis Bank, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank and State Bank of India are the financial institutions which are providing loan for buying flats in Elysian.Elysian will provide all the high-end amenities to the residents for a comfortable life including power back up, swimming pool, high-speed lift, security, park, reserved parking, services or goods lift, visitor parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, guest accommodation, DTH television facility, concierge services, laundry service, waste disposal, piped gas, rainwater harvesting, jogging track, strolling path, water storage, canopy walk, cycling path, firefighting equipments and rentable community space.Elysian compound will provide a platform for a gym, indoor games room, kids club, library and business centre, retail shops, outdoor tennis courts, early learning centre, bar or lounge, dance studio, coffee lounge and restaurants.Flats will be designed by keeping science of architecture in mind i.e. Vastu Shastra as it enhances the life condition of the people around. HighlightsElysian is the best place to live as it is in close proximity to major markets. Elysian photos can be checked online at magicbricks website and you can also visit Elysian location for more details and checking the place.
about_project_details: Rasun Ace Infra Pvt Ltd, a sister concern of Ace Constructions, is the result of two companies joining hands, a partnership that takes the best of both partners and combines them to deliver results that are greater than the mere sum of their parts.Rasun Exports is known for quality granite exports across the world including USA, Canada, European Union, UK, Middle East and Far East. Ace Constructions is known for its expertise in the development of large-scale residential addresses.Rasun Ace Infra Pvt Ltd puts both these together to deliver on its vision of offering world- class residences to the citizens of Hyderabad.

project_description: Riddhis Valentino is a housing project by Riddhi Builders & Developers located in Kondapur, Hyderabad.This spacious & luxurious  Residential project is offering  2BHK &  3BHK  apartments with world class facilities, ample greenery & architectural magnificence to give you a luxurious life. Riddhis Valentino is currently under construction and it consists of 60 units spanned over 1 tower. Riddhis Valentino housing apartments price range starts at Rs. 30.5 Lac onwards.Project DetailsRiddhis Valentino, a residential project by Riddhi Builders & Developers located in Kondapur, Hyderabad is providing elegant Naturally Lit & Ventilated 2BHK &  3BHk apartments of international standards. Riddhis Valentino’s 2BHK flat’s plot area ranges from 1140 - 1224 sqft & 3BHK flat’s plot area ranges from 1776-1803 sqft.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Riddhis Valentino apartment has interior specifications like Vitrified Tiles & Anti-Skid ceramic tiles flooring,  Designer flush door with teak wood frame,UPVC sliding windows, Kitchen with granite platform, SS Sink & dado tiles up to 2 feet, Internal fittings for split AC, Concealed High quality electric fittings, exterior walls with 2 coats of cement plastering with Birla putty & texture  and many more.Riddhis Valentino apartments offer amenities like Club House, Private Terrace/Garden, Swimming Pool, Banquet Hall, Aerobics Room,   Lavish Indoor games room, Balconies for each flat, 24 hours water supply, Kids Play area, Uninterrupted power back up, Automatic lift, Ample space for reserved parking and many more.High PointRiddhis Valentino is offering well-crafted  &  ventilated apartments with world class infrastructure & serene green atmosphere in a pocket-friendly budget. Sanskriti School, Ragvarsha Shopping Mall, Sai Neha Hospital, Adarsh Ban ATM, Shivaya & Durga Temple, Cafe Coffe Day, S.S Medical & General Stores and much more are all part of the close vicinity of the project.So, Hurry up!  A luxurious and soothing life is waiting for you at Riddhis Valentino.

project_description: Overview Offering unique and stylish 4 BHK villas sized from 4000 sqft to 4700 sqft - Pavani Boulevard Kokapet, Hyderabad is a luxurious development by Pavani Group. All these 27 villas are splendidly designed for modern living and Pavani Boulevard Kokapet price varies from Rs. 2.70 Cr to Rs. 3.45 Cr. Project details Pavani Group of Hyderabad is a most trusted development enterprise of the town and have successfully accomplished various gated community equipped with loads of modern amenities and facilities. Pavani Boulevard Villas Kokapet are beautifully set within natural and unpolluted surroundings where are you are bound to spend every moment of your life with complete happiness. Pavani Boulevard floor plans are skillfully planned and the serene ambiance of this society invite you to live a blessed life with your dear ones. The villas are aptly designed for good ventilation, ample fresh air and are also facilitated with power backup facilities. Contemporary design and premium specifications are some of the striking features of these signature villas, which make them value-driven. Few high-end amenities provided by this society are:A well-furnished clubhouse with all the latest sports and leisure amenities.A luxury swimming pool for a cool & refreshing dip during the hot summers of Hyderabad.An aesthetically pleasing kids play area and a well-fitted gymnasium are other attractions. Highpoints The prominent location with easy access to Continental Hospital, Oakridge International School and Delhi Public School is the fundamental attribute of this society. IT companies like Infosys, Wipro, Microsoft, etc., are barely few kilometres away. The upcoming 100-acre Wipro project & the 140-acre Financial District make these villas a lucrative investment. Have a look at Pavani Boulevard photos to know more about the magnificence of this area. For a complete life with peace, comfort and endless luxury, book a villa today!!!

project_description: OverviewGreen Blossoms Kokapet, Hyderabad is constructed by Gauthami Developers. The project comprises of 22 towers that include 157 units having 2 and 3 BHK configuration. The price of these flats starts from 65 lakhs. This project is still under construction. Few flats in Green Blossom are available for resale too.About the ProjectGreen Blossoms is located at one of the most upcoming areas, Kokapet in Hyderabad. This well-designed residency has a number of alluring features. Green Blossom will impress you with, is its sheer appearance and appeal. Being well ventilated, the apartments in Green Blossom are bestowed with fresh air all day long. The homes allow maximum flow of air and energy that keeps the aura of the homes clean and tidy. Being placed at a fascinating address, one gets a perfect brew of nature’s goodness and urban conveniences.Green Blossoms Kokapet floor plans are elegant and spacious allowing maximum flow of air and energy that keeps the aura of the homes clean and tidy. Green Blossoms Kokapet reviews boast of this project being situated in a serene environment that rears fantastic experiences, refreshing moments and a home that is filled with all the comforts and good things for eternity.Green blossoms photos reflect the elegance and aura of this wonderful project offering facilities such as coffee lounge and restaurants, clubhouse, cafeteria, food court, bar, lounge, outdoor tennis courts, unique dance studio, banquet hall, gymnasium, flower gardens, rain water harvesting, retail boulevard (retail shops), fire fighting equipment etc.HighpointsThis project is located in a prime area of Hyderabad and therefore it is one of the perfect places to reside in. Indian School of Business is within 4.5km range. University of Hyderabad and IIT, Hyderabad are situated at a radial distance of 5km.So rush in and book a Green Blossoms flat, which is worth every penny.

project_description: Driven with a purpose of delivering premier villas in the heart of city - Legend Estates Private Limited presents Legend Chimes. Located in Kokapet, Hyderabad – this magnanimous project sprawling across 45 acres of property features 300 4BHK villas measuring 3000 sqft and 4000 sqft. All the Legend Chimes Villas have three floors and are priced starting from Rs. 3.20 Cr. Project details Finely crafted by expert artisans and designed by well-known builders, Legend Chimes Villas are available for both sale and rent. Quality construction and fine craftsmanship will definitely give a good value to your hard-earned money. Well-situated in one of the prestigious residential address, Legend Chimes also offers various plots, where you can build your own castle. The beauty & charm of these villas filled with fresh breeze and sunlight will surely leave you spellbound. Come and experience a divine and peaceful living in this project nestled in the lap of nature. Huge living rooms, stylish en suite bathrooms, bright kitchen rooms and splendid balconies providing incredible views of the surroundings are some of the impressive features of these villas. Highpoints RERA certified, Legend Chimes have been appreciated with good positive reviews for boasting a wide range of exclusive amenities like air-conditioned gym, tennis court, multi-cuisine restaurant, service apartments, indoor games, jogging track, lounge, swimming pool, avenue plantation and much more. High-speed broadband connectivity, intercom facility and 24x7 security is guaranteed. The ideal location with easy access to Hyderabad Golf Course and Jubilee Hills is indeed one of the major advantage of this project. Microsoft, Wipro, ISB and several other known IT firms are situated only few minutes drive away. Connectivity to public transport facilities and schools like DPS & Sreenidhi is an additional benefit. So, hurry up and book a villa now in Legend Chimes Kokapet, Hyderabad and make a valuable life-long investment.
about_project_details: Legend Estates Pvt. Ltd. started its successful journey in the world of real estate with a residential apartment complex in 1998. Today, it is one of the fastest growing and among the most respected real estate companies in Andhra Pradesh. Legend was the outcome of the innate belief of its founders that there was a niche opportunity available for a strong values-based company in the real estate market.Since inception, Legend has carved a niche for itself as one of the premium builders in Andhra Pradesh with landmark projects spanning a total of 2 million sq. ft. in the twin cities of Hyderabad and Secunderabad. A further 6 million sq. ft. is under development across premium residential and commercial spaces. The skilled team comprising of civil engineers, architects, partners and other professionals constantly strive to create high quality commercial, institutional and residential spaces that deliver the best value to the growing Legend family of 5500 residents.

project_description: OverviewEden Garden excellently developed by Sushee Realty is located in Kokapet, Hyderabad. The project is stretched across 42 residential villas. The project is still under construction. Eden Garden floor plan constitutes 5 BHK residential villas. The prices of Eden Garden start from 5 crores onwards. The areas of these villas lie in the range of 7000 sqft to 7300 sqft area. For more information, feel free to go through Eden Garden photos.Project DetailsEden Garden truly redefines luxury as one dreams of to reside. Eden Garden offers spacious and skilfully designed residential villas. Eden Garden residential villas are available for both sale as well as resale at a cheap and best price. This project mainly focuses on larger living spaces, artificial intelligence through latest gadgets and technologies, digital control system, direct access and most important quality of life. This project is a well secured integrated gated township that is top of the world and truly appealing for the new home seekers. Eden Garden encompasses brilliant sunsets, green gardens, floating verandas and cascading waterfalls that will truly refresh after a tiring day at work.The specifications of Eden Garden include brushed cuddapah stone slabs flooring in the veranda, Wooden cantilevered floating steps, provision for AC, Asian emulsion paint over birla putty, fans and lights in all the rooms, Italian marble flooring in the living room etc.The amenities available in this project are:Event Space and amphitheatre, kids play area, swimming pool, power back up, indoor games room, early learning centre, canopy walk, gymnasium, dance studio, jogging and strolling track, maintenance staff, water storage, library and business centre, park, coffee lounge and restaurants, club house, security and flower gardens.HighpointsUmang Rmcl Express Shopee is the popular shopping centre available at a convenient distance of 1.3km.The reputed Rockwell International School is within 2.6km range.ICICI BANK ATM is within the periphery of 1.3km for various financial transactions.

project_description: Saket Bhu Sattva is the largest Green and Tech enabled villa community in Hyderabad with 600 authentic villas spread over 75 acres; Located at Gowdavally, near Kompally, the project is closer to top-notch schools like TIMES School, DRS International School and NIRAJ International School. Adjoined by 600 acres of reserve forest and 75-acres two notified lakes, every Villa has been meticulously designed to create an unrivalled oasis of luxury, charming architecture and stunning views of the environs. Saket Bhu Sattva features a 3-tiered security system with CCTV surveillance, all round compound wall fencing and manned guarding security service. Along with modern amenities like Piped Gas Supply, Water Treatment Plant, and Club House, Party Hall and much more. Further, these luxury villas being positioned just 250 meters away from ORR; office-goers take mere 1 or 2 hour time to reach prime work locations like Hitec City, Gachibowli and Infosys SEZ campus, Pocharam, Shameerpet Bio-tech Park.If you are planning to own a stylish Villa in Hyderabad, don not wait but seize on the divine moments of living in the harmony of tropical charm.

project_description: OverviewOorjita Grand Vie II residential society is an outstanding project developed by Oorjita Builders And Developers Pvt Ltd., Kompally, Hyderabad. This elite project comprises of 152 luxurious villas nestled amidst lush greenery and mesmerizing surroundings. Oorjita Grand Vie II prices begin from 1.05 Cr onwards, and differ depending on the interiors designs and configurations details.Project DetailsThis extraordinary project comprises of stunning 3 BHK villas which are flawlessly designed to precision. The villas in Oorjita Grand Vie II feature laminated wooden main doors, teak wood framed internal doors, unique sliding windows, concealed wiring and parry ware sanitary fittings. Oorjita Grand Vie II floor plans are skillfully crafted with smart elevations and elegant home decors.This society is nestled in the lap of nature, unwind in the mesmerizing surroundings and live the most royal life by being a part of this fantastic project. Indulge in beach volley ball, dive in the large swimming pool, or get involved in various outdoor sports activities. Browse through the eye-catching photos of Oorjita Grand Vie II, which will help you in choosing your heavenly villa. The basic facilities provided by this community are maintenance staff, gated security, laundry facility, rain water harvesting, water storage and ample parking facility. It also provides the world class amenities to give you the most splendid living experience.HighpointsThe brilliant architectural style and the top class amenities provided by this society make it totally worth your investment. The lavish club house, the majestic party area, children’s play area, cricket practice area, gym, indoor games room, outdoor sports, swimming pool etc are some of the amenities that are worth mentioning.Surekha Hospital and DRS International School are located within 3 to 4kms radius. Residing in this beautiful paradise in indeed worth it, book a villa soon and live a king size life.

project_description: The Lawnz is a project by Sivaa Shakthi Constructions located in Kokapet, Hyderabad offering lavishly designed ready to move 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It consists of 265 units spanned over 7 towers. The Lawnz price rate starts from Rs. 62.3 Lac onward. It is fully equipped with amenities and also in close vicinity to various civic utilities.Project Details:The Lawnz located in Gachibowli, Hyderabad, is a project by Sivaa Shakthi Constructions offering lavish ready to move 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The Lawnz plot area for its 2 BHK flat ranges from 1190 sq. ft. to 1320 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range approx. 1780 sq. ft.The Lawnz apartments are being designed with vitrified glazed ceramic tiles in the kitchen, anti skid tiles in the living, dining and toilet; vitrified tiles in all bedrooms, teak wood frame door, concealed copper wiring with conduits etc.The Lawnz is a RERA Certified Project. The Lawnz also provides numerous essential amenities for its residents like power backup, swimming pool, lift, security, park, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, guest accommodation, gym, indoor games room, kids play area, flower gardens, library, water storage, indoor squash & badminton court, multipurpose court, waste disposal, conference room, fire fighting equipment etc.Highpoints:The Lawnz has special lifestyle amenities like a three-level club house, jogging & strolling track and cycling & jogging track. It is located in a vibrant community of Gachibowli, Hyderabad with fully equipped amenities, utilities and excellent connectivity to other areas. Utilities like Ocean Park bus stop, MN Capital shopping mall, The Future Kids School, Continental Hospitals, ICICI Bank ATM, Apollo Pharmacy, Lemon Mart Supermarket, Cafe Sandwicho, Magadha Park, Indian Oil petrol pump etc. all lie in close vicinity to the project.
about_project_details: Sivaa Shakthi Constructions is a renowned group in the real estate industry. With projects of high quality, reasonable cost and prompt delivery, the company has earned the trust of the industry. Catering to the needs of the middle and upper middle classes, the group constructs projects that are thoughtfully designed to fulfil all the needs and aspirations of its customers. With a zeal to achieve the best in class quality and deliver the finest of structures, the company asserts on strict quality measures and good quality materials for the process of construction. Adhering to sincerity and being timely and trust worthy, the group has reached the zenith of popularity and success. Focusing on perfection and with a desire for improvement, the group carefully studies the feedbacks of its previous customers and also maintains good relations with them post completion of projects. Sold exclusively by Sivaa Shakthi Constructions without the intervention of any third party.

project_description: Overview:Pearl Celestial is a project by BPR Infrastructure Limited located in Kokapet, Hyderabad offering lavish and currently undergoing construction 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It consists of 107 units spanned over 1 tower. Pearl Celestial price rate starts from Rs. 57.6 Lac onward. Project Details:Pearl Celestial is skilfully located in Kokapet, Hyderabad offering spacious and lavish 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Pearl Celestial plot areas of its 2 BHK flat range from 1206 sq. ft. to 2527 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1510 sq. ft. to 2909 sq. ft. The project is epitome of luxury and comfort living. The locality is booming and quite in demand for residential projects. Pearl Celestial apartments are designed with a strong structure and designer interiors like anti skid tiles, vitrified tiles flooring in every room, decorative doors, modular kitchen with stainless sink, premium quality CP fittings, and branded fixtures etc.Pearl Celestial provides numerous amenities like outdoor tennis court, jogging track, club house, power back up, swimming pool, lift, security, reserved parking, visitor parking, gym, indoor games room, kids play area, flower gardens, rain water harvesting, water storage, meditation area, internet & Wi-Fi connectivity, waste disposal etc. and many more.Highpoints:Pearl Celestial is located in a prime potential area of Kokapet, Hyderabad. The residential project provides the residents with a privileged lifestyle with state-of-the-art infrastructure and world class amenities. Pearl Celestial locality is just 2 km from Outer Ring Road, 3 km from Financial District, 3 km from Wipro Circle, 3 km from Continental Hospital and 14 km from Madhapur. Facilities in the vicinity include Ocean Park Bus Stop, The Future Kids School, MN Capital Shopping Mall, ICICI Bank ATM, Lemon Mart Supermarket, Apollo Pharmacy, Cafe Sandwicho, and Magadha Park, etc.
about_project_details: BPR Infrastructure Limited has 30 years of operational experience in Civil, Structural, Infrastructural and Electrical engineering services. BPRIL functions with a work system that is focused at achieving world-class benchmarks. Sound engineering practices with a passion for excellence and sticking to time schedules have taken BPRIL from strength to strength over decades.Led by Sri B. Prabhakar Reddy, a dynamic personality at the helm of affairs, BPRIL has a well-established presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, Maharashtra, Karnataka, Uttar Pradesh and Madhya Pradesh. It has built landmark buildings like Govt. Medical College at Nellore; Govt. Sainik School at Kalikiri, Chittoor; High Rise Apartments for Indore Development Authority at Indore, M.P.; Govt. Hospital at Nizamabad; High rise Buildings for Rajiv Swagruha Corporation at Pocharam; R.I.M.S. - Rajiv Gandhi Medical College in Kadapa; Gandhi Hospital at Musheerabad, Hyderabad; Haj House at Nampally, Hyderabad; Singareni Collieries residential housing in Kothagudem. BPRIL roster of clients includes A.P.M.S.I.D.C, Indore Development Authority, A.P.E.W.I.D.C., NIRD, ACHARYA N.G. Ranga Agricultural University to name a few.A professional team of project managers, engineers and quantity surveyors aided by the most modern construction equipment render the highest standards to all their projects. BPRIL foray into Real Estate is aimed at delivering the finest habitats that demonstrate social and environment responsibility.

project_description: Loaded with a galaxy of top-class amenities, SMR Vinay Iconia located in Kondapur, Hyderabad invite you to a brand new world of high-class living. Developed by SMR Builders Pvt. Ltd, this magnificent creation spread across 22 acres of lush greenery boasts 2400 residential homes distributed among 11 well-placed towers. Ranging from 1245 sqft to 2950 sqft, these units are available with configurations of 2, 3 & 4 BHKs. The flat rates of SMR Vinay Iconia Kondapur, Hyderabad are priced within the bracket of Rs. 65 Lacs - 1.46 Cr. Project details Impeccably designed with wonderful floor plans, the well-ventilated residential apartments of SMR Vinay Iconia Kondapur, Hyderabad are an ultimate choice to invest your money into. Gentle breeze & sunlight swaying across all the rooms will surely make your every moment of your life special. The project is still under-construction with possession of the flats guaranteed by September 2017.Located in the bustling locality of Kondapur, Hyderabad – this ambitious project is truly a delight for home buyers. 3-level cellar car parking, swimming pool, table tennis, jogging track, aerobics center, etc., are some of the notable amenities provided. Highpoints Besides, being GHMC & HMDA approved – SMR Vinay Iconia is RERA certified project which make it an ambitious residential project. Features such as no common walls between any two residential units ensure complete privacy and security. This project is also one-of-a-kind as it offers Helipad facility. It also enjoys seamless connectivity to various IT clusters like Raheja Mind space, Wipro, Infosys, Gachibowli IT Hub and many more. Schools & hospitals found within close proximity include Delhi Public School, Meridian School, Image hospitals, KIMS hospital and Apollo Hospitals. Inorbit Mall, City Capital, Barbeque Nation and Coastal Spice are some of well-known recreational places nearby to hang out. So, hurry up and book a flat now in SMR Vinay Iconia Kondapur, Hyderabad and enter into a world of urban living.
about_project_details: SMR Holdings At SMR Holdings, we value our vision, which is top-quality constructions and we believe its this earnest vision that has laid the foundation to our success and also has rendered us the status of uniqueness. Indeed, we have been reckoned as one of the leading construction houses in South India and we have been emphatically positioning ourselves to contribute to our customers by giving our best. The most significant factor considered while building beautiful homes is the conviction; as we take great pride in our integrity and commitment. We adhere to all the important factors involved and have an eye for intricate details. At SMR, we believe not just in the details but also in the comprehensive process, with focus on project management and quality control, we have been giving our customers world-class spaces to live in.

project_description: Hivision Residency is a project by Hivision Builders located in Kompally Hyderabad.  It is build on an area of 5 Acre encompassing 40 units across 22 towers. The floorings are made of Vitrified Tiles and Ceramic Tiles.  Hivision Residency comprises of 1BHK, 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK Flat.  1BHK Flat has a range of area from 700 Sq-ft to 980 Sq-ft having 1 balcony and 1 bathroom. 2BHK Flat has a range of area from 980 Sq-ft to 1300 Sq-ft having 1 and 2 balcony and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has a range of area from 1300 Sq-ft to 1700 Sq-ft having 2 and 3 balcony and 3 bathroom. 4BHK Flat has a range of area from 1600 Sq-ft to 2350 Sq-ft having 2 and 3 balcony and 4 bathroom.  Launched in June 2012, Hivision Residency offers Ready To Move properties. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, HDFC, ICICI, Punjab National Bank, SBI and Syndicate Bank. The major Amenities in the project are  Park, Large Open space and Solar Energy. Lift, Banquet Hall, Cafeteria/Food Court, Conference Room and Multipurpose Hall. Multipurpose Courts, Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts and AEROBICS ROOM. Private Terrace/Garden, Large Clubhouse and Premium branded fittings. .
about_project_details: Few in the real estate world take pride in the homes they build like HIVISION does. about_project_details: Over the last 2 decades, we have executed numerous projects, to a tune of over 25 Lac square feet, with distinctive amenities successfully. We have always aimed at providing excellence in qualitative construction within budgetary requirements and time deadlines. Because, quality has always been our priority, our project execution has always been with special emphasis on proper drinking water facilities, ventilation, enhanced space utility , sufficient parking areas and the comfort of a green environment , coupled with state of the art amenities and a luxurious gated community living.We take immense pride in our long-term liaison with committed and skilled worker-force, some of them who have been with us right from the start. As we look ahead, we believe in maintaining and enhancing the eminence of our relationship with our clients and employees to greater levels and making a significant contribution to the betterment of our community and the construction industry. In a fast growing city like Hyderabad, quality is the need of the hour and we endeavour to play our devoted role in providing such homes at affordable rates. project_description: Overview: Sree Vaishno Enclave is an elegant residential project by Sree Vaishno Constructions located in Kompally, Hyderabad offering lavish and state of the art 3 BHK luxurious villas. Sree Vaishno Enclave price rate for these villas start at Rs. 87 Lac onward. The infrastructure is ready for possession and has 44 units spanned over 2 towers. Project Details:    Sree Vaishno Constructions has developed Sree Vaishno Enclave with a well planned infrastructure in the happening locality of Kompally, Hyderabad and is offering luxuriously designed and crafted 3 BHK villas. Sree Vaishno Constructions plot areas for its 3 BHK villa range from 1824 sq. ft. to 2011 sq. ft. Every villa is precisely designed with high tech facilities and a strong foundation. Sree Vaishno Enclave Hyderabad villas are developed with specifications like ceramic tiles and vitrified tiles flooring, attractive teak wood frame doors and aesthetically crafted shutters, concealed PVC conduit copper wiring with branded modular switches, kitchen with granite platform and stainless steel sink, powder coated UPVC sliding windows, designer bathroom with good quality sanitary ware and jaguar or equivalent CP fittings etc. Sree Vaishno Enclave features world class amenities such as a club house, cafeteria, bar & lounge, jogging & strolling track, outdoor tennis courts, private terrace & garden, barbeque pit, dance studio, power back up, swimming pool, reserved parking, banquet hall, gymnasium, children’s play area, DTH television facility, landscape garden, laundry service, library, piped gas, canopy walk, rentable community space, multipurpose courts etc. including many more.Highpoints:Sree Vaishno Enclave is developed with premium luxury villas equipped with all kinds of world class facilities. Sree Vaishno Enclave Hyderabad locality is easily accessible via different roads and also has various civic utilities in the vicinity such as Sri Balaji Medical, Dr G Satyanarayana Raju Hospital, Axis Bank ATM, Vahini Stores, Jayabheri Park, etc.

project_description: It’s here. It’s bigger and it’s better than any home you have set your eyes on. The perfect fusion of luxury and resplendence - Fortune Prime. The latest and probably the most high-end offering in the bustling locale of Madhapur, from the house of the highly reputed Sri Sreenivasa Constructions.Every aspect of Fortune Prime has been planned and thought over a million times by some of the best minds in the real estate domain, only to put a thousand watt smile on your face. And make the world go green with envy. Come home to Fortune Prime. Come home to luxurious living.
about_project_details: DSR Group was established more than 2 decades ago in 1988 with the vision of transforming the real estate industry and today after the journey of so many years, its projects stand testimony to the shining excellence and brilliance in execution. Commanding an unparalleled expertise, the group has spread its operations across South India across many real estate verticals, catering to various categories of clients. DSRs repertoire has a wide array of exclusive projects which have been crafted to international standards.With diversified business interests across many portfolios, DSR today has achieved staggering success, thanks to its partners, associates, and employees. Its success is shared and cherished among its people who work towards the common goal of a promising and prosperous future. Customer satisfaction is the corner stone of our companys philosophy. We constantly strive for perfection in our service by understanding the customer needs and providing innovative and customized real estate solutions. The locations of our projects are so carefully chosen that they provide immense potential for investment.All through its existence, DSRs ideals of quality, innovation, and attention to the needs of its clients have always been of utmost importance. These ideals remain at the core of every endeavor of DSR. The DSR brand itself stands for quality, commitment, and innovation which manifest in all that it does and stands for. The group has several projects underway in Bangalore, Hyderabad, and Chennai catering to the customer with varied needs and tastes. Professional to the core and passionate about standards in construction, the company is moving fast forward into the future.

The international airport is easily accessible and can be reached in 15 minutes max because the place is well connected by public transport and a great infrastructure. What's more, it takes just 45 minutes to reach the City Centre.More heartening is the fact that BPCR Landmark is located close to some of the best international educational institutions, hospitals and the main IT hub. In a single sentence, its right at the heart of where the future of Hyderabad is.

project_description: OverviewLaunched by the well known DSR Groups, DSR Reganti shelters 2 towers with 90 residential units that extends a warm welcome for you to live in. DSR Reganti  flat prices are budgeted within Rs. 1.67 Cr - 2.40 Cr. However, all of these units are offered with freehold ownership rights.Project detailsDSR Reganti floor plans include 3BHK and 4BHK flats that are spanning over 2525 sqft to 3500 sqft.   Positioned in the most fastest growing city of the world, this project is sited in  Madhapur, Hyderabad. Browse through DSR Reganti  photos for a brief overview.  The 3BHK are spanning over 2525 sqft whereas the 4BHK are spread across 2900 sqft to 3500 sqft.  You will be impressed by the attractive look of the exteriors and interiors. Also, the flooring is done with vitrified tiles that adds up to the beauty of this house. Moreover, chefs will love this kitchen as it is well set up with stainless steel sink and granite platform.Available on rent, DSR Reganti flats are worth every penny of your investment.  They are airy, bright with lush green surroundings that all together provide you a healthy lifestyle. DSR Reganti  rent is quite  affordable and well within your budget. Download DSR Reganti brochure for a detailed description regarding this property. However, this project is located in one of the most demanded area as most of the IT companies are setting up their global business in this location.HighpointsOffering pool of amenities, this project provides you with a lavish and luxurious life.A well equipped clubhouse is the highlighted feature of this project.For sport lovers, there is outdoor tennis courts and swimming pool.Tight security through guards is provided. Also, it is supported by 100 percent power backup.Reserved parking and visitor parking are allotted. Dont miss this chance to live a royal life. Book now

project_description: Overview Jubilee Cyber Grande Madhapur, Hyderabad is an ultra-modern housing society offering a golden choice of buying 3 BHK flats that are well-sized from 1781 – 2093 sqft. The society features total 65 flats spread across 2 imposing towers. The project is built by Jubilee Infratech Pvt. Ltd., and the price list of Jubilee Cyber Grande varies from Rs. 1.01 Cr to Rs. 1.14 Cr. Project details                                                              Settled in one amongst the most vibrant location of Madhapur, Hyderabad and offering panoramic views of the spectacular Durgam Cheruvu – Jubilee Cyber Grande address is eventually the ideal choice for modern day home-buyers. World-class design and an endless list of modern facilities are some of the breath taking features of this residential oasis. Jubilee Cyber Grande 3 BHK flats are well-ventilated and precisely designed as per the rules of vaastu. Jubilee Cyber Grande floor plans are well-appreciated with thoughtful reviews and the excellent location with availability of all means of public transportations is also a prominent feature of this gated society. This promising residential establishment has been studded with all the following features:Activity deck, canopy walk, rain water harvesting, aerobics room, recreational pool and a retail boulevard.Clubhouse, indoor games room, kids play area, swimming pool, dance studio, cafeteria and a private terraced garden.Maintenance staff, kids club, RO water system, multipurpose courts, kids play pool with water slides and outdoor tennis courts are also provided.Fire fighting equipment, indoor squash, badminton courts, piped gas connection and banquet hall are also included. Highpoints The high-brand internal specifications of these flats are truly the highlight of these luxurious 3 BHK flats. Madhapur is a well-connected locality and is regarded as one of the hottest investment destination of Hyderabad. The return on investment (ROI) is also comparatively high in this area. So, hurry up and book a flat now; for any further details, go through the brochure & photos of Jubilee Cyber Grande.

project_description: My Home Abhra is a project by My Home Constructions Pvt. Ltd. strategically located in Madhapur Hyderabad.  It is build on an area of 5 Acre encompassing 387 units across 5 towers. The floorings are made of Amalgamated Marble/Imported Marble Flooring of Reputed Make, Double Charged Vitrified Tiles 600 X 600, Granite Platform with Stainless Steel Sink and Rustic Vitrified Tile of Reputed Make.  My Home Abhra comprises of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK Flat.  2BHK Flat has area 2315 Sq-ft . 3BHK Flat has range of area from 2300 Sq-ft to 3500 Sq-ft having 1, 2 and 3 balcony and 3 and 4 bathroom. 4BHK Flat has range of area from 2595 Sq-ft to 4770 Sq-ft having 3 and 4 balcony and 3 and 4 bathroom.  Launched in July 2012, My Home Abhra offers Ready To Move properties. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, HDFC, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank, SBI and Syndicate Bank.

about_project:
https://www.magicbricks.com/propertyDetails/otherProjectsByDeveloper.html?psmid=5026856&devId=60016&devName=My Home Constructions Pvt. Ltd.&cityName=Hyderabad&cityId=2060&postingType=P&aboutDeveloper=
Hyderabad’s real estate market has grown leaps and bounds during the last few decades and the city has emerged as major technology, research and education hub during the same time creating abundant opportunities in these sectors.

My Home Constructions has re-defined Hyderabad’s real estate market and the landscape has seen what it takes to offer the best of the best! All of the ventures to have come out of My Home stable bear testimony to our world-class standards and top-of-the-line amenities. We share our customers’ values and this has been the reason to our success by having built over 3 million SFT across 14 of our landmark projects amongst which are the famous My Home Tycoon, My Home Rainbow, My Home Navadweepa and My Home Hub.
JEWEL IS ONE OF A KIND.
With My Home Jewel, we have added many ‘firsts’ to our list and quite a few feathers to our hat. The project, first of its kind in Hyderabad is spread across 31.5 lakh SFT and houses 2,016 flats. While we have reached the monumental 3 million mark with all of our previous projects combined, My Home Jewel, the mega apartment complex alone is over 3 million square feet in area.
QUALITY. VALUE. LOYALTY.
We keep the tradition of blending aesthetics with functionality alive. My Home Constructions, the powerhouse, is powered by green technology and with a talented team of engineers and project managers; we have delivered top-notch quality and happiness in all of our residential and commercial high-rises. project_description: Overview: Nakshatra Pride is a well planned residential project developed by Gangothri Builders and Developers located in Manikonda, Hyderabad offering spacious and elegantly crafted 3 BHK apartments. The project is ready for possession and consists of 150 well designed units spanned over 2 towers. Nakshatra Pride apartment price rate starts at Rs. 66.7 Lac onward. Project Details:Nakshatra Pride Hyderbad, a project developed in the locality of Manikonda by Gangothri Builders and Developers is offering the best of elegantly crafted 3 BHK apartments. Nakshatra Pride floor plan for its 3 BHK flats comes in various dimensions ranging from 1723 sq. ft. to 2247 sq. ft. Nakshatra Pride apartments are meticulously designed with high quality interiors and features like ceramic tiles and vitrified tiles flooring in all rooms, wooden laminated doors with attractive fittings and elegant locks, designer internal doors, concealed electrical wiring with premium quality PVC conduits, kitchen with stainless steel sink and tiles dado, aluminium sliding windows with granite sill, designer bathroom with good quality CP fittings and sanitary ware fixtures etc. Nakshatra Pride features the infrastructure with world class amenities and facilities like club house, cycling & jogging track, private terrace & garden, power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security facilities, park, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, banquet hall, gymnasium, rain water harvesting, flower gardens, RO water system, water storage, vaastu compliant, internet & Wi-Fi connectivity, outdoor tennis courts, and fire fighting equipment etc. among others.Highpoints: Nakshatra Pride is the perfect blend of modern and elegance in its architectural look. The residents can experience the lavish yet comfortable features of the project. Nakshatra Pride Hyderbad locality is nicely connected to the rest of the city and has various utilities like schools, colleges, hospitals, pharmacy, grocery store, gym, park, etc. in close vicinity.
about_project_details: Headquartered in Hyderabad, Gangothri Developers is a fully integrated real estate development company that is making waves in this realm since its inception in 2005. The company offers its customers an opportunity to achieve their dream property through unique offerings which are tailored to meet every budget. The company is unswerving in preserving its core values - customer satisfaction, transparency and quality.While providing its customers the finest craftsmanship and outstanding service they deserve, the company prides on being skilled and experienced in all aspects of real estate development and construction. Long before others, the company acknowledged that commitment to the environment is not just social responsibility, but also good business practice and thus rigorously ensures its implementation.Not resting upon the accolades it has earned, the company is forever passionate about achieving new goals and scaling new highs. A case in point is its accomplishment of developing and selling of about 2000 residential plots spread over an expanse of about 150 Acres. The noteworthy fact here is that this phenomenal performance was carried through in a short span of just 3 years.

project_description: ACE Atlantis is a project by Ace Constructions located in Khaja Guda, Hyderabad, offering luxurious designed currently under construction 3 BHK apartments. It consists of 165 units spanned over 1 tower. 24k Opula price rate starts from Rs. 70 Lac onward. It is equipped with all basic amenities and various civic utilities nearby.     Project Details:ACE Atlantis located in Khaja Guda, Hyderabad, is a project by Ace Constructions, with their 24 years of real estate experience are offering spacious and lavish currently under construction 3 BHK apartments. ACE Atlantis plot areas for its 3 BHK flat range from 1400 sq. ft. to 2350 sq. ft. ACE Atlantis apartments are designed with earthquake resistant RCC frame structure, premium quality anti skid, vitrified tiles flooring, laminated wooden flooring in the master bedroom, teak wood frame door, modular kitchen with stainless sink, etc.ACE Atlantis is a RERA Certified Project. ACE Atlantis also provides many essential amenities for its residents like 24*7 power back up, lift, 24*7 security facility, park, reserved parking, visitor parking, maintenance staff, kids play area, flower gardens, rain water harvesting, water storage, fire fighting equipments etc. and many more.Highpoints:ACE Atlantis is strategically placed in a prime location of Hyderabad. The property has a beautiful infrastructure fully equipped with all basic amenities and close by to various civic utilities. It is just 0.6 km from Pacific Hospital, 2.2 km from Andhra Bank ATM and 2.5 km from Secretariat Colony Bus Stop. Various utilities like Lanco Hills Bus Stop, Shoppers Stop, Oakridge International School, Karur Vysya Bank ATM, Pacific Hospitals Pvt. Ltd., PVR Cinemas, Red Fox Hotel, Indian Oil petrol pump, More Supermarket, MedPlus Mart, Khajaguda Rock Climbing etc. all lie in close by vicinity of the project.

project_description: OverviewGreenspace The Hive from Greenspace Housing, Manikonda offers an opportunity to experience a contemporary lifestyle  This project covers an area of 1.69 acres and offers 132 units spread across 2 towers. Greenspace The Hive floor plan includes 2BHK and 3BHK units for sale that range within 1205 2495 sqft with price ranging between Rs. 50.3 Lac - 82.3 Lakhs.About the projectApproved by GHMC , Greenspace The Hive, Hyderabad, Telangana is 100 percentage vaastu compliant. This well ventilated project is provided with 76 percent open spaces and receives abundant natural light making it delightful to live in.The 2BHK units range from 1205 sqft to 1278 sqft and 3BHK units are within 1600 sqft to 2495 sqft.  This project is currently under construction and will be handed over by February 2018.You can experience the best lift style as this project offers recreational facilities like a unique club house, swimming pool, security, intercom facility, banquet hall, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids play area, air conditioned, indoor squash and badminton courts and kids play pool with water slides.  Apart from this, tight security through CCTV surveillance, guards and Intercom makes these apartments completely safe to live in.HighpointsThe apartments in Green Space The Hive, Hyderabad, Telangana is located in the well known suburb of Manikonda budding as a preferred residential area and a popular commercial hub in the city. Moreover, it is developing as a favoured environment for those IT professionals who are working in Gatchibowli and HITEC City. Delhi Public School, the Rajiv Gandhi International Airport through Outer Ring Road and Lanco Road are accessible in close proximity. Various basic establishments are in vicinity, including the Rock Park, that overall makes this locality profitable.Dont miss this opportunity to view Greenspace The Hive photos and dwell in this luxurious project.So hurry up

project_description: Lanco Hills provides the perfect ambience for the individual to discover their hidden talent and even a champion inside. After I made Lanco Hills my home, I found a new passion in the game of Racquetball.I developed a passion for the game and started hitting the courts at 6 am, everyday! My family and friends were surprised to see me wake up so early and adopt a strict discipline of playing every day and improve my game. Indeed it was a new lifestyle for me, but one that added exhilaration to an otherwise mundane routine. The turning point came when in March 2014 when our Club Zeus at Lanco Hills hosted the first international Racquetball tourney in India. I was thrilled when among 62 participants from across the world I won the Runners up title in the men’s singles.

about_project_details: Urbanization and development need not necessarily be at the cost of sacrificing natural habitat. Aryamitra aims to build projects, which suit the modern needs and the urban life style. Aryamitra Flora - A Premium Luxury Apartment Project is a classic example of how modern architecture is aptly blended with natural materials and eco-friendly ambience. Aryamitra Flora truly complements the surrounding historical neighbourhood on one side and rapidly growing IT corridor on the other, while retaining the individuality and uniqueness, just like you. With Aryamitra Flora, you enjoy the best of both the worlds. Aryamitra Flora - an Integrated Premium Luxury Residential Project is designed to offer a distinctive look with a stunning landscape. Aryamitra Flora is a unique project conceived in the most happening and rapidly growing Alkapur Township in Neknampur. It appears like one large home.

project_description: Gowra Green Living is a project by Gowra Hallmark Townships Private Limited located in Manikonda Hyderabad.  It is build on an area of 5 Acre encompassing 254 units across 1 towers. The floorings are made of Vitrified Tiles and Anti Skid Ceramic Tiles.  Gowra Green Living comprises of 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK Flat.  1BHK Flat has area 836 Sq-ft . 2BHK Flat has a range of area from 836 Sq-ft to 1320 Sq-ft . 3BHK Flat has a range of area from 1566 Sq-ft to 2531 Sq-ft having 3 balcony and 2 and 3 bathroom.  Launched in December 2013, Gowra Green Living offers Ready To Move properties. The project is approved by Hyderabad Metropolitan Development Authority. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, HDFC, ICICI, IDBI, Punjab National Bank and SBI.

project_description: Overview Aryamitra Flora by Aryamitra Properties is a beautiful ongoing residential development located in the most favorable location of Manikonda, Hyderabad. Laid out across 2 acres of prime land, this project features total 126 residential units distributed among three towers. The scheduled possession date of these 2 & 3 BHK flats is December 2018 and the flat rates of Aryamitra Flora are priced starting from Rs.55.5 Lacs and moving up to Rs. 92.1 Lacs. Project details Those looking for an outstanding flat seasoned with luxurious ingredients, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Aryamitra Flora are a perfect option. The brilliant design and the wide range of fancy amenities make this paradise an ultimate place to settle in. Spacious floor plans of Aryamitra Flora apartments have been adored with good reviews. The positive aura and the refreshing breeze of these abodes invite you to live an enchanting and healthy lifestyle where every moment spent with your family becomes memorable. Built with complete finesse, the aesthetic feel of these well-designed homes will surely impress you. Every abode is complemented with large balconies which not only allow fresh air to seep in but also bestow incredible views of the surrounding area. Premium amenities like a fully loaded gymnasium, CCTV surveillance for 24x7, intercom facility for every flat and much more assure a smooth & convenient lifestyle. Highpoints Bustling with several commercial & residential activities, Manikonda is one of the hottest investment destination of Hyderabad. Presence of various IT companies, schools, hospitals and shopping malls make this area more attractive. Hassle-free connectivity to public transports, Hitec City Railway Station & Rajiv Gandhi International Airport make this residence more beneficial. If you planning to make a safe and lucrative investment, then this RERA certified project is the perfect bet. So, walk in and book a flat now in Aryamitra Flora.

project_description: Overview: Nakshatra Pristine is a well planned project by Gangothri Developers located in Alkapur Township, Hyderabad offering luxurious and spaciously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project consists of 55 units spanned over 1 tower and is currently ongoing construction. Nakshatra Pristine price rate starts at Rs. 42.5 Lac onward. Project Details:    Nakshatra Pristine by Gangothri Developers thoughtfully located in Alkapur Township, Hyderabad is offering skilfully crafted luxurious 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. Nakshatra Pristine plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1287 sq. ft. to 1315 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1655 sq. ft. to 1920 sq. ft. Nakshatra Pristine features numerous world class amenities like cafeteria, swimming pool, lift, security facilities, park, maintenance staff, banquet hall, gymnasium, indoor games room, children’s play area, landscape garden, rain water harvesting, waste disposal, multipurpose courts, vaastu compliant, club house, grand entrance lobby, multipurpose hall, and event space etc. including many more for the residents. Nakshatra Pristine Hyderabad apartments are designed with specifications like RCC frame structure, anti skid ceramic tiles and premium quality vitrified tiles flooring, teak wood frame doors, granite kitchen platform with SS bowl sink, UPVC window system with MS grill, ISI mark concealed copper wiring with modular switches, good quality sanitary ware and CP fittings, etc. Highpoints:Nakshatra Pristine is designed with a modern contemporary architectural design and feature exquisite and lavishly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The residents can enjoy a green and serene surrounding from their well ventilated and spacious flats. Nakshatra Pristine Hyderabad landmarks in close vicinity include Narsingi Lake Bus Stop, Scholars International School, Karur Vysya Bank ATM, Nursing Home, Apollo Pharmacy, Heritage Fresh Store, Haritha Restaurant, Mahatma Gandhi Park, Trabhi Yoga Studio, and Trabhi Yoga Studio etc.
about_project_details: Headquartered in Hyderabad, Gangothri Developers is a fully integrated real estate development company thats making waves in this realm since its inception in 2005. The company offers its customers an opportunity to achieve their dream property through unique offerings which are tailored to meet every budget. The company is unswerving in preserving its core values - customer satisfaction, transparency and quality.While providing its customers the finest craftsmanship and outstanding service they deserve, the company prides on being skilled and experienced in all aspects of real estate development and construction. Long before others, the company acknowledged that commitment to the environment is not just social responsibility, but also good business practice and thus rigorously ensures its implementation.Not resting upon the accolades it has earned, the company is forever passionate about achieving new goals and scaling new highs. A case in point is its accomplishment of developing and selling of about 2000 residential plots spread over an expanse of about 150 Acres. The noteworthy fact here is that this phenomenal performance was carried through in a short span of just 3 years.
project_highlights:

IT conglomerates like Wipro, Infosys, ISB, Polaris, CA and ILS park, proposed American Consulate and Emaar Golf CourseIT, Financial hubs such as Gachibowli, Madahpur, Hi-tech CityHealthcare, shopping and recreation assured at nearby locales like Jubilee Hills, Mehdipatnam, Madhapur, KokapetInternational Airport easily accessible through wide ORR roads, 5-15min IT, Financial HubsProject USP:Luxurious Apartments Feature Exquisite Contemporary Styling

project_description: Lanco Hills Apartments, a luxurious & premiumresidential project in Hyderabad is truly a lavish affair to invest in.Designed and developed Lanco Hills Technology Park, this residential apartmentin Hyderabad comprises of gallant towers that are artistically built withhigh-rise structures. The strategically Lanco Hills, Hyderabad consists of 2BHK, 3 BHK A& 4 BHK apartments, the price of 3 BHK flats range variesaccording to the constructional area i.e. 2081 Sqft-2116 Sqft costs is around1.01 Cr and 2765 Sqft -2795 Sqft starts from around 1.36 Cr., there are 521towers, all of them equipped with excellent amenities and modern technologies.This is a USD 1.5 billion mega-project that aims to provide the modernlifestyle to its dwellers, it is a combined effort of best architects,consultants & engineers who have contributed to the development of thiswonderful building. Project DetailsWith gardens and pools, Lanco Hills Apartments arepositioned to offer a lot of space and airy feeling to its inhabitants. Eachtower of the apartment is designed with attractive shades and reliablematerial. Adding to this, you can enjoy the amazing sight of the entirelandscape through the glass facades and leave you mesmerized. Lanco Hillsoffers a supreme world within to its residents, with world-class facilitieslike Club House, Jogging and Strolling Track, Power Back Up, Cycling &Jogging Track, Lift, Security, Swimming Pool, Park, Visitor Parking, ReservedParking, Intercom Facility, Committed Maintenance Staff, Banquet Hall, IndoorGames Room, Gymnasium, Kids Play Area, DTH Television Facility, Flower Gardens,Aerobics Room, Library & Business Centre, Water Storage, Indoor Squash& Badminton Courts, Multipurpose Courts, Internet/Wi-Fi Connectivity, EarlyLearning Centre, Fire Fighting Equipment, Waste Disposal and so on. If you areplanning to invest in apartments in Hyderabad than, Lanco Hills is all set toprovide all modern facilities under one roof with least efforts. HighpointsSeamless access to recreational facilities, entertainmentareas, surrounding and neighbourhood, makes this project an ideal property tobuy. The beautiful Lanco Hills is positioned in a posh area that is nearby torenowned Kidzee Preschool, Nekampur X Roads Bus Stop, Andhra Bank ATM, Sri ParvathiRama Lingeswara Swamy Temple. Also, the international airport is just 20minutes’ drive from the location. The smooth connectivity to all the key areasmakes Lanco Hills a perfect place to live in. So, what are you waiting now?Book your apartment in Lanco Hills, Hyderabad and make it your permanentaddress.

project_description: Suvela Sai Sukhdhaam is a residential development project by Suvela Projects Private Limited, located in Miyapur, Hyderabad offering skilfully crafted and lavishly designed 3 BHK apartments. Suvela Sai Sukhdhaam price rate for these luxurious apartments start at Rs. 46 Lac onward. The infrastructure is currently ongoing construction and will develop 99 units spanned over 1 well planned tower. Project DetailsSuvela Sai Sukhdhaam, a lavish project located strategically in Miyapur, Hyderabad by Suvela Projects Private Limited is offering skilfully crafted and luxuriously designed 3 BHK apartments. Suvela Sai Sukhdhaam plot areas for its 3 BHK flat range from 1269 sq. ft. to 1443 sq. ft. Suvela Sai Sukhdhaam apartments are designed with RCC frame structure and high standard interior features like vitrified tiles and anti skid ceramic tiles flooring in every unit, teak wood frame doors and flush shutters, UPVC windows, granite kitchen platform with stainless steel sink and tiles dado over platform, concealed electrical wiring with modular switches and sufficient points, emulsion paint, and standard make CP fittings etc. Suvela Sai Sukhdhaam Hyderabad provides its residents with modern day amenities and facilities such as a large club house, cafeteria, bar & lounge, private terrace & garden, dance studio, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security facilities, park, intercom facility, banquet hall, gymnasium, kids play area, aerobics room, flower gardens, rain water harvesting, canopy walk, indoor squash & badminton courts, multipurpose courts, meditation area, sky deck, health club, large open space, and event space etc. HighpointsSuvela Sai Sukhdhaam Hyderabad locality is also a key feature as it is nicely connected and is close to IT Hub, schools, bus stop, railway station, colleges, grocery store, pharmacy, park, restaurants, and petrol pump, etc. among others are all in near proximity for the residential project.

project_description: Overview: Raghavendra Panchajanya is a residential project by Raghavendra Constructions based in the happening locality of Miyapur, Hyderabad offering elegantly designed luxurious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It is ready for possession and consists of 223 units spread over 5 meticulously planned towers.  Project Details:Raghavendra Panchajanya Hyderbad, a luxurious project offering elegantly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments in the booming locality of Miyapur. Raghavendra Panchajanya floor plan for its 2 BHK flat ranges from 794 sq. ft. to 1140 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas ranges from 1500 sq. ft. to 1590 sq. ft. Apartments in Raghavendra Panchajanya are designed with vitrified tiles flooring in all rooms and anti skid ceramic tiles flooring in toilet, teak wood frame main doors with teak veneer polished skin moulded designed shutters, teak wood frame internal doors, concealed copper wiring with PVC conduits and modular switches, granite kitchen cooking platform with stainless steel sink, aluminium windows with fully glazed glass and MS grills, jaguar CP fittings and good quality sanitary ware fixtures etc.Raghavendra Panchajanya amenities and facilities in the infrastructure include a club house, jogging and strolling track, cycling track, power back up, lift, 24 hour security facilities, park, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids play area, rain water harvesting, water storage, meditation area, waste disposal and event space and amphitheatre etc. to name a few. Highpoints: Raghavendra Panchajanya Hyderdabad is aiming for the best of living spaces with its luxurious apartments and large open space. Raghavendra Panchajanya location is well connected to the rest of the city and just 0.6 km from HMT Swarnapuri Colony Bus Stand, 7.1 km from Chandanagar Railway Station and 0.9 km from Janani Hospital. You can check out Raghavendra Panchajanya photos on magicbricks.

project_description: SMR Vinay Fountainhead developed by SMR Builders Pvt. Ltd. is a vibrant residential society located in Miyapur, Hyderabad. Spread across 9.1 acres of land parcels, this sublime project comprises of 4 well-positioned towers housing nearly 969 units. These residential units are available with 2 & 3-bedroom configurations ranging from 1085 sqft to 1935 sqft. The flat rates of SMR Vinay Fountainhead Miyapur, Hyderabad are priced within the range of Rs. 72.2 Lac – Rs. 90.0 Lac. Project details Available for both sale & rent, the well-ventilated residential apartments of SMR Vinay Fountainhead Miyapur, Hyderabad are a prefect dwelling place. Wrapped around by calm & tranquil atmosphere, these residential abodes are committed to provide every aspect of a heathier lifestyle. The pool of world-class amenities like swimming pool, gym, tennis court to name a few will certainly leave you amazed. 100% power backup, 24hours tight security and round the clock water supply make this project more desirable. Unwind yourself and celebrate every moment with your family in a grand style in this gorgeous residence.  Highpoints SMR Vinay Fountainhead is RERA certified project conveniently located just 15minutes away from Hitec City – one of the major IT hub of Hyderabad City. Situated just off the Bombay Highway, this project offers good proximity to the neighboring areas. Connectivity to public transport facilities is excellent which is yet another highpoint.Geethanjali Model, Shri Ram School of CBSE, DAV Public School, St. Mary's High School and St Martins High School are few reputed schools situated close by. Major hospitals like Aster Prime, ESI and Surakshaka Multi speciality are found close by to cater to the healthcare needs of the residents. So, hurry up and book a flat now in SMR Vinay Fountainhead Miyapur, Hyderabad and turn your dream of owning a happy home for your loved ones.
about_project_details: At SMR Holdings, we value our vision, which is top-quality constructions and we believe it is this earnest vision that has laid the foundation to our success and also has rendered us the status of uniqueness. Indeed, we have been reckoned as one of the leading construction houses in South India and we have been emphatically positioning ourselves to contribute to our customers by giving our best. The most significant factor considered while building beautiful homes is the conviction; as we take great pride in our integrity and commitment. Some of our constructions have gone on to become landmarks. The story of the evolution of SMR Holdings has been based on conviction and we believe its conviction alone which can propel us further.

project_description: OverviewVinay Hi Lands developed by SMR Builders Pvt. Ltd is sited in prominent location i.e. Miyapur, Hyderabad.  This project shelters 160 residential units that are studded in 6 elegant towers. Vinay Hi Lands price list is bracketed within an affordable range.Project detailsSpanning over 4 acres of vibrant greenery, this project is enclosed within gated community. Vinay Hi Lands floor plan features 2BHK and 3BHK flats spanning over 1260 sqft to 1910 sqft. The 2BHK flats are available within 1260 sqft whereas 3BHK flats are spanning over 1810 sqft to 1910 sqft. Vitrified flooring is done in kitchen, living/dining and kitchen. Modular kitchen is available and chefs will love it to the fullest.Positioned off Miyapur X Roads, Vinay Hi Lands flats of this project are well designed to fit the modern day requirements.  Nestled in the lap of greenery, every room of these flats are  filled with excellent cross ventilation.  Blessed with maximum cross ventilation, these bright and airy apartments will take your level of comfort one step higher. Vinay Hi Lands photos are available on the website  that will impress you with its  overall appearance. This project is located in the most fascinating address and its ambiance is filled with positivity that will uplift your lifestyle to the fullest.Applauded with positive reviews, Vinay Hi Lands has good access to IT hub at Gachibowli & HITEC city, JNT university,  engineering colleges, mega shopping malls, hospitals, restaurants and entertainment zones,  metro terminal and  many schools.HighpointsFacilities offered by this project are listed below: Club house, swimming pool,  gymnasium, kids play area and  indoor games room are few facilities offered. Reserved parking, intercom facility, library and business centre, rentable community space, water storage and power back up are few amenities available.Book now in Vinay Hi Lands, Miyapur, Hyderabad.
