project_description: My Home Jewel project by My Home constructions Pvt Ltd is strategically located at one of the richest infrastructural fabric hub of Miyapur at Hyderabad. My home jewel is one of the exclusive projects which is meticulously designed offering world class living at affordable pricing. The project is a enormous gated community with 2000 elegant residential units spread across 14 towers offering multiple size variants ranging from 2 & 3 BHK ready to move in residential flats from 1245 sqft to 1685 Sqft. My home jewel is a true assortment  of considerate features coupled with rich delicacy offering international standard living space. Designed and constructed by one of the top eminent builder of Hyderabad, they have offered affordable living spaces to millions of families today.The project is also valued fit on sustainable surrounding, nearby conveyance facilities and places of interest which suits the needs of all kinds of buyers. Some of the unique amenities provided by the builder include Club House, cafeteria/food court restaurants & Coffee lounge, strolling & jogging track and barbeque pit Some of the highlight amenities in closed proximity of projects include  Gangaram Bus Station at 0.9 km, Chandanagar Railway station at 1.6 km and St. Anns High School at 2.2 km.. Why should I buy? Within a short span of 36 years, My Home Constructions Pvt ltd. have successfully delivered to enormous projects and enjoy the reputation of one of eminent builder in Hyderabad today.Easy Finance options are available with many esteem banks & financial institute like Axis Bank, State Bank of India, HDFC Bank, ING Vyasa, Dena Bank, DHFL etc. which reflects their trustworthiness and transparency.Tower details along with Unit details (Configuration)My Homes Jewel, by My Home Constructions Pvt Ltd Miyapur offers 2 BHK and 3 BHK residential apartments within the area of 1245 Sqft to 1685 Sqft. Rate per sqft varies from INR 5044 to INR 6528 sqft with approximate costing of one residential apartment in the range of INR 65 Lacs to INR 1.10 Crs. Project has total of 2000 units with 14 towers and are available with ready to move in options.Near information, places of interest and landmarksProject has close proximity to Gangaram Bus Station at  0.9 Km, Chandanagar Railway Station at 1.6 Km and St Anns High School  at 2.2 Km..About the builderMy Home Constructions Pvt Ltd is a popular & established name in the real estate industry which is bagged by their three decades experience of delivering world class residential infrastructure since 1981.  Developers always ensure that they offer superior living, clear documentation process, world class infrastructure and timely delivery of their projects thereby creating happy communities.Other projects by the builderOher projects by My Home Constructions Pvt Ltd includes Manjari Apartment, by My Home Constructions Pvt Ltd Somajiguda, Hyderabad offering ready to move in residential apartments. Pricing & unit details are available on request.Projects nearbyNearby project includes Aditya Empress Tower by Aditya Housing And Infrastructure Development,  Shaikpet  offering 3 BHK Flat within the price range of 90.6 Lac - 1.37 Cr per residential unit.
about_project_details: 'My Home', a name to reckon with, in the construction industry, stands for the finest quality of design, construction and timely completion of every project undertaken by them. A member of the dynamic My Home Group, with interests in cement manufacturing and power generation, My Home Constructions has been spearheading the real estate revolution in the twin cities for over two decades. Their ventures are a living testimony to their exceptional quality norms and aesthetic appeal.Now, the same passion for perfection goes into the making of My Home Jewel, an elegant and mammoth residential layout that bears the quality stamp of My Home Constructions.

project_description: Overview:Reliance Builders, Mokila - Hyderabad have come up with a new project that has 3 and 4 BHK villas for those looking to live an independent life. The project is named Reliance Green Village, Hyderabad and it is one of its kind project in the city. The project consists of ready to move in units that are considerately constructed giving you a life that you have always wanted. Project Details:Reliance Green Village apartments consist of a total of 30 units that are spread evenly in the society giving you your privacy and allowing you to be one with the nature. The name is apt for this project as it is surrounded by beautiful green land that allows you to smell fresh air as you wake up and keeps the pollution of the city at bay. The Reliance Green Village floor plan ensures that you have spacious rooms that are bright and airy for a healthy and calm atmosphere at your home. The 3 BHK villas are spread over an area range of 2791 sqft to 2919 sqft and the 4 BHK villas in Reliance Green Village have an area between 3801 sqft and 5842 sqft.Maintenance staff, water storage, meditation area, lift, power back up, indoor games room, flower gardens, gymnasium, swimming pool, etc. are some of the facilities available in these villas.Other features include rain water harvesting, indoor squash and badminton courts, guest accommodation, kids play pool with water slides, reserved parking, etc.All the villas in this project are vaastu compliant and as per the reviews of Reliance Green Village the project offers you an unmatched peaceful living ambience. Highpoints:                        The best thing about this project is the huge club house that will help you relax when you feel winded.Make sure to go through the updated Reliance Green Village photos before you book your dream villa.
about_project_details: Established in 1988, led by Mr. M.Srinivasa Rao, MBA, Reliance Builders is a name whose credentials are best depicted by the various ventures that bear its distinctive stamp. Located in the Twin Cities Hyderabad and Secunderabad, the Organization's specific competencies include planning, designing and construction of residential and commercial complexes.The Organization is committed to creating 'superior investor value' to every one of its ventures by adhering to utmost quality, functionality, time-efficiency and cost effectiveness in their implementation. The Organization is credited with the construction of over a score of residential and commercial projects that dot the choicest locales of the City of Hyderabad, each one constituting a proud local landmark.Reliance Builders owes its success and sustained performance to its promoters - a group of renowned professionals with acknowledged credentials. Investing the organization with its intent, inspiration and direction, they have been able to steer the organization into the top-league of builders in the twin-cities. While having a core team of highly devoted and diligent employees who bring with them a broad-spectrum of skills, the Organization has an established a network of highly competent and experienced consulting professionals - architects, supervisors, contractors, vendors etc - to ensure that each project undertaken by the organization is professionally planned, designed and deployed.

project_description: OverviewFeaturing huge acres of green landscape along with the soothing and beautiful atmosphere, the Grand Neville Sunway Opus is situated amidst the nature. The Grand Neville Sunway Opus in Miyapur, Hyderabad is surrounded by gorgeous gardens, blossoming trees and emerald meadows. These luxurious, spacious and well- ventilated residential flats offer complete privacy as there are no shared walls between any two apartments. The ready to move- in Grand Neville Sunway Opus is equipped with 56 towers and 3BHK residential apartments that are 260 in total. Available for sale at prices starting from Rs. 60 lac, these flats are designed to offer affordable housing in Miyapur, Hyderabad and are available for sale in various sizes.Project detailIf you book a flat in Grand Neville Sunway Opus, you will get to live in calm surroundings and will get natural ventilation and sunlight inside your homes. Living in Grand Neville Sunway Opus will offer amazing landscape views from windows and the 10 feet wide side lanes in between the villa along with courtyards provides a sense of openness. At Magicbricks, you will find information like Grand Neville Sunway Opus floor plan, Grand Neville Sunway Opus price, Grand Neville Sunway Opus photos, flat, apartment price in Grand Neville Sunway Opus etc. The project is constructed by the Sunway Opus International Pvt. Ltd that is a reliable name in the real estate world and has been offering the best houses.Equipped with all the modern amenities and facilities, the luxurious Grand Neville Sunway Opus keeps your life happening and fun.-          Enjoy indoor and enclosed spa pool, cocktail lounge and bar, relaxed pool side café, modern gym, gourmet terrace etc. in the resort style clubhouse.-          Stay outside with jogging park, children’s play garden, cricket pitch and outdoor work station.The residential flats in Grand Neville Sunway Opus feature reinforced concrete frame, clay bricks on internal and external walls, main door with teakwood frames and shutters, internal doors with teak wood frame with flush door shutter, aluminum powder coated windows with flat glass panel vitrified tiles in living/dining room, kitchen and all bedrooms, anti- skid ceramic tiles in bathrooms and balconies, kitchen with stainless steel sink and colored glazed designer tiles upto false ceiling for walls, toilets with good quality vitreous pastel color wall mounted EWC, CP fittings and colored glazed designer tiles upto the false ceiling for walls.Strategically located, the Grand Neville Sunway Opus offers easy connectivity to public transport, Miyapur X Road, NH-9, Hi- Tech City, educational institutes, lake, schools, hospitals etc.
project_highlights:
Highlights


Conveniently accessible from the Miyapur X Road (200 feet road).Quick connect to NH 9.Close proximity and easily accessible to nearby Bus Terminal (2km) and Miyapur MRTS station (4km).Only 10 kilometers away from Hi-Tech City.Easy proximity to educational institutes like Sri Chaitanya College, Kennedy Public School and Silver Oaks.200 acres lake in the vicinity.

Sunway Opus is a partnership between Sunway City of Malaysia and Opus Developers of Hyderabad. 
Sunway City is an award-winning international property conglomerate with a track record of creating value through innovation. Sunway City is also the name behind some of Asia's top landmarks like the Sunway Pyramid Shopping Mall and Sunway Lagoon Theme Park. Among other things, it is renowned for introducing the concept of "Resort Living within the City" to Malaysia.

Sunway City is one of Malaysia's best-known and well-diversified conglomerates, with interests in property development, leisure, entertainment, hospitality, conventions, education and healthcare.

Opus is a leading consortium of builders and property developers in Hyderabad, India. With a collective experience of over 100 years, Opus is a name that stands for solid expertise.

project_description: OverviewDivya Sree Shakti Miyapur, Hyderabad is developed by the prestigious Divya Developers. The apartments in Divya Sree Shakti Price starts from 71 lakhs onwards. This project comprises of 11 huge towers that are inclusive of 900 residential flats. The sizes of these flats lie in the range of 1170 sqft to 1956 sqft area. Divya Sree Shakti photos give a better view for the new home seekers.About the ProjectDivya Sree Shakti is Hyderabad’s first extravagant combined township that aspires to mingle the tranquillity and a simple life with grace and elegance. Spread across 10 acres, this project features wonderfully constructed corporate offices, shopping, multilevel spaces etc. The floor plan of Divya Sree Shakti is configured to include 2 and 3 BHK residential units. Divya Sree Shakti resale flats are also available at an affordable price. DSS miyapur reviews are extremely positive for those who planning to own a flat here.This project also features a super specialty hospital, corporate office space, high quality shopping centres, renowned educational institutions, multiplex and day to day utilities. Divya Sree Shakti is the best place to reside in for those who wish to live in a calm and quiet environment. This project also enjoys access to epicurean delight eateries.This project also provides many ultra modern amenities like club house, tennis courts, jogging track, cycling track, swimming pool, lift, park, visitor parking, indoor games, kids play area etc. HighpointsThis project is ideally situated and is close to the major hus of Gachibowli and Hitech City. With such a close proximity to these two commercial hubs, going to work becomes convenient without the hassle of traffic. Undoubtedly, the location is a major highpoint of this project. So go ahead, and book an apartment now in this fabulous project.

project_description: Hemadurga Lakshmi Pride is Smartly crafted residential development project by Sharvani Builders & Realtors offering an extremely wide range of Spacious & skillfully designed 2BHK & 3BHK apartments with modern & well-equipped amenities in Pragathi Enclave, a notable locality of Miyapur situated in Hyderabad.Hemadurga Lakshmi Pride property is ready to move & is encompassing 300 units spanned over 3 towers.  Project Details Hemadurga Lakshmi Pride, an aesthetically designed residential project by renowned Real estate players, Sharvani Builders & Realtors is providing well-ventilated & secured  2BHk & 3BHk  residential apartments. Hemadurga Lakshmi Pride has been nested in Miyapur, a locality that enjoys proximity to other parts of the city through a huge network of Railways & Roadways in Hyderabad. Hemadurga Lakshmi Pride area of the 2BHK flat is between 800 -1275 sqft & 3BHK flat bears 1420 - 1960 sqft area. Interior specifications of Hemadurga Lakshmi Pride floors includes Decorative main Door with Teak wood frame & Shutte, Vitrified & Anti-Skid Ceramic Tiles flooring in all room, Luppam Finish on External walls, Emulsion Paint on Interior walls, Toilets with Premium Sanitary Ware & CP Fittings etc.  In affordable range The Hemadurga Lakshmi Pride provides ample of amenities like Club House, Cycling, Jogging & Strolling Track, Swimming Pool,  Uninterrupted Power supply with backup, Flowers Garden, 24 hours security system, Park & kids play area, lift, individual & visitors parking, Gymnasium,  Fire Fighting Equipment and many more. High Points Hemadurga Lakshmi Pride is an enclave of beautifully crafted affordable residential apartments which are well connected with other parts of the city through a network of Roads & highways making it a smart choice to invest. Hemadurga Lakshmi Pride is in  1-2 Km domain to civic facilities like Miyapur Bus Stop, St. Martins High School, Meher Plaza, PNB ATM, More Super Market, Medplus, Angaara Restaurant and many more.So, Don’t miss the chance of owning your dream home in a growing location.

project_description: SMR Vinay City is a project by SMR Builders Pvt. Ltd. located in Miyapur, Hyderabad offering lavishly designed ready to move 2 BHK apartments. It consists of 512 units spanned over 5 towers. SMR Vinay City price rate starts at Rs. 51 Lac onward. The project is fully equipped with amenities and also in close vicinity to various civic utilities.Project Details:SMR Vinay City located in Miyapur, Hyderabad, is a project by SMR Builders Pvt. Ltd. with 3 total projects under their belt, offers lavish ready to move 2 BHK apartments. SMR Vinay City plot area for its 2 BHK flat ranges from 1190 sq. ft. to 1495 q. ft.SMR Vinay City apartments are being designed with ceramic and marble flooring, teakwood doors, concealed copper wiring, granite kitchen counter top, quality CP and PVC fittings, etc.SMR Vinay City is a RERA Certified Project. SMR Vinay City also provides many essential amenities for its residents like swimming pool, lift, security, park, reserved parking, visitor parking, maintenance staff, bank & ATM, banquet hall, gym, indoor games room, kids play area, DTH television facility, flower garden, laundry service, rainwater harvesting, water storage, waste disposal, conference room, learning centre, fire fighting equipment etc.Highpoints:SMR Vinay City special lifestyle amenities include cafeteria & food court, outdoor tennis courts and a club house. It is a well thought lavish infrastructure located in Miyapur, Hyderabad. It is just 2.4 km from Miyapur Bus Stop, 1.5 km from Mirra Multi Specialty Hospital and 4.1 km from Hafeezpet Railway Station. Various utilities like JP Nagar 3 Bus Stop, Meher plaza, EuroKids school, Miyapur Metro Railway Station (NRS), Sri Shankara Nethralaya Eye Hospital, Punjab National Bank ATM, More Super Market, Cinetown, Green Bawarchi Restaurant, Naren Estates etc. all lie in close proximity.
about_project_details: Over the years SMR Holdings' flagship company SMR Builders Pvt. Ltd. has perfected the art of building dreams. A pioneer and expert in the construction of residential/housing projects, it takes pride in its project management and quality control expertise. The quality control team ensures topnotch quality while the project management team makes sure schedules are met and promises kept.The company has always created wonderful homes, excellent shopping complexes and functional office spaces. Breathtaking landscaped gardens, awe inspiring elevations and Vaastu compliant interiors make every venture an architectural marvel.

project_description: OverviewIf you are looking for an accommodation in the vicinity of Hyderabad, then have a look at this gorgeous Pebbles Bay located in Miyapur, Hyderabad developed by the famous ECMAS Group. This project consists of 120 units distributed in magnificent 2 towers. Pebbles Bay floor plan offers spaciously designed 2BHK and 3BHK apartments that range within 1321 sqft to 1862 sqft.Project detailsAll you have to do is have a look at Pebbles Bay Miyapur reviews and photos that give a clear overview of this project. Pebbles Bay apartments are well ventilated and bright that is must for peaceful living. ECMAS pebbles bay Miyapur Hyderabad has all the features cleverly designed right from the interiors to amenities. Pebbles Bay flats comprises of main door that is decorative and laminated with wooden doorframe. Moreover, there are attractive fitting for the main door that are quite welcoming and you feel pleased to come home.Living in this wonderful Pebbles Bay is highly beneficial as all basic facilities are at door steps. You can access all social infrastructures such as reputed schools, leading hospitals, markets, shopping malls and banking facilities. Moreover, it is well connected to various means of public transport.HighpointsPebbles Bay is provided with classy amenities like air-conditioned gym, medication/yoga room, beautiful landscaped gardens, walking trail, outdoor/indoor play area, avenue lightning, rain water harvesting pits and solar fencing around the compound wall. Moreover, this project is well secured by intercom to flats and security round the clock. Also, it is supported by power back-up through generator. Other facilities include club house, cycling & jogging track, private terrace/garden, lift, reserved parking, service/goods lift and maintenance staff. Well equipped with so many amenities, one cannot deny that it is one of the best place to dwell in.Grab this opportunity right now, walk in and book a flat in this Pebbles Bay ,Miyapur, Hyderabad and enjoys the luxurious living at affordable cost.

project_description: The hang around for your astonishing home is finally over, at Janapriya Nile Valley gauzily developed by Panchajanya Constructions Private Limited which is located in Miyapur, Hyderabad. The project offers copiousness of benefits that include leading location, comfortable and excessive way of life, immense amenities and vigorous surroundings.Project detailsWith all the modern amenities and conveniences Janapriya Nile Valley is spread across 25 acres. This project is built to convene intercontinental standards comprising of spacious and well-ventilated 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments, at Nile Valley you will find space for the finest equipments in life and determine the whole lot that is necessary for these days livelihood.Janapriya Nile Valley encompasses 11 towers with 2400 units at a budgeted price starting from Rs.50.0 Lakhs to 60.0 Lakhs. The flats are up for sale and if required can also be rented out. It offers all the necessary amenities like club house, swimming pool, lift, visitor parking space, gym and a lot more, which you will desire to live a sustainable life. All the apartments are full of facilities that support a luxurious lifestyle.HighpointsRemarkable Janapriya Nile Valley will make your life nothing less than heaven. The project is centrally located in Miyapur, Hyderabad hence you will be able to reach every corner of the city conveniently. project_description: OverviewAkash Lake View is located in Miyapur, Hyderabad. The residential area by Akash Constructions is under construction. Akash Lake View floor plan has 72 units across a tower.Project DetailsAkash Lake View Hyderabad is a wonderful place and has been beautifully and thoughtfully designed. The living room or dining room floorings will have vitrified tiles (24 X 24). The kitchen and bedroom floorings will have ceramic tiles. The toilet floorings will have anti-skid ceramic tiles (12 X 12). The exterior walls will have Asian or equivalent brand paint while the interior walls will be painted with oil bound distemper paint. All the electrical wiring in the apartment will be copper concealed. Flats will have powder coated aluminum windows. The flat entrance door will have a teak frame with masonite, skin, moulded, flush shutter door. The internal doors will have a non-teak wood frame and flush door shutters. Akash Lake View will provide all the basic amenities for the convenience of the residents of the society including a lift, planted space, parking for the residents, services and goods lift, parking for visitors, staff for the maintenance, flower gardens, laundry service, harvesting for rain water and water storage. Fire fighting equipments will be installed in the apartment for the safety of the residents in case of fire accidents.Safety and security of residents of the society is the major concern so professional guards will be hired in order to avoid any problem.HighlightsAkash Lake View is the best place as it is in close proximity to all the major markets. Bus stand, shopping complex, schools, hospital, metro station, temple, atms, grocery stores, food joints movie halls, parks, fitness centres and petrol pumps are within 1-3 km from Akash Lake View apartment. Akash Lake View photos can be checked online at the official website of Magicbricks.

Offering prosperous ambience these living spaces offer mesmerising view upfront which is an added advantage. Aasthas Green Homes floor plans are flawless and efficient wherein the 3 BHK units are sized in the range from 1891 and 2028 sq. ft. whereas the 2 BHK unit comes in a size of 1418 sq. ft., Aasthas Green Homes photos give you a clearer idea of the society. Each of these living spaces are well ventilated and offer plenty of natural light throughout the day. Highpoints These flats are perfect mixture of luxuries and never before, offering beautiful living spaces which offer a healthy living. This project has close proximity to most of the hospitals, banks, shopping malls and schools like Sancta Maria International School, Jain Heritage a Cambridge School are all nearby. Furthermore, Lingampally Railway Station, Gulmohar Park Bus Stop and Citizens Hospital are hardly few meters away. The residential area is the one for you if first impression matter, Aasthas Green Homes flats is sure to leave your floored, so why wait, book now

project_description: Overview: Blessed with all the necessaries like you have never experienced before, these apartment units being offered in Narsingi, Hyderabad - Urban One is one of the well known residential ventures beautifully crafted by NCC Urban Infrastructure Ltd. Offering 12 beautiful towers with 1317 apartment units, Urban One apartments are priced at a range of Rs 72.8 Lac - 1.53 Cr which does justice to the investment you make. You can always have a look at the Urban One photos and Urban One floor plans for a better picture of your dream home. About the project : With positive Urban One reviews, this project has all the comfort and conveniences that will impressive anybody willing to experience a luxurious lifestyle. These exquisitely designed flats are available for sale as well as rent in NCC Urban One, offering a luxurious lifestyle with all the facilities at hand. Offering a beautiful combination of 3 and 4 BHK apartment units, with sizes ranging from 1535 sq. ft. to 2630 sq. ft. for 3 BHK units while the 4 BHK units sized 3380 sq. ft., these living spaces are well designed and offer luxurious dwellings which is the USP of the project. The club here at Urban One, is one of the most functional and attractive one with meditation hall, party hall lavish lounge bar, swimming pool, indoor games and much more. Other advanced facilities include gymnasium, yoga room, landscaped walk-way, outdoor and indoor children's play areas. Highpoints: Offering calm and peaceful residence in the chaos of urban life, this project is loaded with amenities and facilities which will soothe the sense of lush green surrounding, landscaping and manicured walkways. With easy access to quite a few major destinations Urban One flats are in close proximity to most of the software Wipro, Infosys, Microsoft, Polaris, CA, Capgemini, UBS, ICICI Towers, etc. Commendable located close to  two most desired hubs – IT and Financial. Book now!!!
about_project_details: NCC Urban Infrastructure Ltd. is a Subsidiary of NCC Limited and comes Equipped With a world class building techniques and state-of-the-art building infrastructure that is expertly commandeered by top-notch professionals.NCC Urban Infrastructure's quality operations span across Residential and commercial complexes, townships, SEZs and serviced apartment complexes. The company has an impressive pan India presence across Bangalore, Hyderabad, Kochi, Vizag, Guntur, Ranchi and Dubai. Strict adherence to superior standards on time deliveries and transparent documentation has made preferred destination for individuals who are looking for quality living at affordable prices.NCC Urban has inherited its experience and expertise from NCC Limited. Known for its excellence in the execution of Turn key projects, Industrial Buildings, Multistoried, Commercial structures,Townships, Roads, Bridges, Pipelines etc. and rated as growing Infrastructure Company in India with annual turn over nearly Rs. 6,200 crores.NCC Urban is developing the prestigious National Games Housing Complex Project in Ranchi, Jharkhand. The Company has also acquired lands in and around Bangalore, Chennai, Goa, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Kakinada, Lucknow, Raipur and Vizag for its Real Estate projects. NCC Urban is all set to deliver 12.8 million sft. of built up area spread over 286 acres in the next three years.

project_description: Project envisages construction of 853 flats in different types namely 2BHK 3BHK, 4BHK and Duplex in 7 towers of 19, 20 & 25 storied spread over 7.5 Acres land. Currently there are about 750 members in the society and additional members are invited to fill the vacancies in 3BHK. Interested may 'Contact Us'. Land admeasuring 7.5 acres was purchased in May 2008 with the contributions raised from its members. All statutory approvals from GHMC, Fire Dept and Airport Authority etc. have been obtained.Amenities envisaged include facilities like Swimming pool, Club house, Auditorium, Car parking, Generator backup, High speed lifts, Tot lot, jogging & Walking track, Garbage disposal, gas piping, visitors’ parking, Commercial center and a temple.Presently construction is in full swing under the supervision of PWS engineers. The project is expected to be completed by Sep 2016, already 6 blocks have been completed and handed over and around 300 families started living happily.  Model flat in C2 block is ready in all respects.The construction is on self-financing basis and the cost is to be borne by all the members on no-profit no-loss basis.Popular Banks like SBH, Canara Bank, HDFC have already sanctioned housing loans to about 650 members.

Power Welfare Society (PWS) is established under AP Societies Act 2001(Rgd. No. 1732, 2005 ) with a sole objective to build residential complex for its members comprising employees, Ex-employees from Power Sector like POWERGRID, NTPC, REC etc. and their kins and friends.
Project envisages construction of 853 flats in different types namely 2BHK 3BHK, 4BHK and Duplex in 7 towers of 19, 20 and 25 storied spread over 7.5 Acres land. Currently there are about 750 members in the society and additional members are invited to fill the vacancies in 3BHK. Interested may Contact Us.  
Land admeasuring 7.5 acres was purchased in May 2008 with the contributions raised from its members. All statutory approvals from GHMC, Fire Dept and Airport Authority etc. have been obtained.
Amenities envisaged include facilities like Swimming pool, Club house, Auditorium, Car parking, Generator backup, High speed lifts, Tot lot, jogging and Walking track, Garbage disposal, gas piping, visitors parking, Commercial centre and a temple.
Presently construction is in full swing under the supervision of PWS engineers. The project is expected to be completed by Sep 2016, already 6 blocks have been completed and handed over and around 300 families started living happily. Model flat in C2 block is ready in all respects.
The construction is on self-financing basis and the cost is to be borne by all the members on no-profit no-loss basis.
Popular Banks like SBH, Canara Bank, HDFC have already sanctioned housing loans to about 650 members.

project_description: OverviewAparna Sarovar Grande in Nallangandla, Hyderabad offers an array of magnificently designed residences. Ready to move in apartments in the configuration of 3BHK and 4BHK units are available in this project for sale as well as for rent. There are a total of 9 towers housing 720 units and are bestowed with high-end fittings and fixtures. About the Project An exquisite selection of 720 residential apartments greet you in this gated community meticulously developed by Aparna Constructions and Estates. All the 9 towers are almost 20- storey high and offer fabulous views of the surroundings. These 3BHK and 4BHK residential flats are available in the area size ranging between 1920sq.ft. and 3875sq.ft. Aparna Sarovar Grande has been designed systematically to provide all the comforts and amenities required to experience a modern lifestyle. A bevy of facilities are a part of this project such as community hall, library, aerobics, basketball court, tennis and badminton courts, swimming pool, yoga, restaurant and spa. Location also plays a pivotal role and undoubtedly Aparna Sarovar Grande does enjoy an enviable location as it is only 2 to 4km away from Lingampally Metro Station, Rythu Bazaar, Mahindra Satyam SEZ and hospitals such as Anuragh Hospital and Citizen’s Hospital.  Highpoints Aparna Sarovar Grande in Nallangandla, Hyderabad is known for its splendid green surroundings and is a perfect epitome of eco-friendly lifestyle. This project has been certified ‘Green’ by the Indian Green Building Council and therefore it proves architectural delight and a plush lifestyle can coexist alongside green ethos. To enjoy a slice of a greener and healthier lifestyle, don’t wait, book an apartment now in Aparna Sarovar Grande.

project_description: Aparna Cyber Commune by the Aparna Constructions and Estates Pvt. Ltd. has come up with its residential project at Nallagandla, Gachibowli in Hyderabad. It is about 1.9 km away from Indira Gandi bus stop and about 4.5 km away from Apollo Pharmacy. The complex has about 15 towers with 10 floors in each that provide 2 and 3 BHK flats that has an area of about 1270 Sq-Ft and 1515-1750 Sq-ft respectively. Some of the other residential projects by Aparna Group in Hyderabad are Aparna Cyberzon at Nallagandla, Aparna Sarovara at Gachibowli and Aparna Hill Park avenues at Miyapur.The amenities and facilities provided by Cyber Commune are cosmopolitan in outlook, it has a swimming pool, gym, indoor games zone, park, area marked for recreational activities and a club house, with all these facilities available you are assured of entertainment and fitness at all times. The location of the venture is also at an advantage as the apartment is near to all shopping complexes, hospitals and good educational institutions so travelling long distances for daily work is not required. Aparna Cyber is also in close proximity of the various IT hubs in Gachibowli and Manikonda. This is one of the best options to look out for in Hyderabad.

project_description: Overview Conveniently located in Narsingi, Hyderabad  Muppas Aishwarya Condos is a wonderful project developed by Muppa Homes Pvt. Ltd. The project is eye-catching with 5 towers and features 160 units. This residence offers 1 BHK studio apartments and flats with 2 and 3 BHK configurations. For more information, browse through the Muppas Aishwarya Condos photos and brochure. About the project The reviews of Muppas Aishwarya are quite confident and the apartments are also well-appreciated by many home-buyers. Muppas Aishwarya Condos rent amount is also quite reasonable and the apartments are completely ready for possession. Designed for finest living standards, these homes are well-appointed with all the branded fittings and fixtures. Considered as one of the best property developers of Narsingi, Muppa Homes Pvt. Ltd., are an ISO certified company pioneered in offering well-planned homes with affordable price tag. The well-thought floor plan of Muppas Aishwarya make it a right address of your home. Blessed with enough natural light and good ventilation, these homes possess a pleasant atmosphere all along the day. Decked with latest recreational amenities and seasoned with all the modern facilities, investing in this project will definitely prove beneficial. Clubhouse, gym, swimming pool, mediation area, kids club, outdoor tennis court, kids play area and lot more other amenities ensure a jubilant lifestyle. Highpoints 100 Percentage vaastu compliant homes with comfortable living spaces is the USP of this development. The vibrant and upcoming location with various top-rated educational institutions, hospitals and shopping malls is yet another strong factor. Narsingi is also served with good public transport connectivity and one can also find several popular eateries in the vicinity. Planned as per the modern living standards and well-packed with numerous world-class amenities, Muppas Aishwarya Condos Narsingi, Hyderabad is ultimately a perfect place to live a plush lifestyle. So, walk in and book a suitable flat now
about_project_details: Muppa Homes Pvt. Ltd., promoted by Mr. M. Venkaiah Chowdary and his team in the year 1999, is an established Property Procurement and Development company of Hyderabad. It is an ISO 9001-2008 certified company. Since inception, Muppa Homes Private Limited (MHPL) had laid emphasis on providing 'value for money projects and properties without any legal hindrances. The Company enjoys the complete trust and satisfaction of its valued customers.As a long term strategy, the company has been busy building an impressive land bank in vantage locations with huge growth potential. The company is now progressing towards new horizons to achieve its objectives. Backed with decade long experience in planning and delivering projects on time, the company is now pooling the expertise, strategies and resources to launch several high-end villa projects, high-rise apartment complexes and integrated townships.

project_description: Mantri Developers Pvt. Ltd. launches Mantri Euphoria, a luxurious residential project located at the Narsingi Junction, Hyderabad. The residential township of Mantri Euphoria is nestled against a forest reserve and offers pollution free, green enriched, environment to live a healthy and peaceful life. Excellent connectivity of the area with other parts of the city makes it an ideal place to live in even for the busy professionals. The venture site is adjacent to the Outer Ring Road and is just 9 km from the financial hub of the city. Reputed schools and colleges are present within close proximity, the Shadan Medical College and Hospital are just 4 km from the site. Mantri Euphoria in Narsingi Junction is 17 km away from the Hyderabad Railway station and enjoys the vicinity of the beautiful Gandipetlake and the Mrugavani National Park.3 BHK flat in Mantri Euphoria covers 3135 sq-ft to 3770 sq-ft area, and is better described as villas rather than flats or apartments. Luxurious living along with state-of-the-art facilities makes Mantri Euphoria the perfect destination for a plush lifestyle. The interior of the villas come with international standard decor and offers all the facilities of a facilitated living. Every amenity is included in this residential township, starting from swimming pool, to the recreational pool, outdoor tennis court, multipurpose courts, club house, gymnasium all are available within the complex. Other amenities include reserved parking lot, visitors parking, park, children playground, play-pool with water slides for children, rentable community space, flower gardens, landscape gardens, security and many more.
about_project_details: In just 15 years, Mantri Developers, with the spirit of innovation at its core, has chiseled a niche for itself as an industry benchmark for quality, customer focus, robust engineering, in-house research, uncompromising business ethics and the unswerving commitment to timeless values and total transparency in every aspect of its business. These phenomenal attributes have made Mantri Developers one of India is most preferred real estate brands in south India. Under residential segment, Mantri Developers offers villas, row houses, sensational luxury apartments, luxury apartments and semi-luxury Apartments.The Company has an privileged track record of having dispatched 1.4 homes, every single day. Mantri Developers is committed towards developing ecologically sustainable projects, with a strong prominence on environmental management and safety standards.
project_highlights:
Highlights




Mantri Euphoria is located adjacent to the outer ring road.Strategically located with a mere distance of 9 kms from the financial district(includes: Microsoft, ISB, Wipro, Infosys, CA, ICICI Bank, etc.,)Well connected to the cities business districts, educational institutions and commercial establishments.Landmarks viz., Gandipet lake, Mrugavani National Park are in close vicinity.Schools and colleges of international repute are in close proximity.Financial District 9 kms Hyderabad Rail17km





Discussion

project_description: Aparna CyberLife is a project by Aparna Constructions and Estates Pvt. Ltd., located in Nallagandla, Hyderabad, offering lavish, spaciously designed currently under construction 3 BHK apartments. It consists of 903 units spanned over 10 towers. Aparna CyberLife price rate starts from Rs. 75.8 Lac onward. Project Details:Aparna CyberLife located in Nallagandla, Hyderabad, is a project by Aparna Constructions and Estates Pvt. Ltd. offering spacious, luxurious currently under construction 3 BHK apartments. Aparna CyberLife plot areas for its 3 BHK flat ranges from 1685 sq. ft. to 1965 sq. ft.Aparna CyberLife apartments are designed with aesthetic interiors like vitrified tiles, ceramic tiles, anti skid tiles flooring in every room, teak wood frame door, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, granite kitchen platform, branded CP fittings etc. The apartments are fully equipped with such interiors and various other amenities.Aparna CyberLife is a RERA Certified Project. Aparna CyberLife provides numerous essential amenities for its residents like 24*7 power back up, swimming pool, lift, banquet hall, gym, piped gas, air conditioned, fire fighting equipment etc. among others.Highpoints:Aparna CyberLife special amenity includes a club house. The project offers luxurious and spacious 3 BHK apartments in affordable prices. It is skilfully developed with a good infrastructure and equipped with all modern amenities and facilities. The locality has a green landscape and various civic utilities also lie within the vicinity. It is just 2.9 km from Station Bus Stop, 2.7 km from HDFC Bank ATM and 3.8 km from Tip Top Shop. Utilities like Nallagandla Huda Bus Stop, Citizens Hospital, Sancta Maria International School, South Central Railway, Union Bank of India ATM, Vijetha Super Market, Colors Restaurant, BHEL Community Centre, HP Petrol Pump etc. all lie in very close vicinity of the project.

To raise the awareness and aspiration level of every Aparna team-member, so that they in turn, raise and exceed their own and the market's aspirations.To do all of the above while creating the best integrated communities, built on consistent and sustainable practices.

project_description: Poe Tree is a lavishly build Theme based residential project with modern interiors & amenities by Aryamitra Projects which is a leading property developer group located in Narsingi, Hyderabad.This project is offering strategically crafted spacious Residential 2BHK & 3BHK flats on a land full of opportunities. Poe Tree is currently under construction & it will consist of 170 units spanned in 3 Towers. Project DetailsPoe Tree, a  well-drafted & ventilated premium residential project by Aryamitra Projects located at Narsingi, Hyderabad is providing rightly spaced  2BHK & 3BHK residential flats with all the latest amenities. Plot area for its 2BHK flat ranges in 1116 – 1380 sqft & 3BHK flat area ranges in 1584 - 1912 sqft. Poe Tree has Interior specifications like RCC framed Structure, an External wall with Texture finish and weatherproof emulsion paints  & internal wall with good quality emulsion,  Main door with Teak wood frame, Flush doors with Teak Veneer Shutter,UPVC  window with M.S safety grills, Concealed electrical fitting with ISI wires & modular switches, C.P fittings of premium brands, Vitrified Tiles Flooring, Solar Powered Security fence for total compound etc. Poe Tree provides ultra premium amenities like Well furnished Club House, Granite Cladding Lift, Kids play area, Surveillance Cameras, Banquet Hall, Indoor Games Room, Power back up, provision of reserved parking and many more.High PointsPoe Tree is a fully developed premium project located at an easily reachable distance from Rajeev Gandhi International Airport as it is just 13Km away.The unique feature of Poe Tree is its connectivity to Public Transport. Poe Tree is also close to social & civic amenities like Heritage Dileep Super Market, Andani &  Aaron Nirmala Hospital, Airport IT Hub, Main Road, Schools, Gyms, Markets, Worshiping Place, Recreation Places, Malls accompanied by a really long list ahead.

project_description: Muppas Alankrita is a proud presentation by Muppa Projects India at Narsingi, Hyderabad. With scheduled possession by 2019, this ongoing development include 200 well-designed homes spread across 4 towers. Projected across 2.5 acres of greenery, this wonderful project offers spacious 2 & 3 BHK homes with various area size ranging from 1200 sqft to 2000 sqft. Project details Costing starting from Rs. 49.20 Lacs and moving up to Rs. 84.46 Lacs, the flat rates of Muppas Alankrita Narsingi, Hyderabad are smartly priced to suit every section of home-buyers. The price of 2BHK starts from Rs. 49.20 Lacs while the 3BHK units cost from Rs. 59.86 Lacs. Muppas Alankrita lives up to all the confident reviews, hence investing your savings in this project is definitely a wise decision. Designed to receive maximum breeze & sunlight, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Muppas Alankrita are perfect to live a cordial life with your loved ones Moreover, these homes are planned as per vaastu science for a healthier lifestyle. The clever floor plan with no-wall concept between neighboring flats assure unmatched privacy. Huge of pool of desirable club amenities & sports facilities like air-conditioned gym, jogging track, swimming pool, meditation area, skating rink, kid’s paly area and much more make this place an absolute haven for families wanting to lead an opulent lifestyle. Mesmerizing landscapes & gardens designed by highly acclaimed architects will leave you elevated. Highpoints Apart from being HMDA approved, Muppas Alankrita is also RERA certified. The prime location with good connectivity to public transports, Gachibowli & Madhapur make this residential project worth investing. Nested in the midst of several IT firms, schools & hospitals, this residence promise a perfect balance between work and life. So, cash in and book a flat now in Muppas Alankrita Narsingi, Hyderabad and live a zestful life.

project_description: Bay Hills is a housing project by Aryamitra Projects which is a trusted real estate brand located in Narsingi, Hyderabad.This spacious & luxurious  Residential project is offering 2BHK & 3BHK  apartments with world class facilities, ample greenery & architectural magnificence to give you a fine life. Bay Hills is currently under construction and it consists of 304 units spanned over 6 towers. Bay Hills housing apartments price range starts at Rs. 36.4 Lac onwards.Project DetailsBay Hills, a residential project by Aryamitra Projects located in Narsingi, Hyderabad is providing elegant Naturally Lit & Ventilated  2BHK & 3BHk apartments of international standards. Bay Hills 2BHK flat area ranges from 1269 – 1507 sqft  & 3BHK flat area ranges from 1604 – 2635 sqft.Bay Hills apartment has interior specifications like Vitrified Tiles & Ceramic tiles flooring,  Designer Teak Veneer doors with Teak wood frames, UPVC windows, Kitchen with SS Sink & dado tiles, Concealed High quality copper wiring, power outlets for air conditioners in all bedrooms,  maintenance free weather proof emulsion  on exterior walls with texture  finish & Granite Cladding lift and many more.Bay Hills apartments offer premium amenities like Coffe Lounge & Restaurants, Jogging & Strolling Track, Barbeque Pit, Outdoor Tennis Court, Swimming Pool, Banquet Hall, Gymnasium, Kids Play Area, Guests Accommodation, Sound Security System, Library & Bussiness Centre, Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts, Internet/WiFi connectivity, Laundry Service  and many more.High PointsBay Hills is offering well-crafted  &  ventilated apartments with world class infrastructure & serene green atmosphere in a pocket-friendly budget.The unique feature of Bay Hills is the fact that it possesses a  with a  close proximity to connectivity hubs like Rajiv Gandhi International Airport, Main road & Poe Tree Property.  Schools, ATMs, Malls, Hotels &  much more are all part of the close vicinity of the project.So, Hurry up!  A luxurious and soothing life is waiting for you at Bay Hills.

Ltd. located in Nizampet, Hyderabad offering aesthetically developed and spaciously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project will be ready for possession and consists of 438 units spanned over 5 well planned towers. Vazhraa Nirmaan Pushpak price rate starts at Rs. 43 Lac onward. Project Details:Vazhraa Nirmaan Pushpak, a residential project located in Nizampet, Hyderabad by Vazhraa Nirmaan Pvt. Ltd. is offering elegant and spaciously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Vazhraa Nirmaan Pushpak plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range approx. 1205 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1475 sq. ft. to 1890 sq. ft. Vazhraa Nirmaan Pushpak apartments are well designed with certain features like anti skid ceramic tiles and vitrified tiles flooring in every room, teak wood frame doors with designer shutters, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, granite kitchen platform with stainless steel sink, UPVC window frames with coloured glass, good quality sanitary ware and CP fittings etc. Vazhraa Nirmaan Pushpak Hyderabad features numerous amenities and facilities for its residents such as a club house, power supply with backup, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security facility, park, reserved parking, service & goods lift, visitor parking, maintenance staff, maintenance staff, gymnasium, children’s play area, flower gardens, laundry service, rain water harvesting, water storage, and fire fighting systems etc.  Highpoints:Vazhraa Nirmaan Pushpak is a happening residential project located in Nizampet; the residents can enjoy this well planned gated community surrounded with greenery and a hassle free environment. Vazhraa Nirmaan Pushpak Hyderabad locality is just 1.2 km from Nizampet Bus Stop, 1.1 km from Mini Rythu Bazaar and 4.8 km from Hyderabad Metro Rail, etc. The vicinity includes utilities like Shri Ram School of CBSE, Sri Sri Holistic Hospital, and More Super Market etc.

project_description: Overview: Shree Rath Apartments is a project by Unnati Build Tech situated thoughtfully in Nizampet, Hyderabad offering skilfully crafted studio apartment and 1 BHK, 2 BHK, 3 BHK spacious apartments. The project consists of 1063 units spanned over 22 floors and is currently under construction. Shree Rath Apartments price rate starts from Rs. 16.9 Lac onward. It provides different dimensions of apartments in quite competitive prices.Project Details:Shree Rath Apartments, an ongoing project by Unnati Build Tech based in the main location of Nizampet, Hyderabad offering skilfully crafted studio apartment and 1 BHK, 2 BHK, 3 BHK spacious apartments.  Shree Rath Apartments plot areas for its studio apartment range approx. 450 sq. ft.; 1 BHK flat areas range from 510 sq. ft. to 610 sq. ft.; 2 BHK flat areas range from 800 sq. ft. to 840 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1420 sq. ft. to 1705 sq. ft.Shree Rath Apartments has a strong RCC framed structure and features like wood frame doors, granite/marble tiles flooring in every room, black granite kitchen counter top with SS sink, branded CP fittings, concealed copper wiring with branded modular switches, and high quality sanitary fixtures etc. Shree Rath Apartment provides few basic amenities for its residents like power back up, swimming pool, security, park, cycling & jogging track, outdoor tennis court, reserved parking, banquet hall, children’s play area, flower gardens, rain water harvesting, indoor squash & badminton court, event space & amphitheatre etc. Highpoints:Shree Rath Apartment has a unique design and is being developed to several amenities and facilities to fulfil the residents’ needs. Shree Rath Apartment locality is 10 min from Hitech city, and close by to civic utilities like shopping malls, theatres, banks, hospitals, schools, and Inner Ring Road etc.

An excellent illustration of Maruthi Developers, Maruthi Elite in Nizampet, Hyderabad is an added advantage. Under construction, these living spaces are filled with positivity and warmth, spanning across 5 towers and comprising 260 apartment units, Maruthi Elite floor plans are quite efficient and profitable. Book now!!!
about_project_details: Behind the creation of every landmark building is a vision that challenges the conventional notions of architecture, design, materials and thinking. Often, these structures shape more than just the environments and lifestyles of the people living in them; they shape the future blueprints of entire cities. At Maruthi Constructions, it is our constant endeavour to transform the society with livable spaces. When we incorporate playgrounds and swimming pools into our designs, it's not just to offer our customer better amenities, but to offer their children better childhoods.When we push ourselves to find innovative solutions, it is not so much to save costs, as it is to save our environment. Maruthi Developers has always believed that form follows function. This is evident in every aspect of our design and the way we plan homes. Maruthi Developers also lays special emphasis on the quality of its homes and expects everyone in the team to follow the rule of 'Better, not cheaper

project_description: Emerald Heights is a premium apartment project with state of the art amenities, including a 45000 sft clubhouse, play areas, gardens, swimming pool, gymnasium, squash courts and several other facilities. Living at Emerald Heights will ensure that all the residents have a truly international lifestyle with the best quality of life compared to occupants of conventional apartments.Emerald Heights is an ideal choice for people looking to live in a clean and pollution free neighbourhood. The project is located at a short distance from Uppal and is close to the newly developed Singapore Township (Sanskruti) and Mind Space IT Park as well as the new Infosys SEZ. Emerald Heights is accessible by a six lane road from Uppal and is located within the one kilometer growth corridor along the Outer Ring Road.
about_project_details: Welcome to Modi Builders, a leading construction companies in the twin cities of Hyderabad and Secunderabad. The firm has over thirty five years of experience in the building industry, having built several buildings since inception. Given the immense scope in the housing industry in India, the company has been focusing on promoting a series of large residential townships in several areas in the city. All the ventures promoted by the firm so far have been highly successful.The firm is currently carrying out extensive construction activity at various locations in and around Hyderabad. The company has residential projects to the tune of about Rs. 4000 crore on hand and is actively negotiating several new projects. Our Company plans to have about 20 million sft of construction with a total value of Rs.5000 crore in the next few months.The company is proud of the reputation it has built for honesty and the quality of construction of its projects. Its management has set out a strict code of conduct to abide by in its dealings with customers.This site provides a brief overview of our current and past projects. Please contact us if you require any details.

project_description: Willow Greens, located in Puppalaguda, Hyderabad is a residential development of Navanaami Projects Pvt. Ltd. offering lavish and exquisitely designed 3 BHK state of the art apartments. The project is under construction at the moment and will consist of 36 units in one meticulously designed tower. Willow Greens price rate start at Rs. 1.12 Cr onward. Project DetailsWillow Greens Hyderabad is approved by several banks and offering exquisitely designed 3 BHK state of the art apartments, in the fast growing area of Puppalaguda, Hyderabad. Willow Greens plot area for the 3 BHK flat ranges from 2500 sq. ft. to 2965 sq. ft. Willow Greens apartments are designed with interiors like high quality Italian style tiles flooring in every unit, strong R.C.C framed structure, designer frame doors, concealed wiring with modular switches, granite kitchen counter top, concealed plumbing, sanitary ware, and premium quality  CP fittings & fixtures etc. among others. Willow Greens Hyderabad features numerous world class amenities and facilities such as designer landscape, grand entrance, 60 percent open area, swimming pool, banquet hall, gymnasium, power supply, water storage, car parking space, 24 hour security facilities, intercom facility, and children’s play area etc. including many more. HighpointsWillow Greens is designed with an international style architectural look and provides all amenities in quite competitive prices. Willow Greens Hyderabad locality is nicely connected via various roads and different modes of transportation to the surrounding areas. Several basic civic utilities and facilities like Gachibowli, Financial District, the Airport, Kidzee Preschool, OU Colony Bus Stop, Prerana Hospital, Venkateswara Temple, Karur Vysya Bank ATM, Office Mart, Apollo Pharmacy, Haritha Restaurant, Mahatma Gandhi Park, Indian Oil Petrol Bunk etc. and many more all lie in very close vicinity from the residential project. The developers with their 16 years of real estate experience aim high with this project.
about_project_details: To provide our clients the very best service in all aspects of residential real estate whether we are handling their sale or purchase personally or connecting them to one of our team of associated property experts for a particular service. We believe in customers for life and being there for our clients throughout our journey in business and in life to ensure when it comes to residential property they receive the very best this industry has to offer. Our aim is to be at the forefront of property marketing and to provide tailored innovative solutions that fit our clients individual property and situation to ensure the best possible outcome is achieved.Creating the Hallmarks of Fine LivingNavanaami believes in the phrase Home is where the heart is. We not only build homes, we build trust. Our clientele benefits through the intellectual horsepower, Our leadership offers, which translates to optimum return on investment. That being said contemporary design that reflects our aesthetical approach to deliver current clientele requirements in property development. At the centre of these, remains our determination to exceed expectations while ensuring impeccable styled homes that compliment youre lifestyle. Navanaami employs the latest advances in smart home technology providing security and offering home owners facilities that cater to a healthy lifestyle.

project_description: OverviewSkyila built by EIPL Projects and strategically located in Puppalaguda, Hyderabad, consists of 8 huge towers. Totally 282 units are available. The areas of these flats range in between 1600 sqft area to 2180 sqft area. The flats in Skyila are priced at an affordable price of around 63.9 to 76.3 lakhs. This project spans across 5.5 acres area.About the ProjectSkyila gated community project is conveniently located in a prime area of Hyderabad. This ensures that the residents enjoy a smooth and comfortable lifestyle. The apartments of this tower are designed to offer adequate privacy to its dwellers. The floor plan design is good. High quality specifications are used while developing these flats. Skyila by EIPL Projects at Puppalguda is indeed a good option to reside in.This 6 floor project consists of eight blocks A, B, C, D, E, F, G, and H. There is additional parking space in the basement and the rest of the 6 floors. EIPL Skyila Reviews boast some of the best facilities for residents to experience a great lifestyle. According to Skyila photos, it is loaded with many ultra modern amenities such as club house, outdoor tennis courts, swimming pool, banquet hall, gymnasium, indoor games room, aerobics room, library and business centre, water storage, meditation area and event space & amphitheatre.HighpointsThe apartments in Skyila are available at an attractive price in a posh locality. ORR, Gachibowli, Hitech City, Jubilee Hills and Mehadipatnam are located within the close vicinity of this project. Appa Complex is the nearest shopping centre situated just within the radius of 200 meters. Narsingi Kalpana Kennels Bus Stop is just 200 meters away and hence commuting is not an issue.  Book your dream home now.

project_description: Are you looking to buy a luxury apartment in this region of Hyderabad? Tranquil is a residential project that is located at Puppalaguda, Hyderabad. These homes are one of the good options that are developed to provide the luxurious lifestyle to residents. This project is developed by using modern designs of architecture and innovations. The developer is offering elegant designs of interiors in these lifestyle homes. People will get the best class amenities for a comfortable life. If you want to live luxurious and comfortable life, you can choose these homes at an affordable cost. These apartments are the perfect place to live a peaceful and happy life. At this residential hub you will get various space options where you can choose the desired apartment according to your needs and budget. These apartments are located at prime location where residents will get all facilities at the nearby locations. If you are searching for your dream home, you can buy these apartments as a perfect place to live and raise your standard of living.Why should I buy?These apartments are designed with modern architecture and elegant interiors. In this residential hub, people will get different living space options at an affordable cost.The residents will get peaceful and stress free environment to live in these apartments. Price range & Unit details (Configuration)In this residential hub, they developed 158 units of 2 BHK and 3 BHK flats and you can choose these apartments having living area of 1150 - 1996 sq ft. In this residential hub, you can find the price range of near around 36.2 Lac - 59.8 Lac. You can buy these lifestyle homes at an affordable cost to live a luxury life. Tower details Tranquil residential hub is developed having 158 units of apartments in 4 towers. Nearby information These apartments are located at Puppalaguda where residents will find the best class transport and connectivity facilities. You will find good transport facilities at the Gachibowli railway Junction. This place is well connected to IT hubs like Computer Associates, ISB, Infosys, Microsoft, and Wipro. International Airport is just 25 km away from this residential hub. For good health care services, you will find Apollo Hospital, Hyatt Hospital, Pacific Hospitals and Olive Hospital at nearby location. You will also find good facilities of education and shopping in this area. About the builderThis residential project is developed by the Hallmark Builders And Developers.  They are well known to use innovative designs and modern infrastructure engineering in their projects. They have experience of 9 years in real estate sector. With the help of their professional and dynamic team, they are able to offer world class services of residential and commercial development. Other projects by the builders  Hallmark Builders And Developers can be a new name in real estate sector of this city, but in such short period they have proved their skills and ability. They have worked on two major projects Gardenia and Tranquil. They have many more upcoming projects in the future to show their skills.
about_project_details: Established in the Year 2008, Hallmark Builders success is mainly based on focused approach towards transparency, quality and innovation. In just 7 years, with the spirit of innovation, Hallmark Builders has carved a niche for itself as an industry benchmark for quality, budget friendly, innovation, uncompromising business ethics and commitment in every aspect of its business.Hallmark Builders commitment to quality and innovation comes from its expertise in constructing landmark buildings. As part of its portfolio Hallmark Builders developed 10 luxury and semi-luxury Apartment Complexes. A classic trademark of all Hallmark Builder projects are its careful thought in providing limited flats per floor, ample greenery, modern designs to suite unmatched luxury and giving all the customers a good return on their investments.Owning a house is a dream of everyone heart. Hallmark Builders has helped and will continue to help realize just that, dream homes coupled with a dream lifestyle.

project_description: Aditya Fort View in Puppalaguda, Hyderabad is a renowned project by Sri Aditya Homes Pvt. Ltd. offering exquisitely designed 4 BHK villas. This luxurious project features only 50 extremely well planned villas that are priced within the budget range of Rs.2.20 crore and Rs.2.25 crore. Project detailsAditya Fort View villas available on sale are ideal for anyone looking to reside within a gated community in an independent house. The 4 BHK villas are splendid in their design and architecture, inviting potential homeowners to experience its magnificence. The floor plan for Sri Aditya Fort View Villas are spacious and featuring a highly functional design, covering an area that ranges between 3255 sqft and 5745 sqft. All the basic amenities to enjoy and experience an excellent lifestyle are provided in this project. Some of these amenities include kids play area, swimming pool, community hall, intercom etc. Security guards are also present round the clock to ensure complete security of the place. Investing in this project is ideal from the perspective of buying one’s dream home as well as investing in it for the future. Investing in a villa is bound to yield excellent returns few years down the line. HighpointsWhat sets apart Aditya Fortview Puppalaguda, Hyderabad is its surroundings as it is surrounded by plenty of greenery. The location is also quite prime, as Puppalaguda is one of the rapidly growing areas in Hyderabad. It is also well connected to the other parts of the city via Gachibowli Road. Location is undoubtedly one of the main highpoints along with eco friendly initiative such as rainwater harvesting that this project adopts. So, go ahead and browse through Aditya Fortview photos and book fast.
about_project_details: Established with an aim to make a difference in the real estate world, the Sri Aditya homes was founded by the Mr. V. Kota Reddy in the year 1991 in Hyderabad. Under the guidance of the founder the company has not only offered finest quality houses but has also learnt the concept of client satisfaction. He professionals who are connected to this group work hard to deliver quality, unique designs and luxurious spaces. The projects constructed the group are a blend of refined taste and excellence and that is why these projects always stand out from rest of the projects constructed in the similar location. Offering ready to move flats from the price range of 57 lacks, the group has constructed 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK apartments that falls in the size range of 1238 sq.ft. to 5500 sq.ft. Today, the company is a known name because of the transparency and honesty that the company has shown at the time of dealing with its esteemed customers. The company also keeps on updating the technology, designs and infrastructure as per the latest in the market. The luxurious projects offered by the Sri Aditya Group are Sri Aditya Wiiz Lagoon- Hyderabad, Aditya Sunshine- Hyderabad, Sri Aditya Hill Top- Hyderabad, Sri Aditya Pride- Hyderabad, Sri Aditya Nest- Hyderabad etc.

project_description: Ramky Gardenia Grove Villas is first integrated township that is constructed in Hyderabad and is equipped with commercial, residential, entertainment and education options. Located at Srisailam high way, the project is built to offer you the best of nature and world- class amenities and luxurious. The project is constructed by the Ramky Group that was established in 1994 in Hyderabad and since then it has been focusing on offering high- quality projects with its excellent management and engineering skills. The group is equipped with around 7,000 employees and 25,000 workforce who works passionately to deliver luxurious houses. Covering the huge area of 24 acres, the project features 1 tower, G1 floor and 3BHK 228 units that are available for sale in various sizes. Project DetailDesigned to offer you a comfortable and stress-free lifestyle, the Ramky Gardenia Grove Villas is designed with RCC framed structure and features single coat cement plaster with smooth finish on internal walls, double coat cement plaster with sponge finish on external walls, teak wood main door with frame and melamine polishing, internal door with teak wood frame with flush shutters of veneer finish, single glazed UPVC windows with painted M.S grills and standard hardware, vitrified tiles in bedrooms, anti skid ceramic tiles in bathrooms, ceramic tiles in balconies, granite platform with stainless steel sink, provision for exhaust fan and chimney, basin mixer in master bedroom, wash basin with granite counter, wash basin with pedestal and basin mixer for all toilets, hot and cold wall mixer with a shower arm, EWC with flush tank, chrome plated C.P. fittings, power sockets for air- conditioners in all bedrooms and living area, provision for geysers in all bedrooms, provision for internet connection in living area, master bedroom and children bedroom, telephone points in al bedrooms and living area, cable connection in all bedrooms and living rooms and a lot more.The luxurious Ramky Gardenia Grove Villas is equipped with amenities like golf course, sports area, clubhouse, open parks, landscapes, multi- purpose banquet hall for 60 people, security, rainwater harvesting, park, swimming pool, gym, indoor games room, private terrace, garden, barbeque pit, banquet hall, kids play pool and a lot more to complement your modern lifestyle.High PointsSituated close to the Hyderabad International Airport, the luxurious Ramky Gardenia Grove Villas offers easy connectivity to places like Adibatla TCS, Cognazant SEZs, Hardware park, schools, collages, hospitals etc. The easy connectivity to all the main places saves a lot of time and makes your life easy and comfortable.

The Division constantly strives to create designs that are both sustainable and green, and which reverberate with warmth, comfort, and luxury. To date, we have successfully delivered 7 million sq.ft. Of living and work spaces, with 6.5 million sq.ft. Under development, and another 30 million sq.ft. Of prime space in the pipeline.

project_description: OverviewBeing one of the tallest buildings, the Alekhya Towers in LB Nagar, Hyderabad is a luxurious residential project that features 70% open area and offers ample of greenery and space so that you can breathe fresh, relax and play. There are 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK residential flats that are contemporary and well- ventilated and are equipped with all modern amenities. There is one tall tower that is equipped with 210 residential flats for sale and consist of 15 floors along with two levels for secured parking. Available in various sizes, these residential flats are designed to offer affordable housing in LB Nagar, Hyderabad as apartment price in Alekhya Towers starts from Rs. 39 lac. Project detailOffering smart floor plan, modern architecture and latest technology, the Alekhya Towers is approved by GHMC and offers quality construction as per IS 2000. The luxurious project is constructed by the Alekhya Constructions Limited that is a closely held limited company and is known for constructing quality residential and commercial buildings in Hyderabad. The residential flats in Alekhya Towers feature earthquake resistant RCC frame structure, 9’ clay bricks walls with cement mortar plastering on external walls, 41/2’’ clay bricks with cement mortar plastering on internal walls, skid molded shutter and flush shutter door with teak wood frame, aluminum frame windows, MS/aluminum safety grill, vitrified ties in all rooms, ceramic tiles in bathrooms, vitrified tiles in common areas, acrylic emulsion paint on external walls, smooth finish with acrylic emulsion paint on internal walls, kitchen with black granite platform, 2’ height ceramic tiles above platform, stainless steel/granite sink, cooking gas pipeline connection dishwasher and washing machine and water purifier, bathrooms with ceramic tiles upto door height, plumbing fixtures, geyser and exhaust, certified ISI copper wire, modular switches, AC points in all rooms etc.If you book a flat in Alekhya Towers, you will be able to enjoy modern amenities like children’s Tot Lot and toddler’s play area, cooking gas pipeline connection, covered swimming pool, club house, badminton courts, jogging track, multi- purpose hall, fitness center with meditation room and yoga room, fire- fighting equipment, rain water harvesting system and a lot more.

project_description: Kenworth by Provident is designed to help you create actively engaged routines, social community living and a healthy lifestyle. We believe a good home, is a harbinger of wellbeing, good health and happiness; Kenworth aims to enhance the quality of everyday living with a range of indoor facilities. This Provident property at Rajendranagar, Hyderabad, is a great choice for people working in financial district and High tech city.With metro rail development to complete by 2017, Kenworth will be connected to key areas of the city, making every day travel more convenient and hassle free. The project is optimally designed to provide 3BHK and 2 BHK units at competitive prices. Kenworth, would serve to be a great investment opportunity for investors looking for premium homes with leisure and lifestyle amenities, convenient living and a high return on investment. At Provident, we believe in creating value for our customers, by providing premium living spaces at affordable prices. Provident Housing is a subsidiary of Puravankara, a leader in premium affordable housing in India. We take pride in our ability to create holistic living experiences for people and deliver consistently on quality.

project_description: The most precisely designed and amazingly etched apartments are found at Hill Ridge Springs. Developed by IVR Prime Urban developers, the project is exquisitely designed and presented in the bustling locality of Gachibowli, Hyderabad. The styles of the dwellings are directly drawn from any sketch book and you will be thrilled to discover that the project stands to your expectations of gracious living with profound reflection of Vaastu and Feng-shui interpretations for each apartments and the entire project campus area. The abounding greenery, walkways, natural rock formations, water bodies, and all other things visible around reflect the insightful thinking and vision that have gone into the making of Hill Ridge Springs by IVR Prime Urban Developers. The 2, 3 and 4 bedroom apartments available over areas between 1100 sq ft and 2800 sq ft are something that draws your attention. First off, Gachibowli where the project is located is a superb IT suburb in the city of Hyderabad. Situated 5 Km away from the HITEC City, the entire zone houses the biggest banners in the world of IT companies. In the surrounding area, you will find a number of international banking institutions like Union Bank of Switzerland, Franklin Templeton Investments, hotels like Palm hotels, educational institutions like University of Hyderabad, Indian School of Business, Maulana Azad National Urdu University, and so on. Just like you had expected the amenities offered here are equally massive and never-ending, which includes play area, security system, swimming pool, tennis court, club house, basketball court, gym, health facilities, etc.

project_description: OverviewThe First Leaf is a lavish residential project that takes you to the whole new world of comfort and luxury. The layout of the residential society is smartly planned to offer proper space for living, parking, relaxing and playing. The modern, luxurious and well- ventilated villas are constructed with utter simplicity to offer you an elegant lifestyle. The First Leaf in Gachibowli, Hyderabad is a ready to move- in society that is designed to offer affordable housing in Gachibowli, Hyderabad and provides villas at the price of a flat. There is a wide range of 4BHK villas that are 23 in total and are available for sale in various sizes.Project detailThe exteriors and interiors of the First Leaf perfectly complements each other and enhances your modern lifestyle. The society is constructed by the Pooja Ventures Private Limited that was established in 2001 and has been offering best- quality houses in Bangalore, Hyderabad, Vijayawada and Mangalore.At Magicbricks you can explore First Leaf photos, First Leaf price, First Leaf floor plan, flat/apartment price in First Leaf and all the other important information. The residential flats in First Leaf feature RCC frame structure, good quality molded cement/fly ash bricks cement mortar, imported marble finish with coats of polish in living/dining room and kitchen, master bedroom wooden flooring/other bedrooms vitrified tiles in bedrooms, all window frames and shutters of UPVC, all door shutters of solid core flush shutters provided with a natural wood veneer, internal doors of 8 feet in height and 3 feet in width, stainless steel hardware, main door with night latch, concealed door stoppers for the main door and bedroom doors, external walls with exterior emulsion paints of Asian make, internal walls with smooth finish of acrylic emulsion paint etc. Offering you all the modern amenities and basic facilities, the First Leaf lets you live a joyful and healthy life.-          Club house, swimming pool and gym keeps you on track with your fitness.-          Facilities like home security. Community security, rain water harvesting, water softening plant, sprinkle system and maintenance makes your life easy.Located in Gachibowli, Hyderabad, the First Leaf is strategically located to save you from daily traffic and inconvenience. Situated in close proximity to all prime areas, the society offers easy connectivity to public transport, IT hubs, colleges, schools, markets etc.

As both developer and builder, Pooja Ventures has the unique ability to control every aspect of a project, ensuring that quality remains a constant and common objective. With our strategic insight and solid experience, we are able to identify property opportunities and maximize their development potential.Our expertise encompasses all facets of property development, including sourcing prime sites, project management, architectural design, sales and marketing.

Since its inception in 2001, Pooja Ventures Private Limited (PVPL) has been associated with excellence in development of prime properties in Hyderabad and Bangalore. As both developer and builder, Pooja Ventures has the unique ability to control every aspect of a project, ensuring that quality remains a constant and common objective. With our strategic insight and solid experience, we are able to identify property opportunities and maximize their development potential.

Our expertise encompasses all facets of property development, including sourcing prime sites, project management, architectural design, sales and marketing.  All projects undertaken by us follow a set of common principles which entail detailed planning and innovation. The outcome results in developments of sound construction, high amenity value and a quality lifestyle.

Our vision is to deliver stimulating and enjoyable places to live and to work, and embody the contemporary lifestyle aspirations of our customers. Blending fine detailing with contemporary designs, PVPL promises to deliver the best in the market. Using cutting-edge technology, PVPL aspires to continue to lead by building new-age business properties, housing projects and landmark townships.
