about_project_details: Phoenix Group is one of the foremost names in the Indian corporate sector. Its a corporate conglomerate from Hyderabad with business interests in Realty, Automobiles, Mining and Power. Phoenixs core business is real estate development where it has created a benchmark by bringing ultra-luxurious residential projects alongside a world-class IT SEZ and hi-end commercial spaces which prove its multi-dimensional capabilities in handling projects of global standards. The projects developed are staggering testimonies to luxury and comfort. From blueprint to execution, Phoenix leaves its predominantly identifiable legacy on each project. Every project ushers in something new that surpasses the existing mind-sets and features.It is their constant endeavour to excel in delivery of global life spaces - be it homes, offices, commercial or retail. Driven by people and powered by technology, they are expanding rapidly as a power brand. To customers, they promise the finest level of living by integrating premium luxuries, front end and back end services, full scale amenities in every project, and of course the quintessential charm of belonging to a Phoenix property. Phoenix Group is on a mission to create properties of unequalled parlance, the group has over 7 million sq. ft. of existing development and over 10 million sq. ft. of projects planned for the near future.

project_description: Overview:Jayabheri Meadows is a new project by the prestigious Jayabheri Group, Gachibowli, Hyderabad. The project offers luxuriously built 4 BHK Villas for those who wish to live a modern life in the midst of all the comforts a society can offer. The project consists of a total 62 ready to move units with a price starting from 4.50 Cr onwards. Project Details:Jayabheri Meadows apartments are located in a gated community with the availability of world class amenities and beautiful surroundings. The builders have made sure that they give a safe and protected environment for you to live. As per the Jayabheri Meadows floor plan the 4 BHK villas in the project have an area between 4200 sqft and 5000 sqft. The apartments are huge, with ample daylight and have good ventilation giving you a healthy and calm ambience.Jayabheri Meadows reviews tell us that the society is well maintained and offers you an array of amenities that increase your comfort level to a greater height. Some of the amenities provided by the society are fire fighting equipment, round the clock guaranteed security, park, reserved parking space, swimming pool, etc. The excellent quality materials used for construction and the technologically advanced equipment fitted in the homes make it worthy of your time and investment. Highpoints:The main highlight of Jayabheri Meadows society is its fully functional club that helps you de-stress at the end of a busy day. The project is well connected to many famous landmarks in and around the city. Continental Hospitals, The Integral School, ICICI Bank ATM, Ellaa Hotel, etc. are within a radius of 4km.The updated Jayabheri Meadows photos on the website will tell you more details of the project. This is a one-time opportunity. So go and book your home now. A lovely dream is awaiting for you.

project_description: Looking for a ready-to-move-in flat for sale/rent in the IT world of Gachibowli, Hyderabad – then Niharika Exotica is an ultimate choice. This residential project by Niharika Projects comprises total 300 units evenly distributed among 27 high-rise towers. Laid out 3.50 acres of landscaped greenery, this residential offers gorgeous 2, 3 & 4 BHK flats with varying area size from 1350 sqft to 2700 sqft. The resale price of the Niharika Exotica, Gachibowli flats are tagged starting from Rs. 1 Cr to 1.43 Cr. Project details Developed by one of the leading property developers Niharika Projects, this RERA certified residential project offers good connectivity to Wipro, Polarsis, Microsoft and other established IT companies. Brilliant floor plans and the competitive flat rents have encouraged Niharika Exotica, Gachibowli to gain lots of positive reviews. Smart placement of doors & windows to allow maximum flow of air & light, make the well-ventilated residential apartments of Niharika Exotica, Gachibowli a sought-after residential address of Hyderabad. All the common areas have CCTV cameras and every apartment has been provided with intercom facility, to keep you sheltered 24x7. project_description: Overview:Chitrapuri Colony is a new residential project in Manikonda – Hyderabad offering thoughtfully built 3 BHK flats in the centre of the city. The Chitrapuri Colony has flats for rent as well as for sale for those looking to own a home at an affordable price. The project has lavishly built 700 units in 6 huge towers. About the Project:The innovative designs with eco-friendly initiatives and proper usage of water and electricity ensures this project truly stands apart from the others. Chitrapuri Colony apartments is methodically constructed with an unmatched design and the array of modern amenities are a perfect blend of originality and elegance. The 3 BHK flats in the project are built on an area of 1670 sqft, ensuring well ventilated and airy rooms for a serene atmosphere.Chitrapuri Colony brochure gives a list of all the modern amenities provided by the project. Some of these include lift, swimming pool, bank and ATM, maintenance staff, kids play area, round the clock security, reserved and visitor parking service, gymnasium, power back up, rain water harvesting, conference room, fire fighting equipment, water storage and uninterrupted water supply, park, etc. Chitrapuri colony boasts of a world class lifestyle and the considerately built homes are a proof that they keep the customers ahead of their thought process. Highpoints:Chitrapuri Colony layout is in a prime location and well connected to many famous schools, hospitals and shopping destinations in the vicinity. Kidzee Preschool, Shoppers Stop, Prerana Hospital, Karur Vysya Bank ATM, MedPlus, Red Fox Hotel and Khajaguda Rock Climbing are available within a radius of 5km from the colony.Home seekers can go through the updated Chitrapuri Colony photos for more details of the project. So go and book your dream home today!!!

project_description: The exquisite exteriors along with the luxurious interiors equipped with latest technologies, make for an ideal lifestyle. And this lifestyle can be perfectly withdrawn from Mahindra Lifespaces Ashvita. Ashvita is spread across 9 acres of exuberant foliage and residential areas designed by diligent architects and engineers who have brought a new level to the panache of living. It offers impeccably designed apartments and each home is well-projected in concordance of nature’s beauty with the leisure of modern living. Ashvita homes help you maintain a healthy equilibrium between work and play as they are located very close to offices or workplaces and recreational places such as sports arenas, restaurants, movie theatres etc. Coming from the trusted Mahindra Lifespaces, Ashvita is a place where felicitous exteriors blend perfectly with well-designed, Vaastu compliant homes. Every home at Ashvita symbolizes a perfect balance between various elements of life for serenity of mind, body and soul. Ashvita is a perfect blend of style and substance, where professional and personal life amalgamate. If you are striving for a perfect balance between professional and personal life, Ashvita is the best place for you.Why should I buy?Felicitous exteriors blended perfectly with well-designed, Vaastu compliant homes.Sprawling expanse of greenery.Exquisite exteriors along with the luxurious interiors equipped with latest technologies.Price details and unit details.The housing unit consists of opulent yet thoughtfully designed 2, 3 and 4 BHK apartments whose price range varies according to the constructional area.2 BHK (1218 Sqft and 1262 Sqft) costs starting from around 60 Lacs, 3 BHK (1568 Sqft, 1705 Sqft, 1712 Sqft and 1847 Sqft) costs starting from around 75 Lacs, 4 BHK (2035 Sqft, 2040 Sqft, and 2082 Sqft) costs starting from around 99 Lacs.Nearby information, Places of interest, landmarks.HITECH City, is a hub of Information Technology, Engineering, Health informatics, and Bioinformatics in Hyderabad. Ashvita is a top-class, society located near HITECH City, Kukatpally. Besides basic amenities, you also get the convenience of day-care facilities for your children. Miyapur Metro Railway station is at a walking distance and the airport is also at a quick drive.About the builder.Mahindra Lifespaces is a pioneer of transforming urban landscapes by creating affordable societies and is India's first Green Homes developer. Green Design and Healthy Living is the foundation of all the projects of Mahindra Lifespaces. and Nowadays all the residential projects are pre-certified green buildings by IGBC and Mahindra Lifespaces was one of the first business entity to receive the pre-certification from IGBC.Other projects by the builder.This company has been building trust for 27 years through its remarkably unique projects. Some of its projects include Great Eastern Link, Mahindra Park and Mahindra Garden.Projects nearby.Several reputed developers have shown interest in this locality. Few that have presence in this vicinity are Jains Ravi Gayathri Heights by Jain Promoters and Builders Pvt Ltd and Incor One City by INCOR Infrastructure Pvt. Ltd.

Mahindra Lifespaces, the real estate development arm of $6 billion Mahindra Group is a subsidiary of Mahindra & Mahindra Limited. Formerly known as Mahindra Gesco Developers Ltd, the new name reflects the company's passion and vision of creating spaces for healthy living - in both residential and commercial segments. Mahindra Lifespaces has a real focus on quality, transparency and providing value to customers.

The company's new identity exemplifies the spirit behind it's creations. Called the 'Flower of life', the new logo encompasses flowers of different colours, with each colour signifying a vital aspect of life. The logo is inspired from a simple and significant insight that flowers form an integral part of one's home. They stand for naturalness, freshness, health, vibrancy, energy, and the beauty of life - tenets that inspire Mahindra Lifespaces. The name 'Lifespaces' is tucked into the flower of life and is comforted, cosseted, and nurtured by it. And when they come together they stand for the very essence of life.

project_description: Overview Developed by INCOR Infrastructure Pvt. Ltd. -  INCOR One City Hitech City, Hyderabad is a delightful residential project designed to offer luxurious 2 & 3-bedroom residential apartments. The project offers total 1350 residential units spread among 5 stunning high-rise towers. The units are available with area size varying from 1208 to 1931 sqft and the flat rates of INCOR One City Hitech City, Hyderabad are priced within the bracket Rs. 57.0 Lac - 1.02 Cr Project Details Placed in the bustling locality situated right on the KPHB - HITEC City main road, this residential project is a perfect investment option. Designed by renowned architects, these 2 & 3 homes exude all the colors of luxury living. Come and book a flat now in INCOR One City Hitech City, Hyderabad and enjoy the rest of your life with complete bliss amidst scenic environ. Besides, keeping the rooms fresh & lively, the well-ventilated residential apartments of INCOR One City Hitech City, Hyderabad showered with lots of sunlight promise a healthy living. The friendly vibes of the surrounding atmosphere welcome you to lead a happy life. Along with manned security, every tower has also been facilitated with CCTVs ensuring you live in a worry-free environment. A large sports arena equipped with tennis, cricket & basketball courts, clubhouse, community hall and yoga deck are some of the signature amenities of INCOR One City Hitech City, Hyderabad. Highpoints Located in one of the major IT hubs of Hyderabad City is undoubtedly the prime attribute of INCOR One City Hitech City which has made it a hottest residential destination. Excellent connectivity to public transport facilities & easy access to the popular Sujana Forum Mall are few other benefits of this project. Schools like Narayana, Sri Chaitanya, Oakridge International and hospitals such as Apollo & Remedy are situated within close vicinity.
about_project_details: INCOR Infrastructure started with the vision of bringing a professionally managed real estate company to India. INCOR was started by Anand Reddy and Surya Reddy, entrepreneurs with business experience in India and USA. Having started and successfully exited from their IT enterprise, they formed INCOR with the dream of bringing a professionally managed real estate company to India. INCOR vision is to build quality, customer centric and professional businesses in real estate and healthcare. INCOR believes in forging win-win partnerships that fuels the growth of all stakeholders. Which is why, in each industry, INCOR partners with leading global and local organizations to bring global best practices and a higher standard of professional ethics to India.

project_description: OverviewFortune Butterfly City on Srisailam Highway, Hyderabad is a luxurious place that lets you experience comfort, peace, happiness, contentment, beauty and everything else that you need to live a luxurious and relaxed life. The ready to move Fortune Butterfly City features 350 residential plots that are available in various sizes and are an ideal option to construct the dream house as per your modern day needs and preferences. Designed to offer affordable housing in Srisailam Highway, Hyderabad, the Fortune Butterfly City offers plots at prices starting from Rs. 5.2 lac.Project detailThe Fortune Butterfly City is built to cater the demands and needs of modern age and offers a secure environment for all the residents to live a stress- free life. Offering beautiful view with 48% of its total land, the Fortune Butterfly City offers you the space and atmosphere to play, relax and spend some quality time with your family. The project is constructed by the Fortune Infra Developers Pvt. Ltd. that was established with a mission to offer blissful life, provide 1 lakh employment at the earliest and develop knowledge based society in order to have a powerful and beautiful India. Approved by DTCP as per HUDA norms, the society is a gated community that features theme gardens and fountains/sculptures to keep you surrounded with fresh air and sunlight. The society features basic facilities like underground power cable, underground drainage, avenue lighting, lavish green parks, rose garden, green walk ways, sewerage network, OHT and water lines network, water harvesting, 24 x 7 security and a lot more. Apart from these basic facilities, the Fortune Butterfly City in Srisailam Highway, Hyderabad is equipped with modern amenities like swimming pool, restaurant, ultra-modern gym, spa, clinic, tennis court, indoor games, party zone, library etc. If you book a plot in Fortune Butterfly City, you will be able to enjoy easy connectivity to public transport, Hardware park, Rajiv Nano- Tech Park, Agakhan Foundation, Raheja IT Park, Rajiv Gems and Jewelry Park, IT SEZs Indu, Brahmini, TCS, AIR Cargo Complex, Apparel Park, Electronic City, International Amusement Park, Pyramid Center, Mucherla IT Park, R.G. International Airport, Fabcity and a lot more.

project_description: OverviewPBEL City located near APPA Junction, Hyderabad is a mega 25-acre world-class township perfectly placed under the shadow of mother nature. The mesmerising surroundings of this integrated township offers over 2500 units spread across 8 towers. Available for sale, the residential apartments are priced within the range of Rs.60.9 lakhs and Rs.80 lakhs. About the ProjectEngineered with perfect precision, the well-ventilated residential apartments of PBEL City are true definition of luxury & comfort. Loaded with best of world-class amenities & facilities, the apartments are designed to enhance the quality of standard living.This integrated project boasts 1000+ well-planned apartments distributed between 8 magnificent high-rise towers. Two of the towers are ready for sale while the remaining 2 towers are under-construction.  This gated community is already home to approximately 700 happy families.The residences are offered at a very economical & affordable price range. Come and experience a divine living in the well-ventilated residential apartments of PBEL City. All the flats are built as per Vaastu rules.  Armed with some of the latest amenities & facilities like fully-functional sports arena with several play courts, a large swimming pool, clubhouse and many more other provisions PBEL City guarantees that you live a best life.Strategically located, this township also offers easy access to several important workplaces, schools, hospitals, entertainment avenues, etc. Easy connectivity via public transport make this society a preferred residential destination.HighpointsDeveloped by one of the leading names in the construction empire L&T and skilfully designed by the famous Yashar Architects - PBEL City is truly a residential wonder. This massive residential township is honoured with a number of awards including the prestigious 'Outstanding Concrete Structure Award' of AP in 2012 by the Indian Concrete Association. The project also won the 'Best Consumer Protection Company' award in 2012 and was crowned with 'Premium Apartment Project of the Year - South' at the NDTV Property Awards.
about_project_details: PBEL PBEL Property Development India Private Limited, promoted jointly by Property and Building Corporation Ltd. PBC, Electra Real Estate Ltd. and INCOR, is a Property Development company, which entered Indias real estate market with its flagship venture in Hyderabad PBEL City. PBEL builds and owns residential projects, office spaces, commercial centers, high-tech industrial parks and cargo facilities.PBEL India is a professionally driven company that has a diverse portfolio with strong real estate fundamentals. With focus on long-term growth prospects, PBEL develops and builds develops premium properties, which excel in having a superior location, beautiful and modern design, lifestyle and amenities.PBC is a subsidiary of the Israeli based IDB Group, the largest business conglomerate in Israel, and is one of the largest real estate companies in Israel. Its main business is buying land, constructing, and selling/leasing buildings. The company owns many properties in Israel, Europe and USA, totalling over 15 million sq ft.Currently, the largest project with PBC is the development and construction of the Plaza Las Vegas Hotel and Casino, including Conference Centre, Retail Spaces and Residential towers. It is a 5 dolar

project_description: Overview:Kalpataru Residency offers you luxurious 2, 2.5 and 3 BHK flats in Sanath Nagar Hyderabad. Developed by the respected Kalpataru Group, Sanath Nagar Hyderabad, the project consists of 2 huge towers. Kalpataru Residency Sanath Nagar prices are between 57.8 Lac and 90.0 Lac and these flats are still under construction with estimated time of possession between October 2019 and December 2019. About the Project:Kalpataru Residency brochures will show you that it is everything you want it to be, a lavish home with all the comforts you could imagine, which is backed by an inheritance focusing on trust and quality. The flats in Kalpataru Residency are thoughtfully designed and masterfully crafted to suit your sophisticated tastes that you will never feel lacking for space. With superior quality raw materials and all modern equipment, these flats are the best in the area.Kalpataru Residency Hyderabad reviews praise the construction, which is done with the best use of manpower and scientific technology. This project is considered to be an admirable address and it provides absolute amusement to the residents. As per the Kalpataru Sanath Nagar floor plans, it has a grand entrance, a 4 lane driveway and an in garage car wash, which ensures you receive a 5 star experience every time you come home. With a fully functional clubhouse, a swimming pool, a spa and a gymnasium the society comes with the state of the art amenities. Highpoints:Kalpataru Residency is situated in a prime location with many famous companies such as Dell, IBM, Wipro, Infosys, Google, etc. in the vicinity. It also has many prominent schools, hospitals and ATMs nearby to help you at times of need.You can check the updated Kalpataru Residency photos on the website for more details of the project. Hurry up!! Book now to live in the lap of luxury.
about_project_details: Kalpataru Group founded in the year 1969 is one of the leading real estate companies in India. The vision Mr. Mofatraj P.Munot since its start saw the company reach new heights. Kalpataru Builders has over the years delivered premium projects in the residential and commercial segments. Initially began operations in Mumbai Metropolitan Region and then Pune, the real estate company expanded presence in other cities like Surat, Jaipur, Chennai and Hyderabad.The builders received the CNBC Awaaz Real Estate Awards 2012 for best 'Mid-Segment Residential Project' and Platinum Award of Excellence at 7th Construction World Architect Builder Awards 2012. Kalpataru Group of Companies offers a gamut of services such as procurement and construction EPC contracting, property project management and real estate development. Projects by Kalpataru developers include integrated townships, lifestyle gated communities, retail spaces and redevelopment projects.
project_highlights:
Highlights


An enviable location with great connectivity to prominent areas such as Banjara Hills, Begumpet and Ameerpet ensures that commuting is never a hassle. Its adjacency to the Mumbai-Hyderabad highway, and no place seems too far away. Upcoming metro stations just a walk away from home, everyday commute will get even simpler.Upcoming Bharat Nagar Metro Station – 300 mts.Upcoming Erragadda Metro Station – 300 mts.Begumpet Railway Station – 12 km | NH9 – 0.5 km | MMTS – 0.5 kmAmeerpet – 3 km | Jubilee Hills – 5 kmBanjara Hills – 7 km | HITEC City – 10.5 km

Kalpataru Group founded in the year 1969 is one of the leading real estate companies in India. The vision Mr. Mofatraj P.Munot since its start saw the company reach new heights. Kalpataru Builders has over the years delivered premium projects in the residential and commercial segments. Initially began operations in Mumbai Metropolitan Region and then Pune, the real estate company expanded presence in other cities like Surat, Jaipur, Chennai and Hyderabad.
The builders received the CNBC Awaaz Real Estate Awards 2012 for best 'Mid-Segment Residential Project' and Platinum Award of Excellence at 7th Construction World Architect Builder Awards 2012. Kalpataru Group of Companies offers a gamut of services such as procurement and construction EPC contracting, property project management and real estate development. Projects by Kalpataru developers include integrated townships, lifestyle gated communities, retail spaces and redevelopment projects.
&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/Kalpataru-Group-1388234895397-Deveolper-Logo.jpg&yearOfExp=49

project_description: We understand the value of your hard-earned money. We know the hard work you put in to fulfill your familys dreams. We realize how difficult it is to give up your familiar surroundings and venture into a whole new territory. And yes, we feel you deserve more, much more. That's why we bring you smr vinay harmony county - a perfect balance of location, design, comfort and affordability. To experience a perfectly balanced lifestyle, heres where you should be. Smr vinay harmony county features amenities such as swimming pool, gym, basket ball court, tennis court, 24 hours security and many more. Located at rajendra nagar(TSPA junction), hyderabad, this project offers 2 bhk, 2.5 bhk and 3 bhk apartments. Over the years smr holdings has perfected the art of building dreams. A pioneer and expert in the construction of residential/housing projects, it takes pride in its project management and quality control expertise. The quality control team ensures topnotch quality while the project management team makes sure schedules are met and promises kept.
about_project_details: SMR Holdings At SMR Holdings, we value our vision, which is top-quality constructions and we believe its this earnest vision that has laid the foundation to our success and also has rendered us the status of uniqueness. Indeed, we have been reckoned as one of the leading construction houses in South India and we have been emphatically positioning ourselves to contribute to our customers by giving our best. The most significant factor considered while building beautiful homes is the conviction; as we take great pride in our integrity and commitment. We adhere to all the important factors involved and have an eye for intricate details. At SMR, we believe not just in the details but also in the comprehensive process, with focus on project management and quality control, we have been giving our customers world-class spaces to live in.

project_description: Lodha Bellezza, Hitech City, Hyderabad features 4 towering skyscrapers designed to cater to those with a discerning taste and a desire to experience a luxurious lifestyle. 4 splendid towers house around 362 sky villas in the configuration of 3BHK and 4BHK units and occupying an area ranging between 3447sq.ft. and 4761sq.ft. About the ProjectGrandeur and opulence exude from every corner of Lodha Bellezza, which features lavishly appointed sky villas offering gorgeous views of the city skyline. Enjoy unrestricted views of Hyderabad from these 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments. A suite of luxurious facilities elevates the luxury quotient of these extraordinary homes boasting home theatre lounge, private pool, private elevator, walk-in wardrobes and sun deck. These ready to move sky villas are priced within the range of Rs.2.10 crore and Rs.3.52crore.Discover an array of delightful experiences at Club Belezza featuring world class fitness amenities, private theatre and exclusive restaurants. Indoor games room allows residents to enjoy table tennis, snooker and carom. There are two squash courts, basketball and tennis court.The location of Lodha Bellezza in Hitech City, Hyderabad deserves a special mention as it is well connected to the rest of the city and is only minutes away from educational institutions like JNTU, ISB and NIFT. Schools such as Meridian School and Oakridge School are hardly 7 minutes and 13 minutes away. Malls such as Suguna Mall, Inorbit Mall and Manjeera Mall are only 10 to 15 minutes away. HighpointsLodha Bellezza boasts a number of high-end facilities, however, there is one that is truly noteworthy and that is the presence of an Olympic size swimming pool in the clubhouse. For those with a taste for finer things in life and seeking a truly luxurious abode, investing in this project will surely exceed their expectations.
about_project_details: The Lodha Group is amongst India's leading Real Estate Developers with a strong presence in India and the United Kingdom. The Group is currently developing an estimated 43 million sq ft of prime Real Estate with the largest land reserves in MMR and has several ongoing projects across London, Mumbai, Pune and Hyderabad. The Lodha Group has several landmark developments to its credit including World One - the world's tallest residential tower, and Palava City - the largest private development in the world. The Group has brought some of the top global names including Armani/Casa, Trump, Philip Starck, Jade Jagger, Greg Norman and Pei Cobb Freed to India. Pioneering new trends in the market, the Group introduced CASA by Lodha, offering the mid- income consumer luxury homes within easy reach.The Group also introduced the concept of branded office spaces, with offerings at every level, from world-class corporate offices and large- scale office campuses to signature boutique offices for growing businesses. The Group's tremendous success has been marked by financial investments from the finest global investors, including JP Morgan, Deutsche Bank, HDFC Ventures and ICICI Ventures.
project_highlights:
Highlights


Parking space, convenience stores and public transport points are no more than 5 minute walk away.School and club houses are just 10 minutes away.Univercity, business district and sport complex are only a 15 minute walk away.Forum Sujana mall: Across the road.Cinepolis: 3 mins away.Meridian School: 7 mins.Oakridge School: 13 minutes.Project USP:GHMC Approved.100 percent Vaastu.76 percent Open spaces.1.69 acres with C plus G plus 5 floors, 2 Towers, 132 Units.CCTV Camera Security.24x7 Security.Intercom Facility.Solar Fencing.Close Proximity to all Reputed Schools, Colleges and IT Hub.Bank loan facility is available.Guest Rooms and Party Lawn.Club House.

project_description: Overview: MR Serene View, a well planned residential project by MR Developers in the area of Chandanagar, Hyderabad is offering office spaces, showrooms, 2 BHK and 3 BHK luxurious apartments. MR Serene View price rate for these spaces start from Rs. 17.3 Lac onward. The project is currently under construction and will consist of 50 units spanned over 1 tower. Project Details:MR Serene View is a project skilfully located in Chandanagar, Hyderabad by MR Developers offering different dimensions of spacious office spaces, showrooms, 2 BHK and 3 BHK luxurious apartments. MR Serene View floor plans for its office space range from 495 sq. ft. to 1795 sq. ft.; showroom areas range from 495 sq. ft. to 1709 sq. ft.; 2 BHK flat areas range from 1114 sq. ft. to 1235 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1550 sq. ft. to 1610 sq. ft. These spaces are designed with RCC components, Indian teak wood frame doors, vitrified tiles and anti skid tiles flooring, concealed PVC conduits with modular switches, premium quality sanitary fittings, granite kitchen platform with SS sink, water harvesting pits etc.MR Serene View has many amenities for its occupants such as lifts, water supply, 24 hour power back up, fire fighting systems, intercom facility, car parking, gymnasium, children’s play area, 24 hour security facilities with CCTV camera surveillance, gated community, vaastu compliant, water softener plant, and rain water harvesting etc.Highpoints:MR Serene View has a central courtyard style design and also 3 side roads for easy access to various facilities. MR Serene View locality is closely connected and has basic civic utilities like Madinaguda Bus Stop, Sentia The Global School, The Chennai Shopping Mall, Pranaam Hospital, South Central Railway Station, State Bank ATM, Vijetha Super Market, Apollo Pharmacy, A Lounge etc. among others.
about_project_details: MR Developers, headed by seasoned and trusted Realtors in Construction Engineering, have been engaged in developing prestigious projects in and around Hyderabad, with Eeco Valley, brimming with its 120 happy faces of its proud owners, and bustling activity of a Play School, a Super Market, and a Patanjali Store, is the latest Project that is accomplished with satisfied Customers.
project_highlights:
Highlights


A Total of 50 Residential Apartments in Cellar plus G plus 5 Floors.Central Courtyard Style Design.No common-walls and 3 Sides Roads 100 percent Vaastu Compliant.Close to the Community Hall of Madhavapuri Society and  Blessed with 3 temples close by rendering a pious and religious serenity around.There is something magical about the life here with lullaby of winds that put you to sleep and Birds to wake you up.Project USPElegant And Affordable Apartment Complex.
